name: Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm
about: What it is: An intensive balm that moisturizes extra-dry lips for up to 24 hours and is clinically shown to improve the look of damaged lips...Skin Type: Dry..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sugar: s scientifically proven to have a long-lasting hydrating effect.- Hyaluronic Acid Filling Spheres: help make the lips appear fuller.- Sea Fennel: helps to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles and define the lip area..What Else You Need to Know: Our dermatologist-tested lip treatment instantly replenishes and recovers dry, peeling lips with smoothing sea fennel extract and hydrating hyaluronic acid spheres. The ultra-nourishing formula acts as a soothing balm, sinking in to remove dry flakes and deliver a plump, healthy look...Clinical Results: In a 4-week clinical assessment of 30 subjects:.- It was shown to repair the appearance of lips..In an instrumental test of 30 subjects.- It intensely moisturized lips for 24 hours..In a 4-week self-assessment of 62 subjects:.- 100% agreed it relieved and soothed dry lips.- 94% reported it improved elasticity.- 94% noticed improved smoothness after 1 use...
ingredients: -Sugar: Is scientifically demonstrated to provide long-lasting hydration..-Hyaluronic Acid Filling Spheres: Make lips appear fuller..-Sea Fennel: Smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles while visibly defining the lip area....Cera Alba (Beeswax), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Triolein, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Glyceryl Dioleate, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethyl Vanillin, Limonene, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Geraniol <17313>...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply throughout the day as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few days, I noticed my lips were wildly dry and starting to peel. I stopped using the product and have been using other chapsticks to rehydrate, and La Neige at night. Iu2019m super bummed as I had high hopes for this product.

reviews.review_text: This has been my saviour during the dry times of the season. I get super dry lips in the winter so I love how fast-acting this lip balm is and how deeply it hydrates them to get rid of the 'tight' feeling I get. Very good quality product.

reviews.review_text: This lip balm will leave your lips smooth, soft and super supple. Fresh makes the best lip balms I have ever used and I have used them all.
I love this lip balm and the lip mask! Iu2019m only giving 4 stars because I feel there isnu2019t that much product in the balm. I havenu2019t had it long at all and itu2019s almost completely gone.

Unfortunately, this product did not work for me. The low rated reviews were indeed correct. I am giving this product two stars for the cute packaging and the scent - other than that this product did not work and it is very uncomfortable. Like other reviews, the balm did not absorb into the skin and it is very greasy. I used it morning, noon and night and did not feel or notice a difference in my chapped lips. I went back to using Bag Balm (a very undesirable product) but it heals chapped lips instantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years and even though I try another product I always end up going back to this. Nowadays more lip balms are coming in a tube form where you squeeze the balm out, however I still like this classic way of twisting the bottom and gliding this on my lips. This keeps my lips moisturized and looking good. I use it daily by incorporating it in my morning and nightly routines. I also like to use it during the days I don't wear lip stick or gloss for a nice natural look. I personally was not a fan of any of the tinted ones and felt it didn't have the same effect as the translucent. I also wouldn't compare this to drug store lip balm like some others mentioned in the reviews. I have tested this recently because I ran out and it took me a few days to reorder then of course waited another few days for it to arrive. During that time I did use drug store lip balm and it certainly is not the same. I had to reapply that over and over and my lips did not look and feel the same. Yes, it is on the pricier side and I'm pretty sure it did not cost $28 when I first started using this. I just hope it doesn't raise in price because this really is a good lip balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I obsessed with this lip balm. I got it a few months ago and it has become my go to lip balm. In fact I bought several to give to my family.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a couple years now. I have a bunch of the popular lip products, but turn to this one often. By no means, do I think itu2019s a miracle product, but I do like the texture of it and how it seems to just work better than everything else. I do find that I need to apply it consistently vs. just here and there for best results. I also use it as a base layer before applying another product like the Summer Fridays balms. It seems to layer really nicely for me.

reviews.review_title: Not their best product for lips

Now after I've stopped using it for 24 hours my lips hurt, they are pealing and sting when I touch them. Obviously, I am not a fan. I wanted to give it a fair shot so that is why I tried it twice, and both times the same issues happened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I normally wear the original ones during the day because they have SPF in them and use this one at night or if I know I wonu2019t be in sunlight. Iu2019m not a heavy tinted lip balm type of girl, so this one or the one in the brown packaging is great for a clear finish! I do like the rose one as well! All the other colors are not my cup of tea. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: New formula, feels cheap, not going to buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I bought this lip balm was about a year or so ago. I thought I finally found my perfect lip balm and would keep buying it from then on. The original one felt very smooth and lightweight, it just melted on my lips, and the moisture effect lasted long. This time around, as my balm was running out I ordered another one and it was a completely different experience! While the scent remained the same, the formula must have changed greatly. It now feels heavy on my lips, as if I coated them with a candle wax. More than that after about 10 mins since application it starts feeling dry and needs reapplying. This was nothing close to the original formula experience! It now feels like a cheap $3 chapstick I could buy at my grocery store. I compared the leftover in my old balm to this new balm and confirmed that it felt completely different. Then I came here and read other reviews of people saying the formula has changed. Very disappointed. Will look for another lip balm now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have both and I gotta say Iu2019m loving this one way more! It is soft and silky yet doesnu2019t fall apart like biteu2019s newly reformulated (yet again) day balm. I kept it under my pillow last night. I really do like this balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently moved to the mid-west which is drier than dry in these harsh winter months. My skin and especially my lips were taking a huge hit! Cracked and painful, I was searching for a solution. With all the great reviews for this lip balm, I decided to order the translucent Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm. So far, so good. The balm is very hydrating. I put it on before bed and when I woke up eight hours later, I could still feel the balm on my lips. I'm hoping with continued use, I will see a huge difference in my poor cracked lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only feels nice for a little while.. I wanted something that would have my lips moisturized for a while, but this doesnu2019t. Itu2019s nice, but not for the price point. I think my EOS chapstick lasts longer and makes my lips nicer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow i gotta say Ive always suffered of dry lips since a child and out my whole life this is the best softest moisturizing lip balm Iu2019ve ever tried! Ive tried man many through out the years    And this has to be the best i love how it feels on the lips the softest buttery omg i just canu2019t believe i found one i love so much  and is better than lip masks too i put it before going to sleep and i wake up and still there i just love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: genuinely my favorite lip balm i have tried besides the laneige sleeping masks!! i have almost gone through an entire tube of this in a year which has never happened to me before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this lip balm !!! my lips get dry easily, especially since i wear lots of matte lipsticks, and ive been looking for a good lip balm for forever. this one leaves my lips feeling soft and the formula is very light. there is a slight fragrance which doesn't bother me but may bother others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My lips actually got drier when I tried this. Being the winter time I really wanted something moisturizing and by the evening my lips were peeling.  Fortunately my dermatologist gave me samples of Dr. Dan's Cortibalm and my lips healed pretty quickly (try it out if you can, esp. in the winter!) Won't use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite lip balm ever. Doesnu2019t dry out my lips, gives them a nice shine, and tastes great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful lip product! Itu2019s smooth glide across your lips and immediate relief from lips being dry or chapped is the reason I keep coming back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom gave me the sample of this that she didnu2019t use, I HAD to buy the full size. As it is a cold winter and often I find myself picking at my dry lips, this did the trick, itu2019s the most moisturizing lip balm I have and heals cracks while giving a perfect (but not over the top) shine and tint to my lips. Would HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had my eye on this for a long time and finally gave in and purchased. I feel personally that it is way overpriced for little results. I was expecting this to feel rich and balmy because you know.. itu2019s a lip balm. I was wrong. This feels very heavy on the lips and never seemed to sink in and moisturize my lips. It felt more like a super slick lip oil instead of a nourishing balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this to moisturize lips! Great for under face masks too! Keeps your lips from drying out without staining inside of mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ingredients are excellent quality with limited chemicals. However for the price, it does not last very long. Perhaps I overuse it, but the ingredients make up for the price. Use at your discretion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love fresh products. This is no exception. I prefer the clear balms over the color in the fresh line. I use the one in the brown tube (that has sunscreen) during the day.  I save this one for night since it doesnu2019t have spf, and this is meant to be a treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this lip balm!! My lips were so chapped the corners were cracking and nothing was helping! Put this on religiously for 2 days and my lips were brand new!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Alright, this stuff is awesome. I was really hesitant to purchase due to the price, but I admit it, its worth it. I have the worst peeling and flaking lips (even in the dead of summer) this winter I've been using the Laneige lip sleeping mask at night and this stuff for daytime, not a single flake or crack in sight. Will definitely (begrudgingly, lol) repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always buy this and immediately regret it. The packaging is so appealing and they sound so nice and luxurious. Then you put it on and it looks like gobs of melted hot pink crayon. You have to be super careful and never leave it in a pocket or a warm location bc it melts super easily. It does feel soft and moisturizing but it does better under the mask tbh. Unfortunate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had gotten a mini of them regular one which wasn't in stock when i visited the store. almost a good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm you can buy! Leaves a clean and moisturized finish. Smell is a light lemon scent.

reviews.review_title: Pricey but a good product nonethelessu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing!! Iu2019ve been using the sugar scrub for a few weeks now and I really like it but paired with my usual vaseline it just wasnu2019t doing the trick so I decided to try this. I like how itu2019s moisturizing and sits on top of the skin. Iu2019m used to my lips sucking up moisture pretty quickly and this hasnu2019t done that yet. I would give it five stars but the price is kind of steep for a lip balm. However if it works well long term, Iu2019ll keep spending the money.

reviews.review_title: - Nice Lip Balm, Just Not For Me -

reviews.review_text: I purchased this lip balm because I ALWAYS have dry/chapped lips, I love the quality of the component, and the balm itself is super smooth. However, I have been using it for a few weeks now, and I have not seen any improvement. I was hoping for the price, it would be a bit better but I guess I'm a special case, if you have normal to dry lips this would probably work just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are super plush and hydrated. Great to wear under a extremely matte lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is the best lip treatment I ever have. I only apply it in the morning and at night and I donu2019t have dry lips problem anymore maybe a little bit if I donu2019t drink enough but nothing like before. Itu2019s a life changing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve repurchased this product many times! Very simple and does what it is supposed to do. Moisturizing but not over the top. I like using this before I leave the house if Iu2019m not wearing makeup. It works nice with a mask on too bc itu2019s not oily or glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect when you just need a little something for the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have nicer lips, and this product in particular is hands down my favorite way to keep them juicy. I used to be a laneige girl but this really made me change my mind.   I love that the tube screws shut, the sheer pink is so pretty to wear with anything, itu2019s very complimentary. It travels well and is easy to apply on the go. I also use it before bed!   No strong smell or waxy oil feeling, and my most favorite part is my lips donu2019t get u201cthirstyu201d for more product in between applicationsu2026itu2019s very hydrating with no weird after effects that some others cause.   Buy. It.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this lip balm except the price. I keep trying other lip balms, hoping to find one that is more reasonably priced, but always come back to Fresh. The sugar lip balm tastes good; leaves my lips very soft; isn't shiny or goopy; and lasts a long time. I also have a couple of the tinted versions, but the clear version makes the best foundation for lipstick. I also appreciate that the casing is metal, not plastic, since I'm trying to buy less plastic these days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, hands down the best chapstick/lip balm Iu2019ve ever used. Iu2019m on my fifth tube and itu2019s worth the price. I have always suffered with dry and cracked lips, maybe itu2019s because I donu2019t drink enough water??, but this little magic balm has always helped me. I have the translucent one and love it!! My boyfriend likes to steal it from me once in a while because he loves it too so thereu2019s that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm Iu2019ve ever used, I have crazy dry lips and this makes them bearable moisturized for probably ~10 hours before I try to reapply. Iu2019ll usually put it on once in the morning and once when I get back from work or before I go to bed. My lips have completely stopped peeling/flaking for the first time in basically my entire life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: itu2019s not moisturizing at all and feels like it just sits on top on your lips :/   but i also have naturally dry skin so maybe itu2019s just not moisturizing enough for me u2014 upper hand, it has a nice but subtle scent to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product.  I love it.   Keeps your lips moist

reviews.review_text: This lip balm is my fav! It's very moisturizing, at first I didn't know if it would be worth the price but it totally is!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

This is the best when it comes to moisture and keeping my lips soft and moisturized everyday, my lips look healthier and more supple after using this lip balm, well worth the price in my opinion. I have been searching for a moisturizing lip balm for a longgg time since Iu2019m into Matte liquid lipsticks and finally found my holy grail! Fresh Please donu2019t ever discontinue this product

reviews.review_title: soft and buttery but extremely drying

Iu2019m going back to Caudalie and if they go out of stock, Iu2019ll happily wait for them to restock. Never buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product but this will be my last one.  The price is not worth the tiny amount of product.  I also received a broken and crooked lip balm.  Just waste of time to replace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, I love this lip balm so much. It is so smooth, when compared to other brands, this is the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE the translucent formula. My lips are so soft with this product. I ended up getting a travel size for a free gift from sephora, and it is now my go to for hydrating my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute must-have for me! Even though it is a bit pricey, I always make sure I have several tubes stashed in different places. I love it that much. reviews.review_text: I bought this on an impulse and now I regret it. The first few times it was great. It smells and feels amazing, but after a while of using it, it started to dry out my lips. I think this happens because they want you to keep using it and re-buying the product. Now i hardly ever use it and I would not recommend this to anyone, Especially with the price it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good lip balm. If I put this on before bed, I wake up in the morning and with my lips plumped, hydrated, and super soft. It's so good. I always repurchase. Worth the money. Best lip balm I've invested in. No scent either. Doesn't taste like anything. Do yourself a favor and get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment ever. Makes my lips extremely soft and stay soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing lip product. I love the way that it prepares my lips for any lipliner or lipstick application. It is also great to leave on overnight as a treatment. I apply it to wet lips while my skincare sets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Beauty is a staple in my makeup routine and I have been purchasing their products for years and years due to the clean ingredients and awesome formulas! This has really awesome ingredients like sugar, sea fennel, and orange extract which help to prevent moisture loss and protect my lips from dryness and damage! It's super effective at keeping my lips hydrated for 24 hours too! It's awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this one because I thought the tint wouldu2019ve a nice addition. Total waste of money! The product comes off thick and clumpy rather than smooth, like when you leave a lipstick in a hot car. Doesnu2019t matter if itu2019s hot or cold the results are the same. Donu2019t waste your money.

reviews.review_title: Best lip balm on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the absolute best lip balm I have ever used. I purchased it for the first time in 2017 and have never stopped using it since. I always keep a tube stocked at all times. One full sized lip balm lasts me about 6-7 months during warm months, but lasts me about 4-5 months during cold, snowy months. I use this product daily, and frequently use it multiple times a day.   If I have dry lips, theyu2019re moisturized and look supple a few hours after a single use. If my lips are chapped and painful, I coat my lips with a few layers before bed and my lips are significantly improved by the morning time.   The downsides to this product are expensive cost, exclusivity (hard to find in other retailers apart from Sephora), and it can melt in hot cars or in jean pockets. Although it does melt from heat exposure, Iu2019ve salvaged tubes that were left in the trunk of my car all summer. The heat does slightly change the productu2019s consistency if the product was very melted, but the product does continue to work the same and will re-solidify in its tube. If you the tube is kept in the pocket (exposed to mild heat), it gets softer and gives more product than usual when applied.   This product goes a long way. One short swipe on each lip is usually enough to get the job done. I also really love how the product melts into your lips and is absorbed by your lips, leaving your lips soft and supple. This is definitely my all time favorite skin care products of all time and has been for 4 years now. Iu2019ve tried many other expensive lip balms (Eminence, Image, brands carried at Sephora, Loccitaine, etc) and nothing, I repeat nothing, compares to Sugaru2019s Advanced Therapy lip balm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't a fan of this lip balm. Other friends and family members have highly recommended this but it felt more like the oil was sitting on my lip than sinking in and hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It makes your lips feel super smooth and soft. They application is simple and refreshing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and feels great on the lips. Love that it has SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I suffer from perpetually chapped lips -- my lips are chapped all year long and it hurts. Drugstore lipbalms haven't done much for me, and I've even tried an assortment of lip balms meant to target dryness. No luck. Finally ordered this item from Fresh and my lips FINALLY have some relief. It lasts a while too! I absolutely lean on this product all year long and when it runs out, I'll definitely be getting another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t going to purchase Fresh products as they are overpriced and over fragranced IMO, but have always been curious about their lip products. Being they were on sale I decided to give a few of them a shot. This balm is so good! I love the scent! Be careful as it is a super soft balm so you need to apply with a very light touch. I tend to go full-force when I apply my balms but noticed right away how delicate this is. I use this in combination with their Lip Serum and in just one week my lips have never felt softer or looked more healthy. I think Iu2019m going to be grabbing extras before the sale is over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the real deal. My sister turned me on to it and Iu2019ve never looked back. Makes my lips supper soft and moist. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It keeps my lips moisturized all year. Itu2019s colourless, so if it wipes off on my mask, I donu2019t worry about stains.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this for years - love it! Takes care of my lips in Minnesota winters!

reviews.review_title: A BIG NO FOR ME! NOT WORTH THE PRICE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry chapped lips, so I hope I can find a lipstick with rich moisturizer which can heal my lips. I gave this product a try as I had seen many positive comments about this. However, the product was just fine, the packaging was qualified but the lipstick was too soft and just broke after 3 time-uses. I can just go with Blistex drugstore lip balm rather than this.
Very moisturizing but need to apply several times during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this long ago and always intended on purchasing the full size. When I saw this was on sale with bonus points I had to buy it. I donu2019t use it solely for the moisture but for the color. I donu2019t wear lipstick so having a balm with decent moisture plus a muted pink color is hard to find. I donu2019t like bright pink or red colors on my lips, all I need is a little bit of color so I donu2019t look too pale. The only con is that itu2019s a soft balm so if you press too hard it will break. With this consistency I wish it were in a pot instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Fresh lip product! My lips are really sensitive, and it's one of the few things that doesn't irritate my lips and make them peel. Only knocking off a star because it does get used up quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Tried numerous times and just didnu2019t work for me. It has no hugging power, doesnu2019t cling to lips or hydrate moisturize at all!! Will be returning!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I received this in a favorites set, and while Iu2019ll use it, I wonu2019t purchase the full size. When it comes to putting down money for a full size product itu2019s Summer Fridays lip butter balm. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used and loved this product for years. I do not often wear lipstick, but I use products to keep my lips moisturized  daiy and this product does it better than most. The bonus is that it gives my lips a hint of pretty, healthy-looking color. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

The only downside is that you have to be very gentle when using it because the stick breaks VERY easily. Also, the formula is so soft that it can sometimes get messy while applying. I really want to continue using this lip balm because I LOVE how it makes my lips feel but if I can find something thatu2019s less messy and does the same job I will not purchase Freshu2019s lip balm again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very good and keeps my dry probe lips from getting crusty.  Itu2019s saved them during the start of wedding season and my lipsticks go on smoothly and arenu2019t a mess by being applied to dry or flakey lips! Lips are soft and healthy looking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this isnu2019t bad but you can get a drugstore chapstick and it would have the same effect .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a gloopy, melty mess. Every time I open the lid is just a blob. Applying it to your lips is a mess, you always get waaay to much of the product. So then you just have a mountain of gloop on your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm on the market. I live in an extremely dry climate, so lip moisturizing products are a must. Iu2019ve tried so many and felt that nothing worked as good as my basic chapstick. Letu2019s just say, I love this balm. My lips feel so good when I wear it. I love the taste and the feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but I didn't. The smell is really nice and luxurious, but I didn't feel like it made my lips smooth. It wasn't very hydrating for me.

This is very well made natural lip balm. Iu2019ve purchased many times now, simply because I appreciate its attention to packaging and clean ingredients that provide benefit. I also like that itu2019s a cult classic. Wish there was more seasonal options that were also free from artificial color dyes like this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite lip treatment. It moisturizes, is long lasting and feels so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Save your money, This is the most basic lip balm. My neosporin or aquaphor work much better and without the almost $30 price tag. Donu2019t believe all the hype behind this, itu2019s not worth it..at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what youu2019d expect to go nicely on a Lyonnaise salad, but wow did it spice things up nicely!  Cant wait to not eat alone one day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lip balm, but it doesn't last very long. Sugar Hydrating Lip Balm by Fresh lasts twice as long with the same amount of usage. I love this, but at $26 a tube, I wish it had more in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was a part of 2020's lip balm kit and I wanted to provide a review since... as part of the kit it was alright to receive, but don't spend the $$ on it, imo there are better alternatives.  This stick broke before I got even to a middle of it. There is little product and lots of packaging. I had to reapply often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never had an issue with my lips until I got a free one of these. It made my lips look and feel so flawless. If it were cheaper this would definitely  be the only lip balm I would use but since it's so expensive for a lip balm I'd only use it on special occasions to give my lips that extra fresh look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I think the formula of this lip balm is decent, itu2019s so soft and easy to break that you need to baby it which annoys me.  I would only repurchase if on sale or part of a kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite lip moisturizer!! If you haven't tried it...YOU MUST!

reviews.review_title: Not as good as it used to be
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my nightly lip balm for years on end and I would faithfully buy a tube every few months until one time the tube seemed drier than usual.  I contacted the company with the serial number thinking it was expired or a fluke, but they never contacted me back and every tube since has been this inferior product that does not last me the whole night. Very disappointing as I had to go on the hunt for new options - my new winners are the Laniege lip mask, which lasts me 11 hours, and the Huda Silk balm, which lasts me 15 hours. This tube is pretty useless during the day as it can't leave the house due to the low melting temperature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I heard rave reviews about this product, but it didnu2019t live up to my expectation. In fact, I hated it. The smell reminded me of pie and was yummy, but the lip treatment really made my lips dry. After maybe 20 minutes, it felt like I havenu2019t applied anything on my lips nor hydrated. I agree that it seems to define the lip line, but my lips were plumper and felt better before I applied the lip balm/treatment.  I usually donu2019t even have chapped lips and like matte and glossy products just the same. I think that anyone who is looking for a good lip product should skip on this one. Youu2019re either better with your usual lip balm or, if you want to splurge, the Aerin lip mask is SO worth it. It has a glossy texture and a nude-light pink color, as well but is really hydrating and can be worn off as a cute lip gloss or at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute best thing Iu2019ve ever put on my lips. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is very moisturizing. I will give it that. I got it because my lips are really dry. The only issue with this is that it is very soft. It is in a Chapstick like case, but the balm itself is very soft and itu2019s easy to mess it up and ruin the stick. So you have to be very gentle when you apply it. Itu2019s especially easy to mess it up if it has been in your pocket and is warm. I think this product would be a lot better if it were in a small container where you use your finger to apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this since i was in highschool and have loved it ever since. Feels very nice on the lips and keeps them moisturized, no need to reapply every few hours. Only downside was it melted very easily, even in my back pocket it would melt and I am not a warm person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand why this is priced so high. It does not do much for you lips. I wore it on lips all night and woke up to very dry and pale lips. It feels nice when you first put it on but lips donu2019t absorb the product at all and it comes off very easily so you have to constantly reapply.. I honestly feel like Vaseline helps my lips more than this chapstick. Iu2019m giving 2 stars for the nice taste, smell and feeling of the chapstick. But it seriously is not worth buying. Maybe if it were cheaper than I would recommend. This is my first time trying it and will not purchase ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good and feels good on my lips. However, I havenu2019t noticed my lips looking any plumper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: lasts for hours!! i put this on every night before i sleep and i wake up with a bit of the moisture from it still on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and have been using it quite extensively for the last week or so. First of all, its a soft product so it already broke off in the tube (buyer beware). The packaging does feel nice, it seems like its metal. My lips have dried out since using this and I feel like it emphasized the lines in my lips rather than smoothing them. I gave it three stars because it smells nice (like lemon) and feels great for the first 30 minutes after you put it on, it just needs to be reapplied VERY often. Honestly not worth the price, I think you'd be better off buying the laneige lip mask (which I love) if you wanted something luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This winter really messed up my lips. Cracks and chapped lips galore. Have tried many other chapsticks in the past but nothing worked for me. So far I've had this for about a week and notice a major difference. My lips are peeling the dead skin and can see new healthy layers forming. Feels hydrating hours after I applied. Hopefully in about a month, I will have healthy lips again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it feels great and smells great, but it isn't moisturizing. I can wear it all day and my lips still crack

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only stuff Iu2019ll put on my lips. LOVE all of the Sugar lip line!! My normally dry and cracked lips are very happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite lip balms to treat myself with, great moisturizarion and scent but itu2019s pretty costly when there are so many cheaper alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are plumped, smooth, and silky when using this product, and that is saying a lot for someone with chronic chapped lips. Yes, I do reapply it several times, night and day. To me, that plumped, smooth, not chapped lip look is worth it. I absolutely LOVE this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased on a whim because it was the winter and my lips were in dire need of moisturizing! I have to reapply as much as a regular chapstick and it doesn't penetrate deep into my lips - therefore, not very satisfied with the moisturizing capabilities this lip balm has to offer. For the price, I'm a bit upset that I'm half way done with it after only 2-3 weeks (I mean for the price, you know?). No long lasting effect either after daily use because my lips are splitting now a bit due to dryness.  The pros: I imagine that if you have already moist lips, this would be great for you if you want that nice satin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing and feels great on. Feels like it comes off after 20 mins and there's no protective barrier to lock in moisture. I  would prob use this and then put the Kosas one after it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really soft, and moisturizing on my lips! Just bought a few weeks ago for the first time, and I already have to get another! Great product, would also recommend the Fresh wonder drops to go with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Helps to moisturize lips and mine get very dry and chapped in the winter. Use it at night as part of the nighttime skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh, it goes on with the texture similar of the vaseline chapstick and keeps lips hydrated for maybe 30 minutes before having to reapply. My lips are usually plump and need little hydration but this product left my lips feeling like the dry desert. Will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Nothing Special! Not Worth the Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s nothing special. I did not find a difference between this and what I normally use (Rocky Mountain Soap Company lip balm). Based on the price difference I was expecting more from this product. It is still a nice lip balm and leaves my lip soft and hydrated. I did find it does not have a flavour or smell to it which I very much appreciated! Overall, based on the price and how it performs compared to cheaper options, it is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My cracks are gone after one week of use. I use it every night before going to sleep, didnu2019t feel greasy at all. Recommend this product :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice. Exactly what I needed. Simple, smells nice and works.

This is the only lip product that leaves my lips feeling soft and  hydrated. Iu2019ve tried everything from many different brands and this is the only thing that can make my usually dehydrated cracked lips feel amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm. It makes your lips so soft and smooth. It gets rid of any cracks or dryness and is great to put on before lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t notice a huge difference between this and drugstore Burtu2019s Bees. I think for this price, I expected a little more from this brand. Iu2019ve never had a horrible experience with any of their products, and I donu2019t think this product is bad, perse, but $30 seems steep for the same results as a drugstore lip balm. Honestly, Iu2019m honestly disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does absolutely nothing for my lips. Half an hour later and it feels like I havenu2019t used anything at all. There are way better lip balms out there for a fraction of the cost (Aquaphor is a great one).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glorified u201cSoftLipsu201d, which also is junk.  Better off with Burts.  It tastes nice and feels soft, for about 2 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many, many chapsticks that have left my lips feeling inadequately moisturized. But this one changed everything, I found myself have to apply less throughout the day and my lips looked and felt so hydrated and soft. This has a gentle scent and everything about it was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is magic in a tube!  Goes on silky and lasts aa long time.  very thoughtful tube design. Screws shut so lid stay on in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this stuff! smells so good and feels really good on my skin. hasn't given me any issues with clogging pores and really makes my lips feel conditioned, soft, and great for putting on my before bed. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lifesaver! I get really dry lips during the winter and this is one of my favorite. It doesnu2019t have any weird taste or smell. It makes my lips feels soft and hydrated. I like that itu2019s also not in a pot so itu2019s not messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The effect of using this for weeks has been positive. My lips stayed moisturize longer. I also like how there is no residue after being on for so long.   I use many types of lip balms through out the day ( people like to gift them to me) but I see myself swiping my lips with this more.   The only reason this got a 4 was because compared to the cheaper ones I use, this always melts slightly.Iu2019m using itu2019s because itu2019s not produced in a traditional lip balm container. I think changing the packaging would help the consumer more. Maybe even be cheaper for fresh.   For this to lesson the form from becoming tipsy looking, itu2019s best not to swipe and to dab your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this lip balm moisturizes my lips, but it broke almost immediately after I bought it. I actually took extra care to be gentle with it and not twist it up too high, because I had the same issue with the trial mini a long time ago, but had hoped it was just due to the small size of the mini, because I loved the product itself. Unfortunately, I bought the full size four days ago, and it has already snapped at the very base. I am kind of bothered by it, considering I had debated splurging for the expensive price of $34 for a lip balm for the longest time, and now it has broken after just four days of light use. It still works really well, but now I have to be EXTREMELY (as in even more than I was already being) careful, which is an annoyance I feel should not exist considering the amount of money spent on the product, but has been consistent with two different sizes of this product I have received.

reviews.review_title: Great sheer color and so moisturizing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many lip balms and tinted balms in my life and I have to be honest this one is the best I have tried so far. The pink is pretty and sheer but you can see it well on my pale lips and it gives a fresh natural color. The balm itself feels so nice and moisturizing on the lips like the translucent one! The smell is subtle but good and it doesn't have any taste to it which I hate. It's better than the other tinted balms from fresh! It's pricey but big and totally perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Extraordinary product.  Masks are wreaking havoc with my lips, but this seems to have brought them back from the brink.  I am very pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS LIP BALM! This is the 4th time Iu2019ve bought this lip balm. It makes my lips feel so soft.  You need to buy this lip balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this lip balm.  My poor 52 year old lips needed a change from other chaptsticks I have been using for years.  This improved the skin of my lips noticeably!  My lip color had gotten so pale and this brought back a lot of my natural lip color!  I love it, but I hate it is so expensive!  It won't stop me from buying more when I need it, thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This doesnu2019t stay on long and doesnu2019t make my lips feel any different. Complete waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute perfection, best chapstick I have ever used.  Keeps lips moistruized for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chile Iu2019m on accutane and this is better than aquaphor to me. I took a 2 hour nap just now and I woke up with my lips still moisturized and not cracked in the corners like they usually are since Iu2019ve been on accutane. The only problem with this is the price...worth it for me though. I wish they sold the smaller one that comes in the set so I can have multiples around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best chapstick on the market makes your lips look just as good as they feel!:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I keep one in my purse, on my coffee table, in my desk at work--everywhere. Even my husband uses it and talks about how good it is. Can't recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip therapy I have ever used.  Love all the colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive but 100% worth it. I even made the mistake of getting my bf hooked on the stuff. Now I just have it in every colour since he won't steal the tinted ones. I find just a quick swipe on either the top or bottom lip is more than enough to moisturize properly and makes a tube last longer too. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only lip balm that helps heal my chapped lips and I have tried everything including Vaseline!! This works better and faster than Vaseline!

reviews.review_title: honestly this is the best lip balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is life changing. Goes on smooth and is never sticky. Doesnu2019t have an overpowering scent or flavor (maybe lightly lemony). I put it on before bed and wake up with perfectly moisturized lips even in the dry winter air. I like that it has no color or sunblock so I can wear it to bed or when Iu2019m kicking around the house. I buy their spf ones for daytime!

reviews.review_title: Holy grail of lip balms! Worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it wonu2019t be without it!! No more chapped lips, much more emollient than other lip balms!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best lip balms out there. It's a classic. Super nice smelling and moisturizing, and also a great base for lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, I am always outside in the wind with my husky mix and my lips just get torn up. I discovered the one in the flat container a couple years ago after my lips would not recover from a couple of bungee jumps on a super windy day in a really sandy climate, and it worked magic. I've since also fallen in love with the normal chapstick dispenser version here, and fresh is the only thing I will use on my lips in the winter now. I've used everything from Vaseline lip brand to expensive chapstick brands and this is the only thing that consistently works on my chapped lips. All the other ones feel like something that make it worse so that you have to keep using them. This one actually heals your lips so you don't have to use it as much. I only have to apply it once in the morning and maybe once later in the day, unlike others where I am constantly putting them on every minute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip balm, moisturizes so well, and lasts for a long time. The scent is a little strong, but I only notice it when applying. 1 star off for the price. I got the smaller version in a set. I just canu2019t get myself to purchase the full size for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always suffered from extremely dry, chapped lips. Iu2019ve tried dozens of lip balms and hardly any of them helped moisturize my lips for more than a few minutes. But this one by fresh keeps my dry lips from cracking and peeling for hours at a time. I hardly have to reapply. My lips are smoother and way more comfortable when I use this lip balm. Highly recommend for anyone with dry lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I have horribly chapped lips - this works well, not greasy, leaves lips soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping to love this product after reading reviews here and from my friends.  It lathers on thick and dries up faster than I would like, so I have to keep reapplying.  Also, don't leave it in your bag as any warmer temp will cause it to melt.  With that price, it wasn't worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My lips during 2020 have been a nightmare at best. Iu2019ve tried all different kinds of lip balms at the drug store, and NOTHING was helping my lips. They are so dry and crusty, so I bought a deluxe sample size of this lip balm. It instantly soothed my aching lips, and after a few days, I really noticed a difference in my lips! I bought a full size after a weeks use it made such a difference. This really helps my lips not get totally dried out from wearing a mask all the time.  Iu2019ve been recommended this to everyone I know! Itu2019s worth the price, and I canu2019t believe I ignored the hype of this product for so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this because I've heard nothing but good things but I think this is the worst lip balm I've ever used. My lips aren't typically very dry but every time I use this, my lips are cracked and unbelievably dry. I've been trying this for 3 months now just to see if the dryness was a weird fluke but no, my lips are severely dry after every time. I wonder if they changed the formula or something but I definitely would never buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could only buy one things from Sephora for the rest of my life it would be this!! Its definitely pricey for lip balm but 1000% worth it!! My lips stay soft all day! I love to put it on at night after my skin routine and in the morning my lips are SO SOFT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels almost waxy when applied (which I hate) but thereu2019s enough moisturizing effects that donu2019t dry out the lips. Pleasantly surprised.   The tint is soft and subtle and pretty, and definitely not as bright as it visibly seems. Havenu2019t used their other lip balms or lip products so I canu2019t compare with their other lip balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Sugar Advanced lip balm does the job, and it  applies smoothly with a thin layer of light oil coverage. It's great for when you want a quick hit lip moisture before putting on your mask. The only thing I find annoying is the cover has to be twisted on and off, which is why I don't use this outside the house. It's too many steps take if you're looking for a quick touch-up after lowering your mask, but it means the balm is solidly protected from the atmosphere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It ok and itu2019s definitely not worth the price. I have full lips and I donu2019t feel this product is better than Vaseline.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very luxurious but not greasy. Addictive but in a great way! Will buy again and will try the color next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: excellent product - will purchase again and again - v moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this lip balm, keeps my lips moisturized especially during the winter. I also love the aesthetic of the tube, plus it has lasted me quite a while. Minus 1 star for price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really, really like this stuff. Iu2019m currently on my second round of accutane (which dries my lips out in an insane way) and this stuff has been better than anything else Iu2019ve tried (laneige, Vaseline, aquaphor, ou2019keefu2019s, etc.) However... as expensive as this stuff is, Iu2019d like it to last longer than two weeks. Iu2019ve used it consistently during the day for the past two weeks and Iu2019m almost out. Itu2019s also very soft so itu2019s broken three times. Iu2019ve had to put it in the refrigerator overnight to solidify it temporarily and itu2019s already broken again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soft citrusy scent smells just like the the adv. therapy nourishing lip balm which was 100x better in my opinion. This one feels like an oilier version of that. The balm was very matte and does not transfer but this does

reviews.review_title: If you have severely chapped lips you need this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had severely chapped lips and I have tried countless lip balms and treatments while a few are ok and work u201cwell enoughu201d this lip balm is the only one that has not only worked to soothe my chapped lips but I also donu2019t have to reapply constantly. It smells nice and doesnu2019t feel sticky or oily. If you suffer from severely chapped and/or cracked lips you need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favorite lip treatment. I have very dry lips and this the only thing that has smoothed them over. It lasts a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had issues with dry and chapped lips. Iu2019ve tried numerous lip balms on the market and they either donu2019t hydrate my lips enough, makes me breakout around my lip or cracks them even more. This is the only chapstick that Iu2019ve found that actually  helps my lips from cracking and hydrates them for a long period of time without reapplying all the time. This lip balm even helped me while I wason  accutane and my lips weu2019re horribly dry from the treatment. Doesnu2019tmake me break out either! This is the only chapstick I agree to use. The only reason I took a star off my review is because this lip balm doesnu2019t last very long for the price of it. It lasts me about a month of everyday use and then itu2019s completely empty. So 34$ every month for a lip balm can get pricey if on a budget. Thatu2019s the only downside but itu2019s totally worth it because it actually helps dry lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100% worth the price!! Lots of chapsticks dry down super fast and end up leaving your lips chapped more. This is super hydrating and doesnu2019t dry down so it leaves your lips super soft. I had patches of peeling skin for a while and nothing seemed to help until I used this! Will never use another chapstick again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

The smell is nice and it goes on smooth, but again it's just an expensive lip balm and I have bought drug store brands that I would buy over this.

reviews.review_text: For me this product was just all right I donu2019t think itu2019s as good as everyone made it out to me

reviews.review_text: this lip balm smells great and feels so smooth and wonderful. it lasts for a long time, and is the first balm i used all the way to the end without either losing it or just simply losing interest in using it. the reason i gave it four stars instead of five is that i have used other products that seemed to actually have a better long-term effect on my chapped lips than this one. i would still recommend this to anyone who wants a great chapstick or one with a tint of color without looking like lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for over 10 years. Itu2019s the best lip balm out there. Itu2019s obviously kinda expensive for lip balm but each tube usually lasts me 4-6 months. Only one Iu2019ve ever tried that really hydrates my lips and absorbs rather than sitting on the top. Itu2019s not greasy or sticky and one swipe before bed keeps my lips hydrated into the next day. Everyone need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate when companies charge ridiculous prices for lip balm. But the fact of the matter is, this product was actually really hydrating, smooth, long lasting, and did exactly what it said it'd do! It has a subdued fragrance which I don't mind and no colour. I use this as a base for lipsticks that usually dry out my lips and I use this just for every day use.  A lot of the times I'll splurge and buy myself an expensive lip balm and then hate myself for it because it won't be worth it and I could've just used vasaline or something but this one was REALLY GOOD.   I just can't give it full 5 stars cause of the price point. There are other more high end lip balms in the market priced at $15-17, and I've purchased those ones before, and they actually didn't work well for me. TBH since the results really surprised me (positively) I actually wouldn't mind splurging again for this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a go-to for me, especially in the winter. I apply it once at night before bed and wake up with soft lips. I love this balm and would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best natural lip balm I have tried! My lips are constantly dry and cracking. Most natural lip balms do not moisturize my lips and makes them more dry. This balm is perfect and I love the tint that it has!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this lip balm was just like all the rest.  My lips recently got really dry, chapped and cracky from the winter.  My lips got sore from biting so I used this before bed and woke in the morning with completely healed lips.  Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years, probably 7 years now.  My lips would go through weird phases with weather changes. At times they would peel and be flakey and Iu2019ve even had to battle Chelitis.  When I started using this product is transformed my lips. Always hydrated and smooth. I love the smell and texture. Itu2019s not sticky or weird like some drug store chapsticks.  I go through about one a month because I use it multiple times a day. I find if I go without it my lips instantly start to dry, peel and crack.  The only down side is itu2019s expensive.  An upside- collect your used tubes and when you have four or more, use a knife to peel out the remainder from the bottom, stick it in an empty tube and it will create an entire other tube. There is much left even though it seems empty.   Highly recommend. But Iu2019ve never tried the colored ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip balm so far! Iu2019ve gone through all the drugstore brands, all of which just sit on top of my dry chapped lips and not really soak in. I first came across this lip balm in a value set and I really liked it so I purchased the full size. I like that my lips feel hydrated immediately. Iu2019ve already gone through 3 of them! Couldnu2019t give it 5 stars since it doesnu2019t seem to last as long as I would like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I normally have very very dry lips. So dry that itu2019s not uncommon for them to start bleeding while Iu2019m asleep. So far this is THE BEST lip balm I have tried. My lips feel hydrated when I use it regularly and it speeds up the healing process when my lips are cracked.  It is expensive. This is not a lip balm I carry with me. I usually use it before I go to bed, and occasionally in the morning, when my lips are super dry. For me, itu2019s worth it. My lips feel almost instantly hydrated, and the difference is very noticeable.

This is pretty moisturizing, though probably not intensive enough for very dry, chapped lips. I love the smell and the balm absorbs pretty easily. Only reason I donu2019t give this five stars is because I feel like itu2019s kind of expensive for the product that you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so luxurious to use. Smells great and makes my lips feel so amazing. I didn't give it five stars because I'm not sure if for how much it costs there is enough product. But I'm pretty happy with the product itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From someone who is well versed in skincare, I'm really impressed by this lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m normally not a fan of high priced lipbalm but this one, is the one that made the exception! Scent is divine, reminds me a bit of lime pie. Itu2019s subtle and yet highly hydrating. Feels so soft on the lips too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to lip balm. Would not use any other. So moisturizing and makes my lips so soft. It is part of my nightly routine, I use it at bedtime and sleep with this lip balm on and my lips are so hydrated in the morning. Definitely a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this lip balm all the time. Atleast 3 times a day. It feels so smooth and hydrating. I never have chapped lips and I feel like this keeps my lips looking youthful. I have used 2 lipsticks already, Iu2019m going to be buying my third one. I use this in the morning and before bed. Throughout the day too. I just love it. Iu2019ll never be without it. My lips are never chapped in between the balm wearing off my lips, unlike other normal lip balms where it feels like you need to use it constantly. This helps your skin and is clean beauty. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot give this product enough stars, I honestly LOVE this lip balm. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Canu2019t go anywhere without this! Not too heavy but gives me the moisture I crave!   Have not used during winter weather yet, but will write an updated review after.

reviews.review_title: Pink is just as great as clear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The clear Advanced Therapy has been my favorite, and most repurchased, lip balm for a few years but I finally decided to try the pink one and I love it just as much.  The Advanced Therapy formula is thin and melts into the lips but is extremely hydrating and nourishing. Winter here in NYC can be very cold and windy but I haven't dealt with chapping, dryness or flaking since I started using this balm.  It's perfect under masks and I have one stashed in multiple places so I'm never without it.  The pink shade is almost nonexistent and although it can be built up slightly, I don't see much of a difference between it and the clear. This is one of my most recommended products.   **Fresh's Tinted balms have a different, and inconsistent, formula that varies depending on color so I recommend the Advanced Therapy line for healing and the Tinted line for color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely ever write reviews, but I had to for this product. Even though itu2019s deeply moisturizing, itu2019s still very light feeling and not goopy at all. Iu2019ve also noticed that this balm has made my lips look fuller and has smoothed some of the lines on my lips. Wonderful lip balm all around.

reviews.review_title: the best chapstick Iu2019ve ever used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is a serious indulgence on my scale. I can feel my Scottish forebears rolling in their parsimonious graves at the very thought of a nearly $30 chapstick :) Still, I'm a big fan of the Fresh line, and I really do love this smooth, rich ... well ... chapstick! I do think that the formula sinks into the skin a bit better than alternatives, and I find the fragrance/taste less jarring even than a good old, straightforward CVS Nivea stick. But, the price tag and the fact that this is still really just a lip balm -- not the end to any major world problem -- does put it into the category of a special treat when you're feeling fancy, rather than a gotta have one in my bag at all times. Also, it has a tendency to melt pretty quickly in 85-90 degree summer temps. So, if you also live without AC, you might want to keep your $30 chapstick in the fridge (as I do) during heat waves.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND

reviews.review_text: I splurged on this lip balm, as my lips were insanely chapped. I was desperate for a miracle product, and seeing this item's $26 price tag, I expected to see decent results at the very least. This turned out to be a huge mistake on my part. My opinions were formed after using the product regularly for about 3 weeks.   The container feels substantial, but the product itself does not deliver results that warrant the hefty price. In the past, I have used ChapStick Total Hydration (which sells for around $3), and this $26 luxury item is somehow the weaker option of the two. I do not feel that the product is long-lasting, as I constantly had to reapply it to see any true effect. At some points, I even felt that my lips were in worse condition after the balm had naturally faded over the span of a few hours. There are many skincare products that I find to be worth their markup, but this is certainly not one of them.

Thank you Fresh for saving my lips during the winter :)

reviews.review_text: Absolutely recommend this product! I got this as a sample with one of my orders and I loved it. I had my boyfriend try and He loves it as well. He said itu2019s one of the best. Now itu2019s the only one I restock on because itu2019s our favorite. It has the lip super hydrated for a long time and after it settles in, your lips will still feel healthy and moisturized. A little of this product goes a long way.

reviews.review_text: Not only does this lip balm taste horrible, there is nothing advanced about the way it makes your lips feel. Except perhaps advanced dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This a review done after I have finished the full product. I just dug out the very last out of my tube, and I'm buying another. I've been using it for a few months. It is the absolute best lip balm treatment money can buy. Second to none.   I'll start off my saying, I had extremely dry, cracked lips issues for years. It has always been embarrassing, even keeping them hydrated, drinking plenty of water, lip scrub then moisturize..nothing actually consistently helped. I tried top shelf luxury lip balms *cough cough Emile Cordon....cough* and they were nice to use, but never saw dramatic help with my problem.  I bought this Sugar Treatment finally, since I've heard a lot of good things about it. First swipe on my lips..the smoothness, the absolute buttery, beautiful feel of this stuff. I was wowed, immediately. No lip product has ever done that for me. This stays on your lips for a good while before you feel the need to reapply as well. Not sticky whatsoever. Its just wonderful...worth every penny and more, I cannot be without it!!
Best lip balm I have ever used. It keeps my lips hydrated for really long time. Also itu2019s a very pretty shade, gives a natural pink tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but the formula doesnu2019t last long and honestly left my lips feeling more chapped than before. I bought this in a gift set with some other Fresh products so the lip treatment was smaller than normal, but despite that itu2019s only lasted me 2 weeks and Iu2019m almost out. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Easy breezy... cute everyday colour to suit most
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like makeup thatu2019s easy, leans towards natural looking more than u201cmade up,u201d and definitely versatile so Iu2019m not constructing a makeup look everyday. This fits the bill. The colour leans Spring/Summer but is definitely great year u2018round. Itu2019s a bit moisturizing, but I usually apply something else first if my lips need real moistureu2014the pigment can look uneven on chapped lips. The only downside is that it doesnu2019t last but I wouldnu2019t expect something like this to do so. If I did want to use it in a look that lasted Iu2019d probably exfoliate with a q-tip and balm, apply a light lip stain and this over top. Iu2019d still need to reapply but it would be more of a look and wouldnu2019t seem like it was wearing off between applications as much because of the stain, in theory. As it is I put it when Iu2019ll first be arriving somewhere then sometimes I reapply if I think of it. Easy.
