reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear it to bed and wake up to dreamy soft lips. I've tried using it during the day but I have to talk a lot for my job so I don't get the same lovely benefit from using it overnight. I think that's why people are saying it's just expensive Chapstick; with all the talking, drinking, and eating you lose the soft dreamy feeling.  I highly suggest using it as your nighttime lip treatment instead. Totally worth the softness in the morning. Or use it at the end of your cold (don't get your cold germs in it ick!) to recondition your lips.

My purchase at Sephora a few weeks ago I noticed a change in this product it's definitely not as thick and creamy doesn't stay on very long.  It reminds me of Chapstick. I'm so disappointed It's obvious that the formula has been changed and not for the better. As for me I won't be purchasing this again. Looking for a replacement .

And no SPF in this. Perhaps a lip mask may be better for me for night u2013 and some sunscreen during the day? Iu2019ll use this up though, as itu2019s a nice enough product.

reviews.review_text: So I've only ever gotten this product through the pack with the Fresh soy cleanser and I've bought this pack twice now. The first time, the chapstick got really mushy and then eventually broke in half after a few uses. I thought that maybe this would be a one time thing so I didn't think anything of it. However, I got the package again and tried the chapstick one more time. The exact same thing happened again after a few uses. For the price of this product, I would expect it to last until it runs out, not constantly break apart. It also doesn't have long-lasting effects. I felt like I had to put it on constantly. My lips are pretty dry sometimes so that may have been why but I felt like I had to put it on more often than my other chapsticks.

The Janiero one is so nice and thick/moisturizing, but Iu2019ve had extreme dry lips where I felt that brand sat on top of the skin vs this one penetrated right away!   I had had gotten the mini version in the holiday kit, and lost it somehow already and went back to get the full size!

The other negative is that once it falls off, thereu2019s still a ton of product that is left over but inaccessible unless you dig out with your pinky finger or a q-tip, which is kinda gross.  Great product but minus one star for durability/packaging

I can use this without having to constantly apply more throughout the day. 1-2 applications of this can last the majority of the day! It keeps my lips feeling hydrated and smooth! only thing I suggest is keeping it in the fridge or in room temp/cool area, because if it gets too warm it starts to melt and lose it's shape. All-in-all I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_text: This is a bit on the pricey side for a chapstick, specially if youu2019re constantly misplacing them (which I canu2019t relate to now lol). It is really hydrating and instantly makes your lips look hydrated and plump. At first, I didnu2019t really care for it and regretted buying it bc I didnu2019t feel my lips hydrated until I would look in a mirror and see how hydrated and good they looked. It doesnu2019t have a smell and it lasted me a pretty good amount of time. I would say like a month or maybe even two (and I apply it daily- I just use several). I do think itu2019s worth a try and more than just the typical chapstick. Plus, the packaging is so sturdy. Itu2019s a bit on the heavy side as itu2019s not made of plastic. If you could spare the money, why not! Itu2019s worth a try!

reviews.review_title: Expensive, but perfect for chapped/irritated lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to swear by Burt's Bees chapstick - I would never leave my apartment without one and applied it multiple times a day. Unfortunately I recently developed an allergic reaction to that chapstick and had to stop using it. My lips were puffy, chapped, and very irritated from the Burt's Bees chapstick, but then I used this Fresh Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment as a replacement for Vaseline and my lips healed within 3 days - not exaggerating at all.   I've continued to use this as a chapstick replacement and it's fantastic. I actually only need to use it 2-3 times a day and that is enough for my lips to feel moisturized. It is expensive, but if you've been burned by crappy chapsticks/lip moisturizers then this is worth it. Because it's so effective at moisturizing for long periods of time it lasts me a long time too (about 1.5-2 months/stick).

I feel like this actually dries out my lips--I find myself needing to exfoliate often after using, in turn drying out my lips even more.  The slight tint is nice. The pros don't outweigh the cons for me though. I'll stick with my go-to lip treatments.

I do not have dry skin or dry lips, except during the winter, but I like to add this lip balm to my lips overnight to keep them fuller and more moisturized when I wake up. When I'm going for a natural makeup look, I sometimes switch out my lipgloss for this, too, since it has a nice shine to it. The smell is AMAZING and it always makes me feel fresh and pretty. At the end of the day, I probably would hesitate to buy the full-sized version only because of the price. The product is genuinely amazing, and I would love to repurchase it again and again if there was a cheaper alternative.

reviews.review_text: I got it as a gift and thought you know, i'd never actually buy it for myself. $26 for a lip balm is just... not in my budget. So i got in in Oct 2018 and just finished it Mar 2019. So first of all, lasted for a solid 6 months. I would have spent a lot more on cheaper stuff that i'd keep losing. but since it costed $26 i cherished it like a small child. and also, because it's frickin amazing. it tastes and smells amazing. it moisturizes my lips for so long and i don't have to reapply too much throughout the day. It really is healing too, in the winter and being sick lately my lips are so dry and peeling and this really brings them back to life. I'm just obsessed. So worth it. Much more valuable than buying a ton of cheaper chapsticks that i'd end up losing. Very smooth going on. I really love it.

At first, I thought the color would be too pale, but its gorgeous and gives me just enough coverage to hide my bite scars (I anxiously bite layers of dry skin off my lips, and that has caused severe dryness and discoloration). I've used lots of lip balms, and this one's the priciest, but it's so worth it. A little goes a long way and the packaging it quality, the zip tube assures that it doesn't uncap in your purse and get balm everywhere. I give it four stars instead of 5 simply do to the fact of price and quantity. I would love more balm for my buck.

reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this in the Crush Worthy kit (BTW that is a must get),  Before this Treatment stick I did not like Fresh lip products at all. I have very, very dry, cracked, patchy lips so I am used to applying product every few hours.  I think people with more normal lips will find this lasts many hours.  I will be buying this on a regular basis (my wallet says another one really).  I have used and loved much more expensive treatment sticks than this so to me this is a price saving.

reviews.review_title: I wish more chapsticks used this lid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: TL;DR LOVE THIS!! The lid is the best part and it goes on super smoothly! Flavor is meh   so first off, again, the lid is the best part. I carry my chapstick around in my pocket a lot of the time, with doing this a lot of chapsticks will come open and get everywhere. My dog also loves eating chapstick and she can't just pop the lid off with this. The lid is a twist on so it doesn't just come off on accident. It is also incased in what I'm assuming is a metal tin instead of the normal plastic, I'm not sure if this will make it melt faster in the summers. Currently though, it gives the product a nice chill  that feels great when being put on.  My only gripes is that the flavor is... Weird? It's not bad but its definitely not good either. The other thing is that it can kinda make my lips feel weird, like they do when you're using a light lip plumping gloss. But I haven't noticed any problems from using it.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love fresh and all the products by fresh. I like the lip balm but for me it's not a must have. I am just trying different lip balms. The reason why this lip balm receives 4 stars is because of the price. I feel as though the price isn't in correlation with the product performance. I mean the packaging is niceand sturdy. For my lips, I felt like the lip balm sat on top of my lips as opposed to penetrating.  The pros of this product is that is last a while so within a 24 hr period  [on a windy cold winter day] I only needed to reapply once. It doesn't have a scent which is another pro. I have tried farmacy honey bees wax lip balm and I get a similar result for half the price and a deeper penetration.  This product is not a complete disappointment but Its not my fave. On the other hand,  I am obsessed with the fresh lip scrub and the fresh lip serum and I feel as though those products are a must have.

reviews.review_text: This is THE BOMB BALM!  It repairs dry or chapped lips so quickly, and if you use it nightly (as I do), it prevents them. I also appreciate the fact that all of the Fresh Sugar balms have a screw-in top. You can tuck it in a pocket and not worry about the cap falling off or it getting lint on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I read previous reviews about the citrus smell being overpowering and/or irritating, so I was fairly skeptical that this formula would work for my highly sensitive skin.   While the scent is very strong after the initial application, it fades quickly. Iu2019ve applied it before eating and it also doesnu2019t leave a funny taste behind or alter my food in any way!  Also, a huge bonus is the packaging. If youu2019ve ever had the top come off of your lip treatment in your pocket/purse/backpack/etc., youu2019ll understand why the screw-on base is so great.   I will say that the formula is very thick (which I love) and buttery, so apply softly - a little goes a long way.   I definitely plan to repurchase in the future!

reviews.review_title: Pricey but amazing moisturizer and hint of colour
reviews.review_text: I have 100  lip glosses and balms but I have to say that I really like this one.  It's pricey but works well - it glides on my lips so smoothly, is moisturizing and adds a sheer, natural pink to my lips.  I live in a cold climate so it's a great product to have in the winter and looks so natural.

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing lip balm. I have already gone through two of these. If I have a crack on my lip, it will be gone in days with this. I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS PRODUCT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a total lip balm junkie, I've tried them all. I thought I was a little crazy to spend so much on one product, but this stuff blows everything else out of the water. It glides on smooth, and lasts for quite a long time. I find I don't need to apply it nearly as often as the drug store brands, so I'm hoping that makes it last longer. It's keeping my lips soft and smooth this winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this one because of Jungkook of BTS and even though it's kind of expensive... it works really good, especially on winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have tried so many balms and chapsticks over the years and nothing has come close. Perfect combination of comforting moisture, hydration, anti- aging, natural plumbing. Have been through several tubes of this and about to buy another! Glides in smooth so you donu2019t feel like youu2019re adding more lines to your face just to get the stuff on like other products. I have a small handful of lifetime staples and this is one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think it does the job, but does it scrape off the side of the container and bend like mine does?  Maybe it works so well, because it totally does not have fillers to make it stiff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointing. With a label of u201cadvanced therapy lip treatmentu201d you would think my lips would be so nourished! It actually felt like it was drying out my lips and it comes off so easily, Iu2019m constantly reapplying. Will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh's Sugar Lip Treatment is a balm I trust. I have this weird sensitivity to beeswax. After some research, I learned that it's not the wax but the propolis (bee glue) that gets mixed with the wax. Some lipbalm would cause contact dermatitis on my lips and some don't. For some reason, Fresh's products doesn't break me out!   I've learned that pure beeswax doesn't show any allergic reaction in people because all propolis is removed. But when there are some that remains within the was mix, it can cause contact dermatitis. Which allows me to beleive that Fresh uses top notch beeswax in their ingredient when making their lip treatments.  So if YOU get a reaction to some lipbalm... trust that this one doesn't! (and it sucks to have to fork out this much for a lipbalm but when youa re sensitive to some but not this, you kinda have to stick with it)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve had dry, cracked, peeling lips for weeks after getting sick around the winter holidays. i tried all the cheaper lip balms that are my usual go-tou2019s and nothing was fixing the problem! i had had a sample size of this years ago that saved me from particularly chapped lips while working in dry las vegas for a couple weeks. so i went back to sephora and bought one of these and three days later my lips are pretty much back to normal!!! so happy! iu2019d also like to add that a girl at the store suggested that when i wash and use toner on my face i also do the same on my lips and  then use this product as my moisturizer after. it really saved my lips!

reviews.review_title: Feels amazing but not long lasting :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon initial application this is so soft and buttery. I loved the way it felt. 2 things I didnu2019t like.. itu2019s not long lasting at all.. I would need to reapply within an hour. And it comes off a bit ashy on my deep skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in the Give Me Some Shine Lip Kit..and it honestly didnu2019t do it for me. It goes on smooth, and I love the smell..but it just doesnu2019t last nor make my lips any smoother. It wears off, and I can still feel my lips are dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite lip balm. It is so hydrating and unlike drugstore lip balms it doesn't make your lips peel or more dry later. Applying it gives you immediate moister to the lips and a nice tint of color. I literally use this every single day, I used up an entire tube which is a first for me and I bought a second tube because I love it so much. The price seems quite high for just a lip balm but I think it's totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first thought when I saw this was who spends over $30 on a lip balm? Then as I added it to my cart, I realized I spend $30 on a lip balm, and what a great purchase that turned out to be.   This stuff gets me through Canadian winters without a dry lip in sight. I only use it once or twice a day and my lips feel so soft and healthy all the time because of it.   It also smells AMAZING.   You won't regret this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a mini version of this product and I plan on buying the full size when it runs out!! Itu2019s THAT good! I had really chapped lips and I only needed to apply it once to see a HUGE difference! Holy grail for sure!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely bad eczema that frequently flares up on my upper lip and the space between my lip and my nose. When I get a flare up they can last for months, but i got a sample of this and it cleared it in three days. I bought a full size and my eczema flare ups are gone so quickly. It's absolutely incredible. I use it once in the morning and once at night and it does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm ever. I get really dry cracked lips especially in the winter and this stuff saves my lips! Definitely worth the money. On my second lip balm! Love love love

reviews.review_text: I had very dry lips during acne treatment and this was a blessing! Kept my lips hydrated for hours!

reviews.review_title: Odd taste and less moisturizing than chapstick

reviews.review_text: I got this from Sephora as a deluxe sample and I would have been pretty unhappy if I actually paid for a full size item. On the plus side no allergic reaction and I do have sensitive skin. It glides on very smoothly and the term sheer is accurate as I didnt really notice any color on my lips. That being said there was something very unpleasant about the taste and despite giving the product a decent try over a few days I found that it really did make my lips feel drier than before I applied. I own two lip masks in the $20-$25 range that are incredibly moisturizing with no unpleasant taste issues so I have no problem splurging on a lip product when it's worthwhile. To me this just isn't one of those products.

reviews.review_text: Eh, not impressed. I love a good lip balm but this is nothing noteworthy. It wore off quickly and didnu2019t keep my lips hydrated. Iu2019ve used another Fresh balm with SPF and felt the same way. I donu2019t know how they justify $26..

reviews.review_title: The only lip balm you'll ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not one to write reviews. However, I have to preach the gospel of Fresh lip balm. I have dry, chapped lips, especially in the winter. Most lip balms just sit on top of my lips and don't really heal them. I didn't want to fall in love with a $26 lip balm, however I am all in. One application at night and I wake up with soft lips ready for lipstick.  Even throughout the day, I apply this and within 10 minutes I notice a huge difference. I absolutely love this product and am never looking back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this. I am obsessed with lipsticks and different lip products. it definitely did not disappoint

reviews.review_text: This product is a mess. Now I don't know if there's a difference between the sample sizing and the regular, but if there isn't, I'd advise strongly against it. The wax is the thinnest stick! Any slight heat makes it melt and it's a huge, huge mess. Mine broke off already and the packaging has this stuff all over it. Does it moisturize? reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! I use this all day and all night (quite literally). In one month of use it has completely cured my winter-cracked and dry lips. Itu2019s worth the cost to get one of these rather than multiple tubes of drugstore lip balms. This is so thick and creamy and hydrating you hardly need to use any product at all. This will last a very long time. I am absolutely in love and cannot imagine going back to any other product.

reviews.review_title: A *holy grail* hydrator with staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A holy grail lip balm for this very picky lip product person! Iu2019m always on the lookout for a great balm to moisturize my lips, with a great texture and substantial staying power. With several decades of numerous sampling and purchases throughout different countries, Iu2019d say Freshu2019s advanced therapy lip balm is one of the top three, and my favorite of late. The texture is smooth and pleasing; it is substantial without being heavy or sticky, and it has a decent staying poweru2014 much better than most. The balm ingredients are hydrating and protective of the lips, with a mild citrus scent and a hint of sweetness. Truly provides a luscious, effective and pleasurable lip experience. Be careful in hot climates (esp cars) as this can melt. And tip: thereu2019s quite a bit of product left below the base of the container. I get a sample-sized container and narrow tool to scoop out the remainder to use (see photos below). Worth the hefty price tag, esp during VIB sales.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works magic. I've tried so many lip balms, and only this one has saved my lips. I felt instant improvement the first time I applied this one, just like what I felt when using other products. The big difference is that sometimes I stop using it for several days, my lips are still in perfect conditions. NOT LIKE other products, which I had to keep using all the time and when I skipped for one day chapped lips came back.

reviews.review_text: This is probably the only lip balm I make sure I never lose and use to the very very end! Lived by this for the past 4 years and I recommend it to everyone!! I have one in my purse, my desk, my nightstand, and my vanity...can't live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I can even wear it overnight with getting small pimples around my mouth (I have very sensitive skin). This is officially my to go to chapstick and treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Not the same as the no color product

reviews.review_text: I have only used this for a couple of days, but I am not liking it.  The texture and moisturizing seem totally different than the first original lip treatment with no color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for dry lips It gives great moisture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works REALLY good and it smells wonderful too, but $25 ? It's definitely not worth that. The packaging is very durable and expensive so I understand why it's so expensive, but I just can't bring myself to spend that much on a lil balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my Sephora Play box for July and I absolutely love this product. I use it every night to keep my lips moisturized and not dry. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Good product, terrible value, even worse packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself does a great job of moisturizing. The problems I have with this lip treatment are the value and the packaging. The packaging for the sample is exactly the same as the full size, just smaller. Itu2019s VERY easy to break, because it doesnu2019t actually meet the sides of the tube for support. And for something thatu2019s $26, it really isnu2019t all that much different/better than the $14 jumbo organic lip balm I purchase from another brand that lasts me a year and never breaks. So while I have no complaints about this product itself, the aforementioned issues with packaging and value will prevent me from purchasing a full-sized version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it melt as soon as i put it on my lips.. (a chunk of it on my lips)  i does not work, i dont feel any different after i uesd it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might just be my favorite thing I got in my Sephora Play box last month! I had never used it before, so at first I was a little meh about the idea of a tinted lip balm in my box...it just didn't seem as exciting as an actual lipstick or something. Wow! I changed my mind really quick after using it for only a couple days.  This formula does indeed feel more like a lip therapy versus just a garden variety traditional lip balm. Where many of those lip balms always feel slightly heavy, this stuff feels light as a feather! It moisturizes wonderfully and glides on like silk...the best part is a little goes a LONG way. It works great by itself, and works especially well on top of one of my Benefit lip stains.   This was a pleasant surprise and I use it every day. Although it's kind of a steep price for lip balm, I can definitely see myself investing in the full size when my sample size runs out! Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every other lip product Iu2019ve tried wears off quickly and my lips are dry again... This actually does keep your lips moist for 24 hours. I like to put it on at night. You really only need to apply it once or twice a day, so the tube will last a while. I love the lemony smell. Itu2019s a treat to apply. Highly recommend even though itu2019s pricy!

reviews.review_title: Dream is a great new addition!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Dream is just a beautiful slight tint, even better than the Rose version which I have used for this purpose for years.  It is actually worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I donu2019t breakout around my mouth as  I do with other products. My lips feel brand new with every use. I use it three times a day. Money well spent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: so luxurious, super soft, easily applies with no pulling, lips feel instantly fuller and super moisturized. even my husband likes it!

reviews.review_title: Glorified lip balm, not worth the money or hype

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Fresh knocks it out to the park with their lip balms and I was happy to see that they now have a light pink version to their advance therapy treatment. Packaging is lux and it won't open in your purse.  There are many affordable lip potions out there, but if you are looking for a luxurious lip balm - this is a fantastic option!

Full disclosure, I have been using this on very dry lips as a result of an allergy to another lip product. On my regular lips I doubt it would be an issue but if you suffer from severley dry lips, I say stick to the clear one.

i bought this chapstick after reading every review. thought itu2019d be amazing for the price, for the price, i was let down so much. i was so excited but when it comes down to it, it does the same thing as a burtu2019s bee, i much rather wouldu2019ve bought my burtu2019s bee cucumber mint that feels the exact same on my lips then this does but 23 dollars cheaper, it doesnu2019t set into my lips and moisturizes, it just sits there, it feels greasy after a second coat, just wasnu2019t worth the money.

Because the climate is humid, Iu2019ve had to put it in the fridge. For those who live in hot and humid conditions, I would not recommend carrying this product around; however, if you live in much cooler areas, then by all means, sure. Otherwise, keeping it in the fridge is the best option.

reviews.review_text: Fresh Sugar Advanced has always been my favorite lip balm, I've used the colorless one religiously for years. When I saw it came in pink, I was tentative- it's so hard to find a good tinted lip balm. (The other line of Fresh Sugar tinted ones are hellish.) So often when tint is added to an un-tinted product it throws the balance off or something. It's never quite the same. IDK, maybe I'm a hyper lip freak.) Anyway, it's the same! Still amazing. The tint is extremely light, don't expect much, it's just a hint. A hint of tint. This and Bite agave lip mask are the only two lip products I'll ever need (though not the only ones I'll ever want.)  Enthusiastically recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good to use and protect lips very much.

reviews.review_title: IF I COULD GIVE 0 STARS I WOULD! DONu2019T WASTE MONEY

reviews.review_text: Brought this product after a coworker swore up and down that it is just the best thing that has ever happened to her lips. Unfortunately, I felt the complete opposite. The first time I purchased it, I wasnu2019t amazed. BUT I continued to use it because I wanted the product to be as AMAZING as the claims I have heard. About 1 week into usage the balm broke in half.  At that point, I had convinced myself that I should give it another try. So at my next stop into Sephora I picked up another one; only to find myself disappointed within a few days. This balm was not moisturizing, I had to apply it several times throughout the hour. THIS PRODUCT JUST DIDNu2019T DO IT FOR ME.   *keep in mind I brought this product in the mid of winter in NJ. But Iu2019m not sure that this would be any better in the spring, summer, or fall.

reviews.review_title: BEST moisturizing lip product! Totally addictive.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best 'chapstick' I've ever used! I have suffered with extremely dry, cracked lips for years trying all sorts of inexpensive and expensive products with no real good results UNTIL I tried Fresh Lip Therapy. It goes on really smooth. It feels amazing. I use it several times a day. It never gets sticky or feels like I've got a ton of layers on. It just melt into my lips. And it really has improved the texture of my lips with continued use. Whenever I've gone back to the cheap stuff, my dryness comes back with a vengeance. I keep one tube in my kitchen, one in my bedroom, one in bathroom and one in my car. I'm a little addicted I guess! It's totally worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A new favourite for me. I love the feel, my lips always feel moisturized now. The hint of pink is really pretty. Looks lovely on its own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as hydrating as other sugar products but the color is so hideous. not sheer at all super light brigh bubblegum pink really unflattering on my pale cool skin which usually tolerates any pink.

reviews.review_title: I canu2019t believe itu2019s worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I bought this product I was super worried that it wouldnu2019t be worth the money, Iu2019m a university student and so this product was a definite luxury. That being said my lips are sensitive, both EOS and blistex have seriously aggravated my lips, sometimes to the point where I have to go to the doctor and receive a prescribed anti-inflammatory. I got fed up and decided to splurge and get this product and Iu2019m so happy I did. My lips have felt plush and soft. Normally after a date with my boyfriend my lips feel dry and uncomfortable from all the making out, but using this that wasnu2019t the case. This product claims to finish the appearance of lines, but it wasnu2019t something I expected to see - I mean Iu2019m 22 - how big a different could it make? Apparently a huge one. I applied a matte lipstick yesterday and noticed that not only did it apply smoothly, but my lips looked so... unrealistically perfect. Almost like Iu2019d gotten lip filler. It genuinely looked like something off of Instagram. I purchased the tinted version, and while I normally love lipstick, this gives you the healthiest pick tint. Itu2019s gorgeous for those days you wanna look natural. A little cream blush, concealer and mascara and I think I look like a natural beauty. I canu2019t say enough about this product and will defintetly repurchase it when my tube runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, very moisturizing !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only lip balm that minimized my lip lines. Makes them look full, soft, and healthy. I've repurchased 4 or 5 times already because I use it daily under makeup and every night before bed. AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first you think u201cIu2019m sorry, how much for that chapstick?!u201d And the you try it. It lasts long and feels silky smooth on your lips. I got a sample size a while back and figured I would try it, itu2019s a about 3 times better than Burtsbees and well worth the $. You just have to get over the sticker shock when you first see it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip product is everything!! Smells super sweet, very lightweight, and keeps my lips moisturized during the months when lips get dried out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm older, light skinned and from a cold climate. I have been trying to keep my lips soft forever. (I was addicted to lip killing chapstick for too long.) This product is Wonderful - I love it. I also bought the serum treatment. My lips are the softest they have ever been.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little pricey, but well worth it! Very hydrating and long lasting. I was skeptical when purchasing, but so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: did a review on this before i didnt like it on my chapped lips i didnt think it was effective until i tried it over night.... best decision ever now i love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My best friend recommended this to me and so I bought one and noticed it did absolutely nothing, even if my lips werenu2019t chapped. Not to mention the price is way too high, it literally did nothing for me.

reviews.review_title: Love it - adds a nice Pop! of color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a long time fan of the translucent color, so when this one came out I knew I just had to try it, and boy was I happy. I was slightly worried that the color would be similar to the rose color in the normal lip treatment, but it wasn't at all. The color reminds me of that look of freshly scrubbed lips - like a little pink and full. It's not overpowering - it's just a hint of pink to brighten up the face. I'll definitely be getting more so that I can keep some at my desk too. It doesn't have a long staying power, but I like to use it right before I pop out for a quick weekend errand or something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is AH-MAZING! (This from a New England girl who swears by a beeswax and olive oil balm for chapped lips) The scent is citrus-y and delicious, and it does a great job on my chapped lips. I can apply once in the car, and forget about chapstick until I leave work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the small one and I love it. My burts and bees lip balm is the only I will use. It is my ride or die lip balm, but this might be my next one. I am very picky, but the one that gets me thinking eh is the price. But I will purchase it when my small one is out and see how it goes from there : ) If this is pricey for a lot of you I would recommend burts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Thereu2019s still a lot of product below the surface! Scoop it out and get your full moneyu2019s worth! Ju

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used these lip products for over 10 years and I have to say I haven't found anything better, including the Dior sugar scrub. That has a funny taste/smell to it compared to Fresh. It is very hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in the minority but I am not impressed. It doesn't stay on very long, therefore I feel like I am reapplying sooo often.  Because of that, the tube hasn't lasted very long. Now that I am at about 1/3 left,  it actually broke off and I have to be very careful when I use it. I am not just going to throw it away because of how much I paid for it.  Definitely won't be buying again.  Gave it two stars because it does feel really nice for the 5 minutes it stays on.

reviews.review_text: It's okay, but chapstick does just as much for a fraction of the cost. I love fresh and use their lips scrub and face polish because they are gentle but very effective, but this lip balm fell short. It didn't necessarily make my lips more chapped like some reviews are claiming, but when it wore off, they definitely weren't more moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: FABULOUS!! Canu2019t live without it!!

reviews.review_text: This lip balm is just so smooth and therapeutic. It makes my lips feel so smooth.  I have bought this product multiple times because nothing else can compare!

reviews.review_text: For the price, I would expect it to last overnight. It barely lasts 2 hours. I have as much luck with $6 drugstore balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new winter favorite!  Eliminated my chapped lips completely and left them smooth and plump.  Not like a regular lip balm at all - more of a serious moisture lipgloss that also protects from the elements.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend loves this stuff and regularly steals it from my purse.

reviews.review_text: I can never stop buying this! It's my go-to chap stick and I cannot find another one that compares to it! Very hydrating and lasts for a long period of time.

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip product I have ever tried.  It has been a godsend this dry winter and works wonders for chapped lips.  It's a little costly, but I find it justifies the price given how little I need to use of it vs other products.

reviews.review_title: Progress for someone with constantly chapped lips!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard about this product by watching Olivia Munn's Insta stories and had to give it a try! I have constantly chapped lips form working in a job where I am constantly talking and smiling with clients. So far I have noticed a big difference in the severity of my chapped lips. They are definitely still chapped every day but no longer peeling and red and sometimes bleeding. I would say the recovery process over night has also improved! Mild flavored and scented.

reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. I've wasted hundreds of dollars on lip treatments and this is the only one that helps my extremely dry lips. It healed a massive split on my lower lip in less than 24 hours and nothing but silky lips since. I will never put anything else on my lips again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice lip treatment. Definitely will become a regular staple for me.

reviews.review_text: I love this product, my lips are super sensitive and if I wear any other Chapstick or lip product it tends to sting and burn. But if I wear this Chapstick as a base layer then I can wear any lip product on top. It's my life saver, I wouldn't never be able to live without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this lip treatment for everyday on-the-go use, but I definitely think that you will need a little extra something with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a definite favorite lip balm of mine.  Pros:  Super moisturizing Plumping Good to wear under a drying lipstick Seems to fill fine lines Lasts long on lips  Cons:  Very expensive for little amount of product Scent can be overpowering (If you don't like lemon scents, this will make you sick)  I've never bought a full tube though. I love getting it as a 100 point perk or buying sets with those little tubes. I would love to try the tinted one but it doesn't fit in my budget right now.

reviews.review_text: Obsessed by this product. Not much of a lip balm person but I wear this whenever Iu2019m not wearing any lipstick. Very hydrating.

reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm Iu2019ve ever tried. My lips are always chapped and this is the only product that I can use and it works for the entire day and maybe more! I only apply it once in the morning and it works sooo well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment joins the ranks of my favorite non-SPF Sugar lip treatment products.  It is Buttery!   I love the texture.  It's a very pretty pink color, not so sheer.  It's comforting for your lips.

I always saw it in store and passed over it BUT i got it in my PLAY box and am OBSESSED i've already ordered another. It keeps lips hydrated and feels SO smooth - plus the sugar taste kind of good. It's a must for anyone in the cold climate this winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love the texture on my lips, not greasy feeling, hydrates instantly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my play box, and I am in love. this works great as an overnight treatment. I also LOVE the fact that the cap screws on--no more coming loose and making a mess in my bag!

reviews.review_title: The Only Thing it Provides is Dryer Lips!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this product in the Sephora Play box for January 2018 at first I was super excited because it seemed like a great product. Upon first applying it felt silky and smooth like it would be quite hydrating, after about a minute on my lips are dryer than they started! It does make your lips shiny for a moment so if you're about to take a picture it may be okay for that but it is definitely not hydrating. I also haven't noticed any plumping or wrinkle removing properties either, just seems to dry out my lips horribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in my Sephora Play & love it. Very satisfied with it. Glides on smooth & a nice light feel on the lips. I would purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture on my lips and how smooth & moisturized my lips feel but no matter where I keep this brand, it melts & breaks. E

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this clear lip moisturizer.  I apply it every day after brushing my teeth in the morning.  It immediately moisturizes my lips.  While I have to apply other lip goo during the day (I have dry lips and it doesn't last 24 hours), it is smooth, doesn't flake, and is a great base to apply before lipstick.

reviews.review_title: I hate lip balms, but I love this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been in the school of thought you don't need chapstick/lip balm, your lips will hydrate themselves. This is because whenever I use a lip balm/lipstick/lippies, my lips end up being drier and flakey. So I swore them off. I've also always hated the feeling of product on my lips. I got a sample of this in my Play! box and it has changed my view of lip balms! It hydrates and doesn't dry or make my lips flake at all! If you were resistant to lippies before, give this a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I will definitely be buying more! Feels great going on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this so much made my lips soft immediately

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size in my PLAY box this month. From this cold weather & the help of liquid lipsticks my lips have been super dry. I've tried a few different chapsticks / lip balm & nothing really helps. But this one really did help, after only 1 use I felt & seen a very noticeable difference. I will for sure be buying the full size when my trial runs out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as part of the January play box- this lip treatment is great at really moisturizing my super dry and peeling lips. I always use matte liquid lipsticks and they always really dry my lips out so bad. This lip treatment is fantastic at really penetrating and deep moisturizing and the smell is subtle but good. This is a must have for matte lipstick junkies like me

reviews.review_text: Very hydrating but thick

reviews.review_text: I love the feeling on my lips. This is my new favorite for lip care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this, as I've owned several versions of the tinted version and loved all of them. I was a bit worried when I opened it and smelled a strong orange extract scent, given it's a skin irritant, but I thought I'd try it anyway, because I'd used lime-flavored lip balms without issue before. I used it for about a week, and my lips got worse: they went from a bit dry sometimes to actually chapped and peeling a little in the center of my bottom lip. I went back to my old nighttime lip balm (Carenel Lip Sleeping Mask) to see what would happen, and sure enough, my lips promptly returned to normal. Seeing how many great reviews this has, it's clear not everyone reacts as poorly as I do to orange extract, but if your lips are on the sensitive side, I'd suggest an unfragranced lip balm (or at least one without citrus oils).

reviews.review_text: Since swearing off of chapstick a couple of years back I have been using EOS and was so happy when they released their product in a lipstick style dispenser. So much better than the ball.. but now I have found Sugar.. and I think I am going to be a big lip snob! I LOVE IT.  I even love the way the tube texture feels as I apply this product.  Yes, it sounds weird but it is true.  Goes on super smooth and has even managed to clear up some dry patches I had on my lips.  I am looking forward to buying some of their shaded lip treatments.  Yes, its pricey for a lip balm but it feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm/chap stick I've ever used. Keeps my lips hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A bit disappointed in the hype. Left a residue on my lips I kept having to wipe off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip treatment.  I wear it morning and night.  I am not sure if it made much of a difference on my lips but leaves lips feeling soft, not like other lip balms that can actually dry out lips more.  Only downfall is price and it goes quickly.
Love this product.  Very moisture and smell great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite lip balm, very moisturizing! My husband likes it too :) Be careful though, as it melts faster in warm temperatures, (ie: purses left in the sun) than most standard chapsticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buy about 2 a month!! Makes my lips super soft with a subtle sheen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip conditioner!  I tried a lot of products after Lorac discontinued their vitamin e stick.  This is the best I have found.  Lasts pretty well, very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smoothed my lips within hours of the first application. Now I apply at bedtime so I can wake up with soft, smooth lips. It eliminates any dryness caused by my lipstick from the day before. This product is really expensive so I don't know if I'd actually shell out the money for it. The one I'm using right now was a gift.

reviews.review_title: It WORKS - but itu2019ll cost ya....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this at least 5 times. The last being today. I wear it at night before I go to bed. It glides in like silk and settles into the lines in my lips smoothly with no sticky or slimy feeling like so many balms and chap sticks tend to do. Nothing - NOTHING has worked so well to moisturize my lips at night. (Skip their other option which I believe they market for overnight. Gave me blackheads around my lips. YUCK.) I wake up and my lips are smooth and hydrated and way less lines in them. There is no harsh smell or chemical taste. I LOVE his product. The ONLY reason why I donu2019t offer 5 stars is because as good as it is, itu2019s wildly overpriced. Just because something works and itu2019s good doesnu2019t mean you should mark it up to high heaven in price. If it was $10 cheaper it would STILL be a touch high priced but at least it would be palatable. Meanwhile, Iu2019ll continue to repurchase and they will continue to rob me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried all sorts of lip balms from drug store brands to super expensive brands and I can tell you this is the absolute best. I suffer from very dry lip and this product is so amazing that you put it once and you already feel the difference. I'm on mu third one now and I will continue to purchase. I'd love for it to have some spf though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had horrible dry lips my whole life and have tried many chipsticks/balms and none compare to this one. It's amazing. My only complaint it that with using it 2-3 times daily the product runs out fast for the price.
Best hydration for my lips ! Definitely recommend this to everybody and will buy over and over again
Love this stuff! Leaves my lips feeling so hydrated :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally my favorite from the line. I know some people are fans of the color ones, but they never sit well on me. Bonus is that this has SPF! You can never have enough!

Though I at first found this treatment to be rather pricey in comparison to some other lippy's, this is honestly one of the most hydrating balms I've ever used. It comes with a decent amount of product and it's easily come to be one of my favorite lip treatments. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every night at bedtime. It keeps my lips moist and I haven't had chapped lips since I started using this product a few years ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail lip product.  I've used all the drugstore brand chapsticks and only ended up with more chapped and dry lips.  This is the only product that results in long lasting moisturized lips with minimal to zero chapping.  However, one star was taken off for the price.  I understand it's a high end product, but it's still too expensive to splurge on a regular basis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment I've ever used. Been using it for 10 years now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ATTENTION ACCUTANE/ISOTRETINOIN/ACNE MEDICATION TAKING SEPHORA CUSTOMERS!!! LOOK NO FURTHER!! THIS IS THE LIP PRODUCT FOR YOUR DRY CRACKED LIPS!!! just finished my 6 months of Accutane/Isotetinoin (medication for severe cystic acne) and I tried EVERYTHING to find relief for my severely dry and chapped lips. This product was with out a doubt the absolute most soothing lip product I tried. I am specifically referring to the ADVANCED lip therapy because, no, it is not the same as the regular lip treatment in the brown tube. I tried both of them and this one was 10x the moisture and yes worth the extra two bucks. This product LITERALLY made me smile because without it, I couldn't even giggle for the fear that my lips would have turned to dust and disappeared. Thanks Sugar (-;

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After years or dry peeling lips and many many failed attempts at other products I finally found Fresh Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment. It was a day and night difference and now I no longer have to worry about my lips looking unpleasant. It truly is a miracle product for me!

reviews.review_title: I kinda want to eat it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my lips oh so happy! It is so easy to apply/it goes on so smoothly. I love it. It has a very light scent that's very pleasing.
Love this it helps my chapped lips every time!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is really expensive for a chapstick but I notice such a huge difference when I use it regularly compared to other balms. it keeps my lips so soft and hydrated. I love the smell of this. highly recommend for dry lips
Product is amazing!! Has done wonders for my lips. Smells amazing! So soft. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love them all but the advanced therapy is by far my favorite

I have always had trouble with basic drugstore lip balms not lasting and actually drying my lips after the initial moisture wears off. Why?  Who knows. But this stuff is absolute magic and my lips stay soft and hydrated and is helping the little lines around my lips. I'm turning 50 and this has made a huge difference in those age lines and dryness!
Best lip balm ever! Worth the high price tag!!!

reviews.review_title: Worth the cost, but needs SPF!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this satin finish fresh lip balm.  It make my lips feel so soft and kissable.  It is the perfect prep before or after any matte lip sticks and make a great addition to your skin care regime. Would be five stars if it was SPF as well.
One of the best chapsticks I've ever tried. The price is totally worth it. It doesn't make them more chapped like other do & a little goes a long way! It's a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy these as a splurge, but I wish the formula were less slide-y. It doesn't stay on my lips quite as well as some products and is pretty expensive for that to be the case. I love the smell so much, though, that it's hard to resist getting sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product gets so much hype but I am not sure its worth it. I love lip balm and was looking for something with SPF in it (which I was told this has... still not sure if thats true or not). I have found my lips are more dry after I use it consistently and I am not dehydrated. There are others I like more and are a much more reasonable price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but it doesn do anything for my dry chapped lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: would highly recommend! only a 4 star because the price is kinda steep

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this!! keeps my lips hydrated more than any other lip balm product that I've tried! it is a bit pricey but it's worth it!
Always hydrates and protects my lips, I use it with the laneige lip mask and they both helped a lot with my dry lips. I don't really like the smell though.

reviews.review_title: hydrating! Colorless, can be layered with lipstick
reviews.review_text: Got a deluxe sample of this and I've used it on and off for a few weeks. It's very hydrating and leaves my lips soft! I feel like it's more moisturizing than the regular Fresh Sugar Lip Therapy, which is an item I have used on and off for years. It's nice that it's colorless, so I can layer on lipstick after putting this on.
Goes on smoothly and all, but had to keep replying since the more i used it the more dry my lips felt under it
This broke me out for some reason, reading the reviews no one else had this problem but the skin around my mouth broke out so bad , I don't have acne prone skin so I don't know why it broke me out.
Fantastic product. All the Fresh sugar lip products are high quality, effective, and beautiful. I've literally bought 50  tubes over the last 10  years in 4 varieties.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to lip balm during the daytime. My lips feel so soft and moisturized! I like how it's lightly scented so I don't feel like I'm tasting my lip balm. The only downside is, because it's so soft and moisturizing, the product tends to shift around in the tube, especially when it's longer/newer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love to use this lip treatment.  It feels buttery and smooth on my lips. It's been a favorite of mine for more than a year now.  I plan to keep using it forever.  I like that it doesn't have chemical sunscreens.  Highly recommend.
Definitely very moisturizing and has sun protection!

I can't live without this. I probably am on my 4th bottle of this that's how much I love it! I live in Canada and this saves my lips for the winter. In the summer, this makes my lips looks so nice and slick. It's perfect! Everything I want in a lip product.
The title says it all. Only giving this 4 stars because there is only so little of it for the money. I use this as a lip balm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so amazing! At first I balked at the price, now I give it as a stocking stuffer each year to my mom, sister, and now husband.  Yes, even my husband loves this stuff. It locks in moisture with lasting effect. I use it in the morning and I can tell my lips stay soft and hydrated all day living in hot, humid northern TX. And if I forget to use it- well it has noticeably improved the health of my lips and now they don't get dry and cracked by the end of the day, its a week without use before I notice I've missed it.  Seriously amazing, long lasting results. Worth every cent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this treatment and the balm in a little set. I was just expecting them to be like normal moisturizing balms, but they ended up being so much more. I use this treatment every night. I'm sad I'm running out soon and can't find it where I live. I can't quite put my finger on it, as it's not marketed as a lip plumper, nor does it feel like one, but I can say my lips just seem more noticeable, more present. Even my husband has noticed. They feel subtly fuller. They just look and feel better all-around. They're silkier, properly moistened, look better defined. The treatment feels good on your lips too when you use it. It doesn't feel waxy, sticky, or gross in any way. Very worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is wonderful!! It is such a treat to wear. It gives my lips moisture, smoothes the lines in my lips, and stays on for hours. I have already repurchased this product and will continue to do so. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for something that does what it claims to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have had issues with dry lips since I was a small child and am very sensitive with what I can wear on my lips.  This actually makes them feel less chapped as opposed to just covering it up.
i have chronically chapped lips but this really helps. much more moisturizing than their tinted balms.
perfect lip balm! lasts on my lips all night long.

This is my absolute favorite chapstick of all time. I never have really chapped lips anyway, but somehow this chapstick makes my lips even smoother and look a tiny bit fuller. I also find that I do not need to apply it as often as I apply other chapsticks like Burt's Bees. I definitely recommend it for an everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: moisturizing, not heavy, but i wish someone would come out with a non-bee's wax formula...totally plant-based

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is so good for softening lips and lips that are dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: ...and that is where I will keep it. I always apply from type of lip moisturizer before going to bed. Last time I was in my local Sephora they didn't have my usual Korres option available. So I chose this instead, I am happy with my choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was apprehensive at the price when the salesperson hands down said this is the miracle product that will loved my cracked and dry lips. They were correct! After the first week I already noticed a change. It has been 6 months, and no cracked lips. It's worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm on my 3rd tube(Prob. More)? Anyway, if you suffer from dry cracked lips you need to start from scratch with lip care. I have had flaky peeling lips for as long as I can remember. Here is what I did to fix it: After brushing your teeth you can also gently brush your lips(skip brushing lips if your lips have cracks/sores, it will still work but take longer to see change). You don't need a fancy lip scrub, this act alone softens and prepares your lips. Now, after all of that, pat dry your lips and apply chapstick immediately to seal in moisture. Do this for a while and you will have better lip days ahead. Applying chapstick without any kind of moisture will just make it sit on top of the cracked skin- but then you'll just have expensive lip salve. Anyway, I hope this helps my fellow luscious lipped beauts!
This just sat on top of my dry cracked lips and never penetrated. Used the entire tube and never saw improvement.
Great lip balm for my lips jeeps it moisturized. Highly recommend
I absolutely love this! It moisturizes my lips but doesn't make them flake or look too moisturized. I can feel a difference when I use it.
I love the sweet smelluff01It's not too oily but moisturing. The box of the lipstick is matting. Maybe I won't buy it because of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Me and my mom had used about 5 of this. We love this lip balm so much. The only thing is it broke every time when we used about the last 1/3.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this as a deluxe sample and really enjoyed it. I legit scraped the bottom to get every last bit. I would use this every morning and let it sink in completely before applying my lip look. It always primed my lips perfectly for the rest of the day. My lip color went on smoothly and it kept my lips smooth and hydrated during the day. I would purchase a full size.
This is great for smoothing out your lips but I suffer from severely dry lips and it did not help at all. Not recommended for those who have severe dry lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Made my lips very dry after using and I had to reapply it multiples times.

I would never think to spend this much on chapstick but had been dealing w/particularly dry lips a few months before my wedding and decided to splurge- best decision ever. This product is NOT equivalent to any drugstore brand- it's smooth and silky, not waxy or thick. It absorbs and doesn't sit on top of your skin like most. You can noticeably see a difference in texture immediately after applying- lips are visibly healthier. I'm on my second tube- highly highly recommended!

this chapstick does what it needs to. i do like how moisturized and soft my lips look/feel in the morning after applying it at night. a little goes a long way. smells great. a lot of product. you only need a few dabs. however, it is definitely not worth $26 dollars. yes, it's good, but you could get any chapstick with the same functions at any drugstore. will not repurchase for this reason.
It's an average lip balm, nothing special. It's not worth the money.

My lips are really really dry because I'm on accutane. I was hoping that this would help reduce the dryness (obviously not eliminate it completely) but, I ended up having to reapply twice within the hour. For $24, I don't think so. I'll stick to my 99 cent lip balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to lip balm since I tried it. I was a big fan of their other tinted lip balms but I wanted a clear one. This was perfect. My lips get super dry in the winter and this was a godsend. Never loved a product like this. My only complaint is that you go through it so quickly! To be fair I use it a few times a day. It feels so nice and smooth on your lips and makes them super moisturized. It also has a nice subtle smell to it which I love.

I tried this for 2 weeks. Made my lips dry after a few hours. After applying lips didn't feel moisturized  or any different.  Going to return.  Packaging is nice as well as amount of product but going to try something else.
love this product I have several of them. I have used several other brands but nothing keeps my lips smooth and soft. tastes pretty good too. I know it's a bit pricey but we'll worth it.
I have already repurchased this product both for myself and for others- it's a daily necessity for my lips now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tend to suffer from dry skin and the winter weather has made my lips very dry. This lip treatment is a fantastic product. Literally, with just one use, my lips feel so much better. The product instantly melts into my lips making them feel soft and smooth. There is no waxy feeling or annoying stickiness. Completely worth every penny!
Average - it works but you also have to apply it multiple times a day otherwise I personally found it to dry my lips out.
This is awesome, one of the best lip balms I have used. It is nice and light feeling, and moisturizes my lips like crazy. I love that it doesn't have a weird taste or too much overpowering scent.

This made my lips super soft but only after exfoliation. Since I paid a whopping $30 for this stuff, at first I only used it at night. But to get the full benefits I had to use it all day.  I expected way better results for the price! But it smells so good I want to eat it. Yet I had to avoid eating or drinking while wearing it so I wouldn't waste it. Too expensive, not that great.
It works but it doesn't last long and I constantly felt like I had to reapply. Unfortunately I don't love it.
Great product. Love the way my lips  feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lippie.  It makes my lips feel soft and hydrated.  It works for a couple of hours then you have to reapply but, no balm last like a matte lipstick.  I love Fresh balms and will order more and probably only this brand for now on. I'm in love with their product.

I dont quite understand the negative reviews, one time my brother had horribly chapped lips and one application made it almost totally better within 4 hours. I swear by this stuff, and I'm buying it for the 3rd Time since I first found out about it. I'm obsessed with lipstick and I've been wearing matte liquid lipstick constantly for at least 3 months now, Ive also had an obsession with collecting various chapsticks since 2009, and this is by far the best. If you cant spend the money though, its not as good, but the closest thing is the ultra conditioning one from burts bees, but overuse of that one causes dry lips. Honestly, it's worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This has to be one of the worst lip treatments I have ever used. For the price you would expect something at least be decent but this is not the case. I never write reviews but just trying to warm you not to get this product, you would be better off with a drug store lip balm.

reviews.review_title: eh like it but would not re buy it
reviews.review_text: For $27 dollars I'd want this to restore, replenish, plump, tingle, get rid of my wrinkles or lip cracks! I want it to smooth everything out and not leave it too smooth and excessive. I always apply after the Lush Mint Julip scrub and I like it not to be so creamy- it feels heavy almost, I always dab the excess top of my hand.

This is basically an expensive vitamin E chapstick.  Any drugstore product vitamin E will do the same thing.  I use it but would definitely not repurchase.  Save your money.  Did not notice any plumping or smoothing of wrinkles as it claims.

I was really excited to try this. I get really dry chap lips, and I thought this would make my lips smooth, but being completely honest, it made them drier. It's okay when I just want something to put on my lips when they aren't dry, but other than that, $1 chapstick is better.

It feels good on my lips, but there are some problems that make it not worth the cost. Firstly, as others have said, it melts ridiculously quickly so it can't be put in your pocket. Secondly, the product only lasted 2 weeks before I used it all. I used it daily, but that's still not worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: it's heavy and oily on my lips... and it didn't' do anything. It may moisten lips for a moment but it doen't seem to repair them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Bought this as a travel friendly lip balm and I'm not too impressed. It doesn't do anything to bring my lips back from being chapped. I think it just has to do with individual chemistry or something, but it's just not amazing for me. It also tastes kinda bad.

Yesterday my lips were so dry and cracked I could barely open my mouth. I purchased this item at my local Sephora and put it on before I went to bed! My lips feel so much better already! Amazed with this product. Worth the money.

Okay so at first I thought this product was great! But as I used it I found my lips were drying and shriveling up worse than ever!!! I've always dealt with my lips flaking and being dry but I've never seen my lips this dehydrated! If you are a mouth breather who deals with really dry lips I would STAY AWAY!!!!

reviews.review_title: When good products have bad packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: In my opinion this is one of the best lip balms out there and I am somewhat of a lip balm snob. It has a thin consistency that genuinely moisturizes your lips so that you don't have to reapply all day. It even works well to break down hard to take off liquid lipsticks. Just one swipe over the liquid lip and it easily comes off with a tissue.  Real talk though, I've been buying this product religiously for the last two years but have decided to stop buying this product until Fresh fixes the packaging. Once you get down to the bottom there is a TON of product left in the bottom plastic part. You are forced to either waste it or scoop it out with a qtip or cosmetic spatula. For the price and with so many other excellent lip balms on the market it is no longer worth it to me.  Also if you do buy this, be careful about keeping it in your car on a hot day. It melts very easily!

reviews.review_title: Basically, a very nice lip balm
reviews.review_text: The treatment feels lovely when you put it on, but I personally have not noticed any additional repairing, nourishing, plumping, or smoothing of wrinkles, beyond what I have experienced with my regular drugstore lip balm. It just feels like a nice, creamy lip balm. I've been using this product for a little over a month and a half and am down to the bottom of the tube. (When you get to the bottom, there is still a good amount left - I have been using a QTip to get the rest out.) I will probably not purchase this again. It is a nice product, but I don't feel it is really worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: This was a disappointment to me. I enjoy the balm in the pan that is offered by Fresh Sugar so I wanted to give this stick formula a try. I wanted something to use when I'm on the go that didn't require me to use my finger. The formula of this stick balm is very thin and slick. It absorbs in a matter of mere minutes and my lips were left feeling dry and cracked very quickly.

I keep this stuff next to my bed so I can have a nourishing treatment all night. I can still feel it in the morning which I love. I don't get breakouts either along the lip line which has happened before with inferior products
Best!!! Some lip tx/balms make me need more by making my lips feel dry after few hrs. But not this or any other sugar lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this lip treatment.  My lips are always in dire need of care, and just after one application my lips were amazingly soft.  I'm the type that will need to apply this constantly throughout the day, but feel it is well worth the results!

I can't even wear other chapsticks anymore... they feel too waxy now and leave a residue. This stuff is amazing... I actually kind of wish it wasn't so great because it's obviously way more expensive than regular chapstick./
love this and smells great too

I recently moved from the humid climate of Austin, TX to the arid dryness of Boulder, CO in winter and my lips could not take it. They were cracked, bleeding, painful. Regular chapstick wasn't cutting it so I tried several different products and this was the INSTANT, clear winner. It turned my lips around. Worth the $ if you live in dry climates.

I received a sample of this balm (about half of full size) and used it for several weeks.   The packaging is nice with a screw on cap, but the product is nothing special. It's quite thin, melts easily, and doesn't last long on my lips. It has a fairly pleasant scent that isn't too strong.  It does feel nice for about 10-15 minutes, but when worn overnight - even when the product is still there in the morning - it tends to leave my lips dry and even flaky. If it doesn't even work after being on 7  hours, I don't really see a reason to buy it.  I'll use up the rest of my sample since it's a convenient short term fix, but it still pales in comparison to almost any pot or tube balm that I've used.

I am usually EXTREMELY anxious when it comes to lip balms every since the EOS lip balm incident!
