It was advertised as organic and the packaging was cute but when I used the EOS lip balms my lips dried out and cracked MORE and it even left a little scar on my upper lip. Ever since I've been reluctant to try new stuff but I had tried FRESH's skin products before and they worked brilliantly on my skin, and someone got me THIS (their lip treatment) for Christmas.   With fingers crossed and prayers said I put this on one night as a night lip balm treatment and the results are MAGIC. It's such a relief! My lips are baby soft and smooth in the mornings thanks to this!! No crackage for me! Lol. I'm convinced FRESH can do me no wrong; all their products are solid. *thumbs up*
Best chapstick. Soft, pleasant smell, and actually works!
Pretty good. Very smooth. Won't work for very dry lips

I have had good result with this. This winter has been super cold and dry here, and this product has helped mostly. My lips are very sensitive so eventually I have to switch between different products to keep up with dry lips no matter the product.

reviews.review_title: Too thin and slippery, too soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Whenever I go into a Sephora and ask for a lip treatment for my chronically dry, chapped and flaky lips, the SA recommends this one. So, I used this for a while, and even repurchased when I ran out. As with most Fresh products, I loved the scent, and the emphasis on feel-good, natural ingredients. The thing is, I don't think it helped much. First, I personally don't really like the texture: once on the lips, it is very thin and slippery, and I feel it exacerbates my lips' texture, instead of smoothing them like some other balms do. It also doesn't stay in place well if you tend to purse your lips. Second, it is very soft, melts easily, and a tube doesn't last long if you like to reapply lip balm several times in a day. Third, I feel this product sits on the lips more than it absorbs and treats; it's like I have dry lips under a slippery top layer. The time when I feel it did the most good is when I wore it overnight; my lips were softer the next morning. Of course, YMMV, but overall I feel like for severely chapped lips there are better, cheaper options out there. Sorry Fresh.

My skin and lips became really dry recently (pregnancy--such fun) and my lip colours started feathering, which had never happened before. I started using this to combat the dryness and not only am I less chapped but no more feathering and I swear my lips are plumper and more full. I use it before bed and in the morning before makeup along with my SPF. Very happy with it.
So whenever I got on accutane, I searched for a good nourishing lip balm. I tired it while on accutane and it did not help my dry lips at all. HOWEVER, once I got off accutane, it helped me a ton.

This works, but it's nothing special. I live in a humid climate and I found that it was always super melted? I had a mini one and it actually broke in half. Won't be purchasing a full size, slightly disappointed since I normally adore fresh!

i have very dry lips so i decided to give this a try thinking it would be amazing based on the price and reviews. it honestly was not that much better than the $4 drug store lip balm i used previously. will not be repurchasing.
It's pretty pricey for lip treatment but it does work and smells great. Nothing spectacular but I like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried all kind of chap sticks/ lip balms from La Mer to drugstore and this is my all time favorite! It is not sticky at all but keeps my lip super hydrated throughout the day.
The best , hands down I'll never use another lip balm
It is worth the cost and is super moisturizing. I'm on my 3rd stick.

This is my 3rd Sugar purchase and I think its my new favorite! Goes on so smoothly and leaves my lips honestly... kissable! What else do you want? Im not the girl to splurge $26 on a freaking chapstick but this is the best item I have spent this amount of money on for my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This made my lips dryer than the desert to the point where it was peeling. . I'm not sure what has changed with this product because I've used it before with good results. The moment I stopped using it my lips felt great again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Like any lip balm, you have to try it for at least a week to see how your lip adjusts...and for me, there is no other lip balm that can compare. I used to be a die hard Burts Bees fan, but this lip treatment is amazing. It doesn't make your lips flaky after it dries, and really replenishes moisture for your lips in the winter. Smells good, nice texture, and lasts for a long time. It's definitely on the expensive side of lip care products, but totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always doubted the value of the Fresh lip balms due to their high price but when I got one in a gift set I was hooked. They're amazing, I've tried this one as well the rose and brown sugar one and they work great. My lips get pretty dry especially when traveling and during the winter but this works amazingly. It smells great and keeps your lips feeling moisturized for hours. I go through one about every six months I don't splurge on a lot of beauty products but this one I can justify twice a year. If you're skeptical try the gift set with the mini sizes!

Best lip product I've ever used. I don't understand how others don't like this, my lips have never felt better. I put this on when my lips are dry and peeling and have to wipe it off 20 minutes later because it has moisturized them to the point that the dead skin just falls off! Absolutely amazing. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Had this product for about three weeks now and definitely makes your lips dryer/rough and its not long lasting either. My lips have gotten worse from before, they get so dry that my bottom lip is peeling of because of the chapstick, not even lipsticks do this. Its not worth it at all.
I have tried every lip balm for my dry, aging lips. This one works the best for me. Love it!

I purchased this randomly walking through sephora. I have dry ugly chapped lips especially in the winter. i've never found a balm that works as good as this. It moisturizes them throughout the whole day, smells great, and doesn't leave any icky residue on the side of your lips. Which is SO hard for me to find. lol. great product - will be purchasing again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Smoothest melting balm I have ever felt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Every year my lips splits and bleeds. I started using this 2 years ago. My lips haven't split since. So thankful to have found this product.

I've bought and repurchased this several times and always come back to it after trying a few others. This is my favorite. I feel like it gets absorbed quickly and lasts a long time without easily wiping off. Goes great under any colors and helps make lip lines smooth.

I originally received this item in a 500 point gift and loved it! (It was in a tiny tin) The chopstick I received lasted a week and didn't produce the same results! I was very disappointed that I spent 26 dollars on a product that lasted a week and didn't produce the same results as it's sample size!

The first night I used this my lips were peeling and super dry- the next morning they already looked 10x better. On day 4 now and completely healed. I like the amount of moisture that is given & hoping I see fine lines blurred! I recommend this for anyone with chapped, cracked, or dried lips.
Very moisturizer, feels great on the lip. Really change my very dry lip condition

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips are always chapped and this stuff works wonders! Not too thick but does the job. Definitely worth the price!
After using this the past week it has helped me so much! Coming from someone that has been biting my lips the past years. Gross I know. Definitely buying this again.
Really helps moisturize my lips, especially this winter time. Love the tinted ones too, very pigmented. Just a bit pricey though

When I first saw this my immediate reaction was you have some real nerve selling chapstick for 26 bucks. My friends, I was led astray. It makes sense. This is a wondrous product. I don't know why it works so well, but it does. I put it on over night and when I wake up in the morning it looks like I bought a new pair of lips. It makes them SO soft. I get it, chapsticks do that, but this one... this one is different.
I have purchased and used to their fullest at least 3 of these. I love this product, just be sure not to get it too hot or it melts easily (don't leave in in the car)
Perfect for hydrating before putting on a matte lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product works Wonder for super chapped lips. I use it 2-3 times a day when it's really bad and it does the job much better than other products I've tried with no results. I believe people who say there are getting even dryer lips after using it are probably using it too much (just like shampoo and oily hair) . 2-3 times a day is more than enough. I can last a whole year with mine and I live in cold Montreal where winter definitely hurts.

I am now just finishing my first tube of this lip balm. Bought it because of all the great things I've heard about it. Wow, talk about disappointment from a product I expected more from! This lip balm is only okay and is no different than the four dollar lip balm I usually use from the drugstore. I found I couldn't use it more than once or twice a day because it caused my lips to be drier than before I used it. It is definitely not worth the money (or the hype). I will not (ever) purchase this product again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i have extremely chronically dry/chapped lips and ive tried so many things to moisturize my lips but none of them have worked as well as this...ive only used it a few times and it made a huge change to them and now theyre smooth and moisturized, the price is very up there for a lip balm but its absolutely worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is overpriced because it doesn't actually  moisturize your lips. It moisturizes it for about 5 mins then your lips feel dry again. Doesn't do any better than a $5 chapstick.
My mom and I have been using this for more than a year. It smells so good and is really hydrating. Absolutely love, and I'd stick with this product as long as it is continued.
1. Very hydrating and not sticky 2. Has a very nice subtle lychee smell
I'm completely in love with this lip balm! It keeps my lips so hydrated and smells great! Highly recommend!
This was quite expensive so I was hoping for some real moisture therapy for my dry lips in the Canadian winter. This product failed to deliver anything better than a much cheaper drugstore lip balm.
Thought this lip balm would be a miracle worker, considering price. Smell is fantastic but no better than a $5 lip balm. Rather disappointed.
Bought this during the 20% off and it's so good omg. Can't go back to regular Chapstick after this.
My lips getting worse and worse with this product!

reviews.review_title: just as good as a 3$ lip baum
reviews.review_text: I have been using this lip baum for 3 months now and I find it just as good as a 2$ lipbaum from a drugstore. I was very disappointed, my lips are very dry and i use it 10 times a day and nothing improved. Not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because I have very dry skin and with getting older, my lips are also dry. I have been using this product for a few weeks and I see no change in the texture or dryness of my lips. I find that this product is overpriced since a 5 dollar lip gloss seems to have the same effect. This product does go on easily like silk and does make lips feel soft once applied.
I purchased this product thinking it was gonna be a super thick, moisturizing lip balm. I put it on and it wasn't thick at all. It just felt like a regular all day lip balm, not really a treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Fresh Advanced Therapy balm for about a year, and it has done wonders for my formerly dry, cracked lips. It's incredibly hydrating and has great lasting power. A tiny bit goes a very long way - I would definitely caution anyone from using it directly before applying any kind of lip color, as it is initially very emollient. I use mine as a night treatment, and then again right after I brush my teeth  in the morning so it has time to absorb before I do any makeup. This will continue to be a staple in my skincare arsenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it very hydrating good for winter season

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This chapsticks is a miracle worker. It will save you from any winter dryness. I use it before bed and in the mornings. One this is that you need to wait sometime before applying lipstick, especially Matte ones

After years of trying every dry lip product that has ever been made I FINALLY have a winner.  Yes, that's a pricey chapstick but trust me... it's worth every cent if you have dry, peeling, cracked chapped lips.
I wanted to hate it but I couldn't. It hydrates my lips for days even if I skip a day of putting it on. Purchased 4 times
Bought this for my daughter whose lips are constantly peeling, since the first day she started using it we saw improvement and has been improving ever since.

I buy this all the time because it is the only thing that truly protects my lips in the winter! Plus I am allergic to a few chemicals in lipsticks so I basically have to use this after a reaction because it's the only thing that actually heals the dryness. The only thing I don't like about it is that it's so expensive... Definitely need to keep track of these to not lose them like most chapsticks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I hate how much I love this $26 glorified chapstick, but I do. I love it. I use it more than any other lip product. I don't give it 5 stars because I don't think it has any actual long term effects.
Mild and moisturizing, this lip treatment is amazing on dry lips.  It's colourless but leaves a shine.  Feels amazing as you apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I don't know why so many people love this, I saw no difference in my lips after regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip treatment I have ever used. I buy it over and over again and I love to give it as a little gift, too. Feels moisturizing without being sticky or gloopy. Has real staying power, too! It also helps that it smells fantastic!
Why does it have to be so pricey? Despite this I am in lip balm love. Will just not look as I hit purchase  when I reorder again.

I saw no difference in my lips after using his product for a few weeks. I got the same effect as I do from a cheap $3 lip balm. Granted, I do have very dry lips but I still expected it to be at least more effective than a cheap balm.

I use this lip balm once or twice a day- always at night and sometimes as prep before putting on makeup. It lasts for a long time, and has really worked to keep my lips smooth, even with daily use of matte lipsticks.

My lips were chronically dry to the point that they were peeling all the time.  I tried every Chapstick constantly without success, and vaseline-based products made it even more obvious that I had a problem.  I hate that this is soft and I go through it quickly, but my lips look normal again so I can't live without this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical about the price for a lip balm but this stuff is fantastic! I have horribly dry lips all year round and can't find anything else that keeps moisture in like this stuff does. Its instantly soothing and has a wonderful scent to it.
Simply the best brand for lip treatment!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I hate having dry lips, and I hate putting on a liquid lipstick that dry's matte so I was looking for something that wouldn't make me have dry and gross lips so someone recommended me to buy it and I did instantly I luv this so much worth the money

This made my lips drier than before I began using it. Stick with the cheaper regular one. This one is so soft you run through it so quickly and it isn't effective. Sorry for that price it should be a miracle worker.
This is so moisturizing and I like to go over the edge of my lips to help treat any fine lines and keep them from forming. In the morning they still feel soothed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I first tried the original formula with spf and for some reason wasn't blown away with it until I tried the advanced version. I had a few samples I went through and it wasn't until another balm I used at the time was discontinued, that I finally bit the bullet and purchased the FS. This is definitely pricey, but I find it to last considerably long, as I mostly  use it in the AM while getting ready. It makes a great balm to hydrate your lips prior to lipstick application as it really sinks in and will stay with you (most especially for under matte/liquid lips). For the cost i don't always carry this with me and prefer to alternate with another less pricey balm. However, I do think its worth the price to at least try once. It's also on the softer side so id skip carrying it in warmer climates /months.
Best lip balm. Pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: While it did hydrate, I expected more for the amount that it cost.  Basic Blistex does just as well and doesn't cost a fortune.  I tried this product for the first time and I'll finish it off, but won't buy it again.  Not sure what all the fuss is about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: BEST HYDRATING LIPBALM IN THE WORLD WORKS MAGIC OVERNIGHT ALSO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This formula is AMAZING!  I have VERY flaky lips and have developed the horrible habit of constantly picking the flaky skin from them.  I put this on every night (I received it as a sample and that sample lasted about 3 months) and in the morning, lips have NO flakes!  It makes lips supple, hydrated, and helps with lines!!!  Definitely makes a plumper and more youthful pout!  NOT STICKY AT ALL!  Very pleasant feel and no harsh smells whatsoever (I don't think there IS a scent, actually).  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!  I am buying the full sized product now and will never again live without it.  It has given me the softest lips I've ever had and I am now purchasing their primer and scrub with this item!
I love it! I use it in the morning & at night. Helps keep my lips soft all day.

I was looking for a good winter lip balm, that would keep my lips hydrated during the dry months. However this one did not work for me (maybe it works better for others). In my experience, I returned it after 3 days of use, because my lips had become even dryer after using it. Which was odd, because my lips weren't that chapped to begin with. I noticed after i put on a generous amount on my lips - approximately 40 minuets later my lips were dry and flaking from just sitting at my desk. I've never had a lip-balm do that to my lips before - so i returned it.   There were some pros about it though: It isn't highly scented, it doesn't leave a greasy or sticky feeling on your lips, which was nice. However for the price - i expected it to at least hydrate my lips for a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: When my lips got painfully dry from the cold weather last year, I tried every chapstick I could find.  But this was the only cure! It keeps my lips hydrated without feeling coated in wax. It's a bit pricey, but definitely worth the money. I use it every night and only needed a new tube after using it for a year.

I have extremely dry lips, and find myself reapplying chapstick 10-15 times a day. This stuff is pricy, but definitely worth it. It feels great on my lips. I also purchased the lip scrub--which I do about once every 2 weeks. Just like your face, if you have dry skin, it helps to exfoliate the lips, too. I also purchased this lip treatment in rose and love it so much. I see many more tubes of this in my future. An added plus is the actual product design--the lid doesn't just click in place, but actually screws on, such that there's no risk that it will open when tossed around at the bottom of my purse. Thank goodness!

reviews.review_title: So good I might shell out the crazy price again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wish I could tell you this stuff is overrated, because it's definitely overpriced. But it's probably the best lip balm I've ever used. No waxiness, stickiness or greasiness. A subtle but pleasant scent, and no flavor. It leaves lips really soft and with a nice sheen.  It also lasts for several hours -- I'd put it on at night and wake up with my lips still moisturized. The drugstore brands I've been using are much  With daily or twice daily use, I think one tube of this lasted me about six months.
It's a good Chapstick. Moisturizes well. But not any better than any number of way cheaper options. Would not buy again
This is by far the best stuff I've ever used for my lips! It's so moisturizing, I will never turn to anything else!

This stuff WORKS. I have cracked lips constantly, and with winter coming I needed something to work well and my gods this one does! Only complaint is how fast I go through it, but that's sorta a me problem

I like using this lip treatment at night before I go to bed. My lips feel so soft in the morning. It's not sticky or thick. I thought I could use it before I put a lipstick or liquid lipstick on it, but it just sits as a layer on my lips. So I would recommend using it at night so it can absorb into your lips so they're ready for the next day!
The lip balm itself is fantastic, but the balm lasts about half as long as other lip balms which makes the price even more absurd. Not much of a return on a $26 chapstick investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I went to Sephora specifically for an overnight lip treatment because my lips have been pretty dry lately. The lady working there took me straight to this product and assured me that it was exactly what I needed, and that it was her favorite product in the store as far as lip care. I bought it, despite the price, and I have no regrets. I use it whenever regular lip balm isn't cutting it, and I wear it to sleep. My lips are never chapped/peeling anymore, and it's only been a couple weeks. It goes on smooth and is build-able, so if you prefer a thicker texture, just keep applying. Don't let the name fool you - this isn't an exfoliating sugar scrub, it's buttery soft and my lips look super healthy now. Love it.
I think it's a great product. It definitely helps moisturize my lips and it smells great! It's a bit pricey though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, however I could not. This left my lips feeling dry and flaky even after using a lip scrub. I really did not like this product as I found it was exremely thin, and did not stay on my lips for long. I will be returning this.

Best lip balm I've ever found! The price is a bit steep, but once you try it you realize it's worth it! Goes on smooth but not sticky. I can apply it at night and it's still there in the morning. Love this stuff!
I apply this once in the morning and for the rest of the day my lips are moisturizer and nourished. I love this stuff.
I like this product but it is pricy. For the price I prefer their product with the tint.
I'm hooked!  Even my Husband is hooked.  Love the feel, it lasts, and it keeps my lips healthy.  I use it maybe twice a day.

I'm currently on a medication that completely dries your lips out as a side effect, but with the constant use of this stuff, I have hardly experienced that at all (which is apparently rare!). This stuff has really saved my lips. I use it all day long (on my 5th tube!) and nothing even comes close. Trust me when I say that I have tried everything. I especially love to use it at night with the Bite Beauty Agave Lip Mask over the top. When I wake up my lips are soft and supple. Definitely recommend if you're suffering with dry lips!

i love this lip balm. its smooth and hydrating. plus it smells like trix cereal. ive also tried the rose and the original w spf. the only downside is the hefty price tag. but it lasts a while. and it works.

This is the only lip balm that has helped my chronically chapped lips. I've tried everything, and all the other brands either eventually make them more chapped so that I'm dependent on using balm, or do nothing to help at all. Yes, it's expensive but a little goes a long way and I use a tube everyday for several months at a time without running out. This stuff is worth it.

I got a sample of the sugar lip balm that was in a pan. I loved it so much that I ordered this. I thought I would like this product more bc of the packaging. However, even though the two products have the same name, this is not the same thing. This has an awful chemical taste.

This is one lip balm that absolutely does what it says it will.  It delivers!  I'm a huge fan of the tinted Fresh Sugar lips but I love this too for night time application. My son also uses this when his lips get really dry in the Winter and it works within a day or two to restore them back to normal.

I absolutely will repurchase this over and over and over and over again! It smells AMAZING but subtle. The smell is what sold me but as soon as applied it I was in love! I'm purchasing one for my purse, my vanity and my bedside table!

reviews.review_title: Only lip treatment you'll ever need!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the only product I've used which actually heal my dry chapped lips. I only use it once a day in the morning and it keeps my lips soft and moisturized all day and night. I have tried literally 40 types of lip treatments, balms etc. over the years included medicated ones and this is the only one which works 24-7-365.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: ......just ridiculously expensive.  love it does great but unfortunately there are tons of other way less expensive options.  do like it a lot tho.
I bought this after I tried a deluxe sample size. I use only on daytime before my lipstick, it made my thin lips plumped, hydrated and also prime my lips make lipstick last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i use this in the morning when i moisturize my face, and then again throughout the day, and again at night before i go to sleep. this stuff is the BOMB and especially after using the sugar lip scrub, my lips feel silky smooth!

I love the FRESH Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment.  I've been struggling with dry, cracked and peeling lips lately and this improved the texture of my lips in a short amount of time. Makes my lipstick look so much better and gives it staying power. I will say however, I've used the regular lip treatment before and it worked just fine.  Once this advanced one is done, I'll go back to buying the regular one.

I love all the Fresh lip balms. I don't wear much else, and I have been thinking of giving away the other stuff I have. This is my favorite night time treatment. I wear it to bed every night and it keeps my lips hydrated and soft. I love it. I love the stick since it's more sanitary.

when I first used this product my lips felt extremely moisturized, but a week or two after i bought it the lip balm stick split and fell of the applicator... so disappointed because it was pricey for a lip balm.

Goes on buttery smooth! The scent is subtle and amazing. I was reluctant to spend $30 on this but I'm glad I did. Worth it IMO :) I will absolutely buy this again when it runs out (it's a large tube so I likely won't need a new one for quite some time).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: While expensive, this is the best lip treatment I have ever used! I am addicted, I go through it like crazy. It feels amazing on my lips, and keeps them hydrated for a very long time before having to reapply. Highly recommended!
I've used this product for years to keep my lips moist at night, and super soft in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE THE WAY IT FEELS ON MY LIPS

A sephora employee told me about it when she was putting on a liquid lipstick for me, and I couldn't stop thinking about it. This has done WONDERS for my lips and repairs any and all damage. Best lip treatment around!

reviews.review_title: The best all around lip balm!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Honestly I do not buy anything else anymore. This has made my lips so soft and hydrated. I never have to worry about chapped lips. I put it on once every evening. In the winter I will put some on in the morning as well.
I wear this at night to fight chapped lips and overall signs of aging. I have not found anything better, this is a MUST for me.

I got this in a Black Tea Age Delay kit. I really like this lip treatment. I use it throughout the day and before bed. I find that the balm feels refreshing on and gives my lips a nice glow. I would buy this again. It will melt in heat so be careful if you're carrying on a hot, summer day.
If you're thinking this is just an overpriced Chapstick, you're very wrong! This gives my lips life. So worth the money!

reviews.review_title: I got the sample and wow
reviews.review_text: I'm blown away, I got a sample of this with an order I started using it about 4 days ago my lips are like new! Full size here I come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this item along with the Fresh Sugar Lip Polish. Back around Father's Day my lips became severely chapped seemingly out of nowhere.  I tried everything to get them back to their normal, soft selves. I drank loads of extra water in case I was just dehydrated. No change. I tried 2-3 different kinds of lip balms for a week each. No change. Nothing was working and my lips were painfully cracking and peeling.  I bought this and the lip polish and here I am a week later and my lips are almost completely back to normal! I used the scrub twice and used the lip treatment every day, multiple times a day. My lips are no longer cracking, and the old cracks are healing. I still don't know what caused it, I'm just so glad this seems to have made it stop!  I love this product and will be telling everyone I know about it. It's got a sweet, fruity smell and a nice, smooth texture that almost feels like Vaseline or something but not sticky like Vaseline is. It's a little more of an oily feel. It adds and retains moisture and lasts a pretty decent amount of time, unlike other brands that I felt like I was reapplying every 10-15 minutes. It's a little softer that most lip balms, so you want to be a little gentle with it when putting it on.  The tube is great quality, too. It's a sturdy metal tube that you screw on rather than popping it on and off. This ensures that it doesn't easily pop off when bouncing around the bottom of my purse.  Worth every dollar!!!

Smells like fruity pebbles! I like it a lot and it does what it's supposed to. Only complaint is that it's not thick like other lip balms I've used, it's very oily I guess I would say? I feel like I have to reapply it a lot but it's sooooo good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you love moisturized lips, then you will love this!  I keep this on my night stand, and use it in the morning, and before I go to sleep.  It feels so smooth going on the lips, is a bit thicker than regular lip balms (without being  blobby), is Amazingly Moisturizing, and you can wear alone or under a lipstick.  I ran out of it recently, and figured I'd save some money and just use the cheap drugstore lip balms, BUT I actually Missed this!  I don't have to reapply as much as I do the drugstore lip balms, and it's way more moisturizing, so you definitely get what you pay for.  Now I will never be without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this balm. It's the only lip moisturizer I've been using for the past few years. The drugstore balms I have to apply at least every hour. This I put on in the morning and on the way home from work, I can still feel the formula working. The only con for me is, I have combo skin so by the end of the day, my face can get pretty oily and the balm feels like it's wondered outside the lip line a bit. But it does it's job and moisturizes!! My must have in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing, smoothing, soothing, not oily or sticky. A great lip balm. I have always had very dry lips that peel. I have tried numerous products from chapstick, carman to expensive department store treatments and this is the best. The lip peel has gone, my lips are soft and feel good. I got this as a sample but will purchase it. I got the stick and the pot, no color and a color to try. The color needs to be more sheer - I don't like the way the color builds with each application. I don't like sticking my finger in a product to use it and the stick has some engineering problems that need to be solved. The product seems smaller than the case and it looks like it could break easy. I roll up just enough to apply. I do like the little screw action on the case top, it keeps the top from coming off in your purse or makeup bag.
Its very moisturizing, smells great and feels very nice on the lips. Only con is that it doesnt stay on and you need to reapply constantly.

My lips and skin react to random products (must be allergic to something), but this has never made my lips react. It's smooth, feels lovely, and smells so nice. It repairs my lips when they are irritated or dry. Love it so much. Received it as a sample, bought the full one and never regretted it.
this smells amazing and works wonders. I can already tell this is going to be one of my essentials

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I don't know if I have ever loved a beauty product as much as I love this Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment! I'm not one that would usually pay that much for a lip product, but I LOVE it. I bought one about 6 months and recently lost it. I couldn't live without it and had to go buy another one! Highly recommend to anyone who really doesn't like (or need) lip color/lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: The most moisturizing lip treatment. Buy this one instead of the Sugar Lip Serum Advanced Therapy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Works great gets rid of chap lips in 1 day! Only complaint is the packaging. The product does not stay in its tube form since it is so soft, don't twist it up too much.
What?? I have very very very dry lips. This is not for me at all. It smells good. Same texture and staying power as a common drugstore brand tho. Won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny! After an allergic reaction to a cheap drug store lip balm this fantastic product healed my lips in 2 days and is now my staple go to lip balm for everyday use!

reviews.review_title: fresh is best for daytime lips
reviews.review_text: I first received a set of assorted mini's then purchased a larger set of assorted mini's for more colors. Both sets came with the advanced therapy which is clear and out of all of my mini's both of these were completely gone first....obviously my favorite. I wear this daily throughout the day and love how it feels light and smooth. I have not worn this to bed as I have a stronger Chapstick that I swear by for bedtime, Dr Dans Cortibalm. Finishing up on Accutane and having insanely dry lips when bare these 2 items have saved my lips the most!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is great for frequent application-keeps lips soft and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a mini sample of this with being yet again a VIB Rouge member last week. I tried it on today, yup, going to buy this from now on. I love how smooth, hydrating and lemony smell it is. I'm not sure why this is a couple dollars more than their original but it's great, my only complaint is that there's no SPF in it like the others, bummer on that part. But overall I do really love this and the packaging is so sleek, beautiful and pretty to look at.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every morning and I don't have dry lips at all during the day.
Love it!!! Only Chapstick I will ever use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just got a deluxe sample of this product - and it was love at first application. It's SO good. Simple smell, goes on nicely, doesn't feel to thick or even too watery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ok. My search for the best lip treatment - Chap Stick replacement is over! This is hydrating and not chalky. It is soft and doesn't leave my lip dried out feeling. I'm loving it. It is my new favorite to put on right before I go to bed! Will repurchase again and again! Pricey but worth every penny!

I struggle with constant dry, chapped, and peeling lips, so after reading most of the reviews, I decided to give this a try. After applying to my lips regularly during the day and overnight for around two months, I think it should not be called a lip treatment. To me, lip treatments are supposed to make your lips soft and not dry after the product is off, but this was basically a fancy lip balm that I had to constantly reapply. The product did not improve my lips, so for me, it's not worth the price.  If you struggle with chronic chapped lips then I suggest skipping this product and trying a snail lip treatment instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This advanced lip treatment is exactly as it claims to be...Advanced. With a blend of such natural and incredible ingredients, my lips after the first use were more supple, hydrated, plump and smooth! The product is silky and easy to apply. Received as a sample, but will 100% purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is magic. I just needed a lip balm so I got this one...very moisturizing and I've noticed a difference in the fullness of my lips after a week of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: So in love with this lip balm/treatment. definately the best i've tried. I've gone through 3 of these!  it goes on smoothly sort of oily instead of balmy, dries quick. If you have very chapped lips, put a lot of this on at night and in the morning your lips will be SO smooth!

This is by far my most favorite lip balm that I have ever used. I love the healing benefits that come with it. Moisture lasts long. I need to by another tube, one for before bed, and one for my purse. It's not too oily (thin) or goopy (thick). Goes on smooth and smells fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used this product every night as a moisturizer for my lips in anticipation of wearing lipsticks the next day. It's pricey but I love everything about it. SUPER hydrating and smells amazing.
I loved this until it melted in my room and broke. What a waste of 28 dollars. Smh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just got this in the mail and tried it. It SMELLS nice but certainly doesn't TASTE good. Which is a good thing. Otherwise you'd lick it off and have to reapply it. I was actually worried it'd taste like sugar lol it's actually a bit bitter. The moisturization feels very nice and it isn't sticky or greasy. Will definitely order again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite lip product to use. My lips get out of this world dry in the winter to the point where they crack and bleed and this is the only thing I have tried that's actually helped and made a difference. Now if only I could stop losing every one I buy.....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this lip product because I was having ridiculously chapped lips in the middle of the summer. The corners of my mouth were literally cracking, and being a chapstick addict, I went into crisis mode and was re-applying constantly. I went into Sephora looking for a lip mask, and one of the fine ladies in the store gave me this instead. It improved after one application. Literally overnight. My lips are 100 times better. I love this stuff. It's totally worth the money if you are having issues with dry lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this on sheer whim after going through my dry lips all day. I have super dry lips, they're always peeling and no lip balm ever seems to work, in fact some made it worse.  After the first use, my lips felt quenched with the use and immediately felt very hydrated and looked way better after day 1. Of course, I still reapply but not as often as other balms. Very hefty price tag, but for it being the only one that works for me, i'll buy it again.
This is the only lip balm I use, its natural and works better than anything else ive ever tried, absolutely love this product. Its a bit pricey but worth every penny.

I absolutely love this product! I got the deluxe sample and it was the best product I received with my order. I have super dry lips and this has been the only product that has ever completely rid me of the dryness.   Now with this being said, as much as I love it, I would never buy this product. Is is way too expensive. If they reduced the price or gave you more product, then I would definitely consider it, but for the amount of treatment you get for the cost is simply not worth it. Sorry Fresh.

reviews.review_title: the only lip moisturizer I buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: nothing else works as good, it's pricey but work it

reviews.review_title: works great, but doesn't last long
reviews.review_text: Applies well, my lips feels moisturized. However, it does not last long. Finishes much too quick...esp. for the price. Works great though...
I would definitely purchase this again! It goes on really well, and is so soft.

I actually purchased this because a YouTuber had recommended it to me and I have to say this did not disappoint. Its scent is a very mild, citrusy smell that's quite pleasant and really nice. The way this balm sits on the lips is just beautiful, it's not too greasy and it doesn't evaporate but it absorbs into the skin to make the lips just feel very nourished. I like to use this product at night before I go to sleep and when I wake up in the morning my lips are not only soft,  they feel plump, and I just can't give this enough stars it's an amazing product and I definitely recommend it if you have dry or chapped lips.    Also I have to recommend this to you if you are a liquid lipstick wearer.  We all know how Matte liquid lipsticks can really dry out the lips and give them a very raisin kind of texture. Using this balm after removing your liquid lipstick will help to restore your lips and reduce the amount of damage that those drying liquid lipsticks can cause .

I was excited to get this as a sample. My lips are pretty chapped and I was looking forward to getting something that works! I think it actually made my lips more chapped. Just finished it and they are still super dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I chose this as one of my samples with an order. When I run out, I will DEFINITELY buy more. Conditioned my lips overnight, and they felt moisturized and soft all the next day, even under my long-wear lipstick. No noticeable scent, which, really, do we need more scented products right before bed?
It's a really nice balm treatment. Very moisturizing and extremely soft against the lips but I had to reapply every 30 minutes or so. The tube didn't last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: First I received this as a sample size. I use it mainly overnight. I must say I am very happy with the product. I have tried many lip treatments homemade lip balms, endless chap sticks and Vaseline. None of which have worked. However, this little guy has been working so well for me. It stays on all night and in the morning my lips are so soft, silky, plump and not cracked or chapped. I will be buying this full size when I'm done with the sample. Overall, yes I think it is worth a try if you're out there searching for a lip treatment. I took the picture attached this morning. I had to write a review because I am so happy with this!

I received this as a sample and I'm really enjoying it. It's not one of those super artificial lip balms that burns your lips or contains alcohol so you haven't to constantly reapply it. It truly moisturizes your lips. It feels luxurious as your applying it and deeply hydrates my super dry lips. The only downfall is the price. 26 dollars for a lip balm is a bit silly. But, if the price doesn't matter I fully recommend trying this out!

reviews.review_title: A moisturizing lip balm that has lasting effects
reviews.review_text: I have the habit of putting lip balm on my lips before going to sleep. And being a lip balm addict I've really gone thru a lot of different brands from cheap to expansive. This is one of my favourite one as it keeps the lips moisturized all night, it gives you soft and plump lips in the morning. Goes really well under lipsticks too because it's not too oily. There's no flavour or any smell to it. The only down side is it's price. Still highly recommend this product.
Leaves my lips moisturized and defined. I wear it to sleep and wake up to full luscious lips.
I love this lip balm! It's definitely pricey, but worth it because it moisturizes better than any other lip treatment I've used before & the ingredients list is packed w/good stuff. Two thumbs up!!

I love this lip balm treatment, it really hydrates my lips after I exfoliate them because I have pretty dry lips. However, I do find myself constantly reapplying it throughout the day because my lips dry out. Other than that it is super smooth and smells so yummy!

I have been using this for about 5 years now and haven't found any lip balm that can compare. I use it ever night and throughout the day. I suggest putting it on lightly because it glides on and I have accidentally broken one before by pressing to hard when applying.
The lipstick it's so fragile and sticky, it broke into two pieces while I was using it. Would not buy again.
The best Lip Chap ever. Leaves lips hydrated from the first application to the end of the day.
Glides on & keeps lips moisturized!

This is the best lip balm I have ever experienced. I love this so much, it lasts so long, and moisturizers my lips perfectly. When I use a really drying liquid lipstick, I put his on first and drying no more!

The lip balm does almost everything it claims. It is moisturizing, calming, and healing. There is a slight adjusting period where my lips were shedding skin, and after a while the reaction went away. I use it every day now before lip gloss/lip stick, but I would not purchase this again. I find the smell too strong and when I accidentally consume the lip balm (eating or drinking after putting on the product), it has a very artificial taste. Everyone says it's worth the price but I don't think so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It works under the lipstick or just as a moisturizer before bed. It's hydrating but not as much as Dior's Creme de Rose Lip Balm. I use Sugar Fresh during the evening, Dior before bed, and Marc Jacobs Lip Lock Moisture Balm (has spf) when I plan on spending time in the sun.  But, I always end up using the Sugar Fresh one first and it's always my first product to run out.

This has been one of the best chopsticks' lip balms I have ever purchased. My lips had started to suffer after years of playing sports in the sun! These rejuvenated my lips and brought them back to life. I use it all the time now! It is true that is pricey compared to other options and it does go relatively quick, but I can't complain after the difference I've seen!
I use this at night before bed. I was using la mer, but it didn't help at all. This rocks.
Most products only temporarily help.  So far this has been my #1 jam.  Put on at bed & wake up moisturized.  Lasting & no need for constant re-application.

I use this lip treatment every day and had to buy an additional one this past winter for my son.  He gets very chapped lips and this is the only lip treatment he will use.  He says every other kind stings when he puts it on.  He puts it on at bedtime and the redness is almost gone in the morning.  I use it at bedtime also, and in the morning before I put on lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had an allergic reaction to a lipstick and was battling the red, chapped results. This offered very fast relief. Only reason I took a star off was the cost. Hopefully it will actually have anti aging benefits...then it'll get that 5th star!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love this lip balm. Its weird because when I first touch it to my lips it almost melts but in a nice way. Super hydrating.

Guys guys. For the longest time i resisted myself from buying this since it was 26 bucks for a chapstick! I only gave in when my upper lip on the right side started to be really flaky and dry all of a sudden. I tried 3 different drugstore chapstick and felt like the made my lips were drier than ever. Scent smells ah-mazingggg and glides on beautifully. I applied for the first time before i went to bed and when i woke up my lips was so soft and plump and gorgeous! I applied the tulip one before work and gave me moisture for the 8 hours. Literally converted now. Will be repurchasing.

I love this lip balm...very moisturizing and not sticky at all...feels great on the lips..held back on giving 5 stars because it's a little pricey and the tube doesn't last long...I find I have to repurchase far more often than other balms...

Only lip chap that gives my lips a noticeable plumped/juicy look. It's obviously not a lip plumper but whatever the formula is makes it super moisturizing and not waxy which is key for a fuller looking lip

I get very dry lips. A couple months ago, I started to put this on every night before bed and use an SPF Fresh lip balm under lipstick/gloss in the AM. Occasionally I'll use the lip sugar scrub, too. My boyfriend actually noticed that my lips are never dry anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is the only lip balm i ever use and probably will use, find it to be so much better than the 'regular' sugar balms.

Considering the cost of this product, I expected it to work wonders. However, it is no different than any other chapstick and the actual chapstick broke inside the tube when twisting out, and I was careful when applying it. The packaging should be reconsidered. Not worth the money, please consider buying something else that costs less and is just as effective. Wish I could get my money back, paid almost $30.

I got this as a sample a few months ago and fell in love with how moisturizing it ia. Coupled with Fresh's other amazing lip care products, I've noticed a significant difference in the condition of my lips after a few weeks. My lips don't as chapped easily and lipstick and lip gloss application is a lot easier and I don't have to prime my lips so much. I will definitely be repurchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I know it is SO incredibly pricey, but I feel its worth the splurge. I drink a ton of water but without the combination of both water and this lip balm, my lips wouldn't achieve such softness. This has become such a necessity to survive the cold bitter Winter weather. I'm in my second tube now. It lasts me about a year. And it's also helped me pull off lippie products for a longer period of time daily. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip product.  I use it every night and always wake up with my lips feeling plump and hydrated.  I'm already on my second tube of it.  Highly recommend- it's worth the splurge!
Yes this is very expensive for lip balm, however it is incredibly silky and thick. Not waxy at all. Personal fav. Heaven!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Feels so good on the lips when dry. Doesn't really have a scent. Very hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: great lip treatment. Not too heavy, hydrates overnight. great when used in combination with sugar scrub

I have been using this overnight for weeks and I haven't seen much of a difference. I wish I can return it and get my money back. I found basin brand lip balm stays on longer and moisturizes better. I'm never buying this product and would not recommend. I'm sorry for bad review.

I adore this product. I don't understand how it can have a 3 star average. I can't live without this product.  I find it to be extremely hydrating. It soothes my horribly chapped lips, and my lips get so bad they bleed. It's not sticky, it doesn't sit on your lips forever. It sinks in and does an awesome job.  If anyone is taking Accutane (or any generic form), this is a life saver. I used a different product, from Sephora also, when on a lower dose but I wish I'd bitten the bullet and tried this sooner. It's worth the cost. Trust me. It's gentle and works like a charm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing and absorbs quickly. It really feels like it actually absorbs into my lips and nourishes them; it doesn't just sit on top and make them feel soft until it wears off. I also feel like it makes my lips appear plumper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent product, I have come back to every time. It is not like the regular over the counter like products from the drug store, much better formulated.
I use this every night before bed.  Lips are moist and plumped in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is my absolute favorite product that Seohora sells. It's very moisturizing & not greasy or sticky. I also love the screw on lid; it won't ever accidentally open up in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it! So smooth and silky. Love the scent. I am addicted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've used these products for ages and I can't say enough great things about them!  I love the homogenous blend and how it feels on my lips.  GREAT for hydrating!

This stuff is amazing! I suffer from dry, chapped lips in the summer, and swollen, sunburnt lips in the summer. When I regularly use this product, I don't have to worry about either one. I hate leaving home without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best I have found so far.  Will not go without now.

I wanted something for my lips at night before bed but without spf. I use the Rose lip treatment for my moisturizer before I apply liquid lipstick and LOVE it so I decided to give this a try. I'm totally not surprised that I LOVE this product too!! Definitely moisturizing with only one swipe across my lips and they didn't feel dry when I woke up so for me that is 5 stars! This is actually a lip treatment that does what it says it will! I will definitely repurchase :)

reviews.review_title: Applying this balm is a mini gift to yourself!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Look no further for a great lip balm. I keep a tube near my sink and apply every morning after I've brushed my teeth and am preparing for the day. Another tube is in my purse and used often daily. Lips feel most, comfortable, never sticky and well taken care of. Applying it is a mini-treat every day.  I'm a very fickle lip product user. I think I'm on my 14th tube of this product!
i use it with the lip polish, it has worked great for me. I hated how my lips looked with all liquid lipsticks before trying these products. I will agree that it is too expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love everything about it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly sensitive skin, and this is the only thing that does not make my lips peel. I have tried everything from drug store brands, to other brands Sephora carries, but all have left my lips dry and peeling. I even stopped using this at one point last year because of the price, but was unable to find anything that came close to moisturizing my lips like this treatment. Even my husband uses it when his lips are dry. Great product and will continue to purchase this!
Best lip treatment ever!
Not good or worth the money . I felt that it did not moisturize my lips at all in fact it mad my lips worse . Only felt nice just for the moment didn't last or help at all .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'd give this six stars if I could. I died inside the day First Aid Beauty took its hydrocortisone stick off the shelves, and immediately started looking for an alternative to keep dryness and clown-mouth under control. This stuff is incredible--it hydrates without being greasy, and exfoliates without causing peeling. My lips look so good now that I can actually use the treatment on its own--delicious ;)

I purchased this item thinking it would help keep my lips soft but that didn't happen. First off, when first applying it's too much. It looks too glossy and the taste is weird. I wouldn't recommend this product to those who don't want their lip Balm to look too glossy. It felt heavy, if that makes any sense.

Phenomenal lip treatment, but minus one star for price. I love this lip gloss beyond belief, but can't justify the price considering all lip glosses vanish into the thin air for us girls. Perfect amount of moisture, smell is mediocre but this one gets the job done!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment is the most moisturizing lip product I've ever found! I put it on as I go to bed and I can still feel it when I wake up 8 hrs later! My lips are soooo much softer since I started using it. LOVE THIS!!!

reviews.review_title: good but the nourishing balm is way better
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after using the balm form, hoping it would work the same and be a little less messy. This is still a great chapstick for regular chapped lips. But if you have super dry lips and are looking for something that will completely nourish them. Get the fresh sugar nourushing balm instead.

Most amazing Chapstick ever. I know the price seems ridiculous for a Chapstick, but your lips look SO good with this on! I don't know how something without color can look so good, but it's incredible. I also like the nude and honey versions for a bit of color.

I usually never write reviews but I decided to purchase this after a long weekend of being outside (Chicago = windy) and I got HORRIBLE chapped lips and thought to give this a try. I am not kidding you, after applying this all day...my lips were amazingly soft, supple you couldn't even tell I had EXTREMELY chapped lips the day before. Wish I had before and after pictures. Absolutely worth the money. Feels like velvet and really soaks in your lips not just a layer that sits on top. Will repurchase when gone.
Great product!!!! Little pricey, yet still willing to keep buying.
I apply it three times a day and it works wonderfully my lips are soft and the taste on my lips is like candy

This lip balm melts. One day I went to put it on my lips I opened it and I saw that it was melted and the second I touched it it fell off and it finished really quickly. To be honest it is expensive for a lip balm and to melt off and finish that quick I dont think its worth it.

I'm not too impressed w it yes it defiantly makes you lips soft and I love the way it glides and feels on my lips also it doesn't last long meaning the product runs out quickly and before you know it the tube's empty I just don't see a huge difference from it especially for the $$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment. Leaves my lips smooth and soft and has the faintest hint of lemon smell.  I hope this is sold for years to come. Great lip stuff.

After trying A LOT of different lip balms, this is honestly the best and my go to. Very hydrating and long lasting, especially during the winter. The only thing I didn't quite like was the price because it is a little pricey for something that little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff but is very  pricey. If it would stay in tack it would be worth it. But it falls apart and melts very easily. It does feel very good on lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of these - cheap and expensive - but this one is the best out there! It repairs the lips overnight!!! I am not a big fan of regular lipstics but especially during winter I have to wear a light lipstics and my lips do get cracked (winters in Canada are something!) This is my ultimate go to. Really, it's the best!  I am also a big fan of Sugar Lip Treatment - they moisturize and give a subtle tint. Strongly recommend!

I used to use Peter Thomas Roth lip serum but my lips were still chapped. I was using an additional lip balm to help with that issue. This Fresh treatment not only works like magic on chapped dry lips, but it has actually improved the look of my lips. They are fuller and my lines are basically gone. Same improvements that the PTR boasts its product will do...and I only have to use ONE thing. It goes on smooth and makes your lips instantly feel better. I can't recommend this lip treatment more!

reviews.review_title: will never go back to Chapstick
reviews.review_text: This is well worth the money. You only need a little to get all the benefits. This product is long lasting, moisture will not leave your lips. I introduced this to my fiance and he is also a fan. Does not leave any sheen on the lips

I don't usually wear lip balm or lipstick because I can't deal with the feeling of having something on my lips, but this is something that I put on without even thinking twice. It's seriously the best. A bit pricey for a lip treatment but seriously worth it.

I admire most of fresh products however this one did not help me that much. I have really dry lips in every winters and it breaks every single time I open my mouth. It has been pretty serious for years and I finally made a decision to give it a try even though It's 26 bucks lip balm. It smooths lips surface instantly and it feels good but it does not stay on it that long and i dont think it moistures deeply so i didnt see any result other than instant smooth feeling and short results but not ultimate. I completely emptied the one product which took me about only 2 months to finish (i literally used this product at least 5 tomes a day and everyday) and no result. It's just nice packaging and wording. It doesnt do its job.

I do really like this lip treatment, it is smooth, instantly smooths my awful chapped lips. I would love something that would heal my chapped lips and still allow me to wear liquid lipsticks (I may be asking for too much here). Will definitely keep using this, it goes quickly as it is very soft. I like the packaging, feels sturdy and strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Quick take -it ACTUALLY WORKS! -You get a good amount of product for the price -It doesn't have a heavy or very noticeable smell -It instantly nourishes your lips, a complete 160 and turn over, I could have chapped lips and within the next 5 minutes they are soothed -Great for winter, and great for dry climates, great any time of year to be honest  I recommend this!

I love this product. I have been through multiple brands of lip balms. Chap sticks everything to keep my lips hydrated I have bad chap lips this product had finally done it for me to love it. I have bought about 3 of this and still in love. But the reason for my review in stars is because the amount that comes in this tub is very little. I go through this so fast it's not even funny. And it's not because I put on a lot it just tends to glide on in chunks. As well as the price 26 for lip balm that doesn't last long it's to high. Yes I realize I continue buying it but only becauee this is the only product that has done it for my lips and until I can find a better one that does the job this one does I am stuck...
The greatest lip balm I huff ever tried. However it is quite pricey and doesn't last as long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a little pricey, but this definitely makes your lips hydrated. I always struggled with chapped lips and I finally bought something pricier than drugstore products, and it's been working out great

When I first started using this I was hooked. It smells amazing of sweet lemons. The texture is so creamy I love it. And my lips feel great even in this cold brisk Wisconsin winter. I have a few complaints though. It is so heat sensitive and gets loose from the base so it's scraping the inside of the tube when I twist it. I've gone through my first tube in 4 weeks. I wish it lasted longer. I will continue to purchase this until I find something that has the same or better results.

reviews.review_title: Awesome product that's worth the money
reviews.review_text: I use this in combination with Fresh's lip scrub and it is an amazing combination.  This product has been a game changer for me.  My lips are hydrated, soft and I have not experienced any dryness.  I really like the texture of this product.  It is smooth and when you put it on, it lasts a very long time.  I find other lip treatments/balms do not go on smoothly and have to be reapplied constantly.  With this product, I can go hours without reapplying and I love how it is not a sticky texture.  I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had horrible chapped, burning,dry lips and this was recommended by one of the ladies in the store. I put some on and instantly my lips felt better. Well I kept using it through the day and the by the next day my lips were healed. Now I use it every night at bedtime and my lips look and feel great.

I have a bad dry/chapped/peeling/etc problem with my lips, especially in the winter and because I bite my lip and purse them together all the time. This product helps correct those issues significantly, more than any other lip moisturizing product I've tried over the years. I swear by it and assure the more budget conscious people I recommend it to that it is well worth the money, especially if they're like me and can't stand the feeling of their own cracked, peeling lips. It glides on smoothly and doesn't feel like a greasy film on your lips, and rarely turns to gunk in the corners of your mouth like some other lip moisturizers. It has a lovely smell, too, like the rest of Fresh's lip products. One of those items I always carry with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite of the Fresh Sugar Lip Treatments.  The others felt very waxy to me, but this one feels instantly hydrating.  I don't live in a cold climate, so I can't speak for those who have chapped lips year-round, but I put this on at night and my lips feel smooth all day.  I didn't want to like it because of the price, but once I ran out of my deluxe sample, I realized nothing else came close :(  Just don't let it melt!  I keep mine in a mini fridge since I only use it overnight, but I've heard of people carrying it in their pocket or leaving it in a vehicle and having it melt. Overall, it works, but one star off for price and heat sensitivity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have minor to moderate dry lips that get progressively toward being severely dry with daily lipstick use. I've stopped wearing lipstick due to the harshness of winter weather recently, but I felt an amazing difference after my first use. I'm excited to wear lipstick year round without torturing my lips. It's pretty strong scented at first, but you only notice it when you put it on, plus it's petroleum free. Overall, I'm impressed that I'm not upset about buying $30 lip balm, it's that good.

I really love this. It's a little pricey. I only use a little because it can make my lips too shiny ( not a good look for a man). My lips are softer and look much better. If you have really dry chapped lips, then this would be a good investment. If you really want to up your game use an e.l.f. Lip Exfoliator a couple times a week before putting on lip treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: J'ai achete ce baume recemment et j'ai ete deu00e7ue. Il hydrate que tres peu. Payer 31$ pour un produit qui n'est pas efficace, ce n'est pas genial.
This product really helped with my chapped and peeling lips in the winter! This is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Wouldn't be without this as part of my skin care regimen, keeps lips moisturized without the greasy feeling of some others. Brings lips back from the brink when you have abused them in harsh winter conditions or the blistering sun.
It's a little pricey for a Chapstick but since I wear a lot of liquid lipstick my lips dries out so much and I found that applying before bed makes me wake up with supper hydrating lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this a lot, it is moisturizing and repairing. I find you need to use it quite a lot before you see results. It doesn't feel QUITE as good as I thought it would initially, but it definitely works!

reviews.review_title: The Only Lip Product I Use!
reviews.review_text: I've tried everything else and nothing compares to these lip treatments from Fresh. Never turning back, I will definitely pay to have this great quality product.
Love how this feels on my lips just not sure its actually repairing. I have the Sugar Scrub as well.
I won't use anything else on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best treatment for lips ever. Keeps them smooth and kissable. Cures dry cracks. Worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought a package of Sugar Lip Treatments at Christmas, and loved the advanced therapy so much, I bought the large size. It's amazing - it can quickly turn dry chapped lips into hydrated comfort zones. So although I think the price is borderline ridiculous, I must conclude it was obviously worth it in my eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this! But I love it so much I want to have one for home and one to keep in my bag, and it's a little expensive for that. Might have to do it anyway. It's glorious and tasty and does everything it claims to do.
Love this!! It makes my lips so smooth and I think I noticed some subtle plumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product was fine but not amazing and i would repurchase others that have more product and hydrate/ keep my lips moisturized logier.  it did make my lips very soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I live in a high elevation and cold mountain town and my lips struggle. Since I purchased this, I have not experienced chapped lips. It is the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is probably the only lip balm that actually worked for my lips and I have very dry lips in the winter! Totally recommend this product because it hydrates and gives the lips a nice look for a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a few of the tinted lip treatments by Fresh and I love how they feel light and silky on my lips and I'm very happy with the moisturizing effect they have. So when I wanted to get an untinted lip treatment I immediately went for this one thinking it would most likely be just as great as the tinted version. It did not work out well for me. No matter how sparingly I applied, this always felt thick and waxy on my lips. Drinking water from a glass would make my lips feel sticky and as if the balm had clumped up across my lips. I'd have to wipe it off and reapply. It never felt comfortable on me and using lipstick over it actually made my lips feel dry after about 15-20 minutes.

When I first recieved this product I thought to myself great. I just bought a 30$ lip balm. But I have to say after using this product only a handful of times it became a fast favourite. It's so silky smooth on your lips and it leaves them so moisturized and they look more plump just from being so hydrated. I usually just slather it on morning and right before bed and my lips have never needed anything else. In these dry winter months they haven't peeled once. I love, love this lip balm and won't hesitate to purchase it again.
An absolute must during the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Nice smell, consistency and packaging. My lips are not dry anymore, even during cold winters. I achieve the best result applying it in the evening. Sadly, it does not contain SPF.
This stuff is amazing! Be all to end all of lip balms...

Great product, but will not be purchasing again. Giving it the extra star, because it IS hydrating. However, my lips seemed drier after it wore off. I found I needed to reapply frequently, so I've been going through the product fairly quickly. The product did not justify the price. I've found other lip balms that are just as effective for a fraction of the price and last much longer.

Finally a lip balm that stays applied for more than 30min! I feel like all the others I have tried get sucked up by my severely chapped lips so that I am constantly reapplying. This one leaves my lips feeling moisturized and helps with the peeling I get from cold Midwest winters.

This is amazing! I have struggled with very dry lips all my life, so I have tried MANY different lip balms/chapsticks/ lip treatment and this one is the best!!! I got in my 500 point gift and my lips are 100% different now. I could put this one in the morning and my lips are still great by night time! Definitely will be buying the full size! Must have!!
Did nothing for my super dry lips :-( the search continues

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I can never make it through the Winter months without catching at least ONE really nasty cold. And most of us know what comes along with sneezing and blowing our noses every five seconds: dry, cracked, red skin around the nose and lips. I'm not talking simple, chapped lips that just need a little scrub and some balm. No. D-R-Y, cracked, split, broken lips. This lip balm has saved my life. After my cold, I used this lip balm for two days and my lips have plumped right back up!!! They're soft, baby smooth, and not the least bit chapped. No other product I've ever used in my life has worked so effectively. Pro tip: you can also rub a little bit of this balm on your finger and massage it on the dry, cracked skin around the nose. It works like a charm! If you get sick, YOU NEED THIS STUFF. Even if you're not sick and you have really difficult lips that just DON'T respond to cheaper lip balms, give this a try. It's worth the price.

I always saw this when I went into Sephora. It smelled so good but I could never bring myself to spend that much on a lip balm. The smaller size came in the Sephora free gift so I was finally able to try it. It is very moisturizing, glides on like butter & I LOVE the smell. It has a lemon-cupcake smell to it. It's pricey but very effective.

I originally received a tube of this treatment balm as part of a Fresh promotion with minis of all of the colors. I love Rose' but I think the Advanced Therapy version is the absolute greatest lip treatment balm available.  I use it every night before bed and my lips are ultra smooth and soft in the mornings. I have even used it around my eyes as an eye cream when I was out and my eyes were feeling dry and tight.
