It worked perfectly and actually, my fine lines were noticeably smoother and smaller the next morning. It's not something I would make a habit of, of course since the balm is scented, but once every now and then isn't too bad. Seriously, I love this stuff so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this product is great but I feel it's too expensive--you can get the same results with less products (burt bee's) that why I'm taking off a star--it did get my dry lips back in order

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this i put it on all the time!!!

I got the fresh sugar lip serum as a sample and I couldn't believe how much softer my lips felt after using it. Since that was out of stock I purchased this product instead and I'm just as happy with it; in fact it's much less gooey which is nice. My lips inevitably keep drying in winter so this is something to be used once or twice a day, but it's the only lip balm I've ever used that has actually made my lips soft and eliminated the dryness instead of just making them greasy. It's amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my all-time, must-have beauty product! This is perfect for my purse or pockets at work. Its thick and creamy and provides more hydration than anything!!!! I tend to pick and bite my lips until they bleed (anxiety) and this smoothes all my patches out perfectly! I give it four stars instead of five because: it can melt VERY easily, (don't leave it purse or car for long periods), and it breaks if not gentle with it. It is a great lip balm, and i buy the gift sets every Christmas for my family!

I've had multiple of these tubes of lip treatment. it conditions my lips beautifully, however, everytime i go to apply the treatment to entire bullet of product snaps and i am forced to apply it messily with my hands.
I've been searching for a lip balm for my dry, cracked lips and this is it. My lips are softer and prettier after just a few applications.

reviews.review_title: My upper lip line is more defined.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips have suffered dramatically from a skin condition. I'll spare you the details, but my upper lip line is rather scarred. I'm only in my mid 30's, but lipstick just doesn't look as good as it did before and I can't exfoliate it away. I started using this and didn't think it was anything special until I noticed how good my upper lip looked. My fiance noticed it too. I use it every night before bed and my upper lip line is more defined. It is expensive, but I think it's worth it. Also, there is quite a bit of product in the tube that you can dig out with a lip brush, probably $8 worth! I make sure that I get out every bit.

This stuff is amazing! It's a little on the pricy side but it's the best lip balm I've ever used. My lips get so chapped in the winter and nothing really seems to help long term but this stuff really does the job. I would 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. Completely cured my cracked lips within two days.

reviews.review_title: nice but not $26 for lip balm good.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: So maybe it's just that I had a really hyped up expectation of this product, but for the price of it I expected a lot more. I had read and seen and heard all kinds of reviews, claiming this to be like the Holy Grail of lip balms. But after using it for almost a week, I don't feel like it's anything special... Especially considering the price.  The texture is super smooth and melty (I wouldn't recommend keeping it in your pocket). And the smell and taste are sweet and somewhat lemony. Not unpleasant. It's a nice enough product, but I wouldn't buy it again or recommend it.
I use this when my lips are super dry and cracked (during these harsh Canadian winters). I apply it at night and in the morning my lips are as good as new! Definitely worth the investment!!!!

Literally the best lip balm I have ever used. I am obsessed with this product. I was skeptical at first due to the price but I'm glad I got it anyways. It stays on my lips for a long time and leaves them feeling refreshed. The scent is also not overpowering but still there. A big plus. My new go-to lip balm!

I like this product, I think it works well in terms of conditioning my lips. The smell was overpowering in my opinion, strong citrus sent. As other reviews said it seems to sit on the lips a long time.

I just bought this product because multiple people told me that the Sugar products were awesome for super dry lips and I have had extremely chapped lips since I have taken accutane. I was so excited to use the product and thought if it was this pricey it has to work, but unfortunately it did not. Obviously everyone is different, but sadly this product was not a good fit for me.

I can't live without this. This balm is in my must-have rotation of lip moisturizers. I use this daily, along with my Bite Beauty agave balm. This also works great as a base for my matte and non-creamy lipsticks. Love love love !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is not the most intensive lip balm out there, but it's good for day-to-day usage. More importantly, it's super pleasant to use. I hate waxy lip balms or greasy feeling lip balms, and this is neither. It feels very pleasant on the lips and smells absolutely amazing! Using it is a treat!!
Love it. Moisturizes very well as well as heals. That's the main problem with most lip balms!-they don't heal. This one lasts on the lips and feels amazing. Better than the original for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I did not enjoy this product. Very expensive, wore off quickly and ultimately left my lips drier than before application. I did better off with a $2 tube of chapstick brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this product! It's smooth. Produces a pretty, ever so light gloss. Not sticky. My only wish is that it could last longer. I run out too quickly, but then again I'm obsessed with the feel of my lips when I have it on.

I got this for Christmas (mostly because I'd never spend the money myself on a chapstick!) and I am obsessed! Def worth the money my lips are not chapped at all and I live in New England where it had been pretty cold and very windy the last couple of days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have tried several dozen products to help my lips. Finally I found Sugar Advanced Lip Therapy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I needed a lip balm to handle my dry winter lips. My Sephora was out of the colorless regular version, so I opted to get this one. I was pretty happy about it nontheless, because the formula of this is thicker that the other one. It is wonderful & my boyfriend even uses it occasionally for his chapped lips. I recently tried the Dior Addict Lip Glow (which made my lips peel), so I had to apply this, and they immediately felt much better & more moisturized.  The only reason I gave this 4 and not 5 stars is because of the smell. It is reminiscent of the smell of stink bugs (I live in the South), but isn't so intolerable that I can't get past it.
Amazing lip treatment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this stuff, since my lips really dry out in the winter and I need something that goes beyond a standard lip balm. Unfortunately, this wasn't it. I love the case, but was immediately put off by the smell - cheap dreamsicle. Yuck. With application, it goes on a little oily and smeary, with a texture I do not prefer. It also just sits on your lips, doing nothing more. It wasn't exceptionally moisturizing, and the moment there isn't anymore left on your lips, they are back to being exactly the same - dry, chapped. What a disappointment. This stuff is not worth the price at all, and I'll probably be returning it.

reviews.review_title: Not as hydrating as I thought
reviews.review_text: To expensive for no results. Works like any other chapstick. Not impressed by it all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Yes it's spendy, but nothing else out there compares. Very moisturizing and lasts a long time. Can be worn alone or under the Sugar tinted lip treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff and my boyfriend borrows it sometimes because it's super hydrating. Great for winter and traveling,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm! I use it especially when I fly on airplanes to keep my lips hydrated. It's also great for emergency cuticle moisturizing.
Love how moisturizing this is and how soft it makes my lips! It also last several hours which is so nice in the dry winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this lip treatment for a couple years or so now, and will not go without it! I used to have trouble with chapped lips in the winter especially, and never have problems since using this product. I heard on Dr. Oz about Meadowfoam being good for the lines around the lips, and I found this ingredient in the Sugar lip treatment which led me to first try it. Wonderful, wonderful product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's so smooth and very healing. I love using it.
This is the best thing to ever happen to lips. Obsessed is probably a good word for it. Nothing works better believe me I've tried them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Seriously this is the best lip treatment ever. I will never use anything else. My lips can be dry and cracked and this amazing product will heal them overnight!

This works amazingly for me! The first product I have found to heal my lips. My lips were extremely dry, rough and flaking. It took about a week of applying this three times a day but the results are astonishing. My lips are smooth, full and plump. Perhaps the bad reviews were people expecting it to work right away, but by using this daily I know have well moisturizer lips, something I never thought possible for me! Love this product.

This lip balm is incredible, but pricey. Next VIB sale I might just have to stock up. It kept my lips from getting chapped when I was severely dehydrated, and when I was hospitalised and not allowed to eat or drink anything at all for 3 days. So basically it probably has magical properties.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment did little for me but sit atop my lips. Although the balm has a silky feel, it is very fragile and does not deliver the performance that should accompany the price. My trusty Burt's Bees balm works twice as well, and is a third of the price to boot. If you want to indulge in a lip treatment, try the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask - similar price range, twice the performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a superb product. I have been using Fresh's regular sugar lip treatment and thought it was very nice in itself, but just didn't heal my rough, chapped lips.  I bought this in high hopes it would be more nourishing than the regular lip treatment and it delivered all of the promises. It has repaired and hydrated my horribly cracked lips and softened them. It even plumps them up and my lip lines have faded. 1-2 coats last for a couple of hours.  This is a mega concentrated version of Fresh's regular sugar lip treatment. I used this in combination with the Fresh lip scrub and serum for seriously luscious, smooth and young lips. It's worth the $25 and for $2.50 more, better than the basic formula. A+ product and will continually purchase.  PS- this is not an exfoliating product.

I wanted to love this! For the price you'd think it would be a miracle worker. It definitely lasts on your lips but doesn't take care of my chapped lips. The smell and feel are great but for the price it should do more. I'll keep this one but won't repurchase.

This lip balm keeps my lips very hydrated while wearing it, but once it's worn off my lips are just as dry as before. It's a good product and I would buy it again, but if you're looking for long term healing rather than temporary results, it's probably not for you.

I am obsessed with the Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment. Out of all the nourishing lip products I've ever used, this has shown the most significant and immediate results. No other simple lip balm can compare.  After a couple of uses my lips immediately felt softer and plumper. I use this product before applying other lip products to my lip to prevent dry-out.  Even after I've wiped off the lip treatment my lips feel plumper, fuller, and soft.

Honestly, I do not understand anything under a 5 star review. Every night I use lotions or creams or serums. I wanted something equally luxurious for my lips. I wanted to treat them without some tingle, scrub, or mask. This is it! So, as I drift of to dreamland, I can rub my lips together and smile. Because every morning I wake up with soft, moisturized lips with no crack, no rough patch, no problem. Buy this! It is more than just clear Fresh Sugar - though that, I'm sure, is lovely. You won't regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge believer in the Fresh line, so I couldn't wait to try this stuff on my slightly dry lips. Unless I got a dud, I can't believe how useless this product was for me! It went on thinly and felt closer to an oil than a balm, only the oil never sinks in. I wear all the fresh Tinted Lip Treatments and find them to be moisturizing and lovely. This, sadly, is not a clear version of that.

reviews.review_title: If i was on a deserted island....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is always on me. In my purse, in my car, in my emt uniform pocket, everywhere! I am one of the unlucky girls who gets crazy dry the second a gust of wind colder than 60 degrees comes by. By the time winter is in full swing my lips are dry and flakey. Nothing works like this balm does. I wear it all day and while i sleep. Has a nice lemony scent and taste thats not too strong. I depend on this so much i literally cried when someone accidentally threw it in the washing machine. Trust me im not happy paying $25 for a lip balm but this is worth every penny.
I love this product. Nothing else really works for me. I had cracked lips all winter long, sometime even in the summer. The product saves my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Perfect for saving dry flakey lips. This product is a must, and a great gift for anyone who isn't super into makeup. It's the adult version of chapstick, and is wonderful!!!! I love to put this on before bed, after using the fresh sugar scrub.You wake up with beautiful ready to rock the day lips.

reviews.review_title: Does not live up to the hype
reviews.review_text: Honestly speaking, I have not seen any plumping, repairing nourishing, smoothing of wrinkles from this product. It is an overpriced chapstick. Very placebo effect - I have 7 different Fresh Sugar lip balms and what I can say though is it's best to buy one of the ones with colour as opposed to the translucent ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: $25 for lip balm?! Sounds ridiculous but this stuff is amazing. I tried to use others, from low- to high-end, but this is the one. All I use it for is nighttime moisturizing but unlike any others, it lasts and it works/hydrates/softens.

Just got the full size of this for Christmas in the fresh must have kit. I spend a fortune at Sephora . No joke. But I never would have spent $29 on lip balm  Then I tried this! I applied it an hour ago and my lips still feel silky soft. Super nice product . Overpriced though

I originally got this in a birthday gift and loved it so much i got the full size. I apply it maximum twice a day because it keeps my lips moisturized longer than any other lip product. I get crazy dry lips in the winter and this really soothes and repairs them. There is little to no scent which i love and the packaging is really sleek. Definitely will repurchase when this tube runs out

reviews.review_title: Feels good on and it works!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I keep it by my bed and put it on at night before bed. Could use it all the time really. Great stuff. It goes on nice, feels great and rally does hydrate! Should be a staple in everyone's bag!!

I'd normally say it's completely insane to spend almost $25 on a tube of chap stick, but this stuff is definitely worth your money! I get dry, chapped, and cracked lips every fall/winter and this stuff does the trick! Feels like she's butter on your lips. Great fresh scent. Only 4/5 stars because I wish it lasted longer than it does. But I always carry it so I can re-apply. Have this one as well as Rose tint. I recommend this to friends all the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm sure many people are wondering, just as I was, what the difference would be between the regular (colored) lip treatments and this new advanced therapy chapstick in a slick white tube that cost an extra couple of dollars.  For a lack of better words, here's my take... Whatever ingredient they are using in the regular lip treatments with pigment that proves to be beneficial for lips... is MEGA CONCENTRATED in the advanced therapy lip treatment. It's almost as if the moisturizing granules are finer in this product, which makes the balm absorb into your lips instantly.  I love the colored lip treatments as well, but this is the serious, get-down-to-business sister of that product; no BS, no flair, just pure moisture and healing.  Really lives up to the name advanced therapy.
I love this treatment. It made my cracked dry lips soft and kissable again. The product itself is definitely 5 stars; I gave it 4 stars cause it's very over priced.

reviews.review_title: Great way to get soft lips
reviews.review_text: I am addicted to this lip treatment. It has turned my chapped lips into soft lips. While you will need to reapply through the day, it is well worth it.

This is the best lip therapy treatment I have tried. I have tried at least 5 other brands and I always come back to this one as it keeps my lips from drying out. I wear it every night and my lips are smooth the next day, all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product :D  I was on accutane (acne medication) for about 1 year and that medication dried and ripped my lips. It got worse for me during the winter and this product helped repair my lips. I tried just about everything and this is by far the best. For anyone with ripped or dry lips I defiantly recommend this xx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a recent Fresh convert. This is my new staple must have. I have 1 at home, 1 in my bag and a spare... it glides on easily and moisturises for hours. Best lip treatment ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every night before I go to bed and any time my lips start to feel dry. Its the best chap stick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every night otherwise my lips are just awful in the morning and super chapped.
Love it. But won't repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: will never be without this. Have tried so many but this is the best yet
Great texture, and combined with the serum, a real cure for dry lips.

The ONLY chapstick I enjoy having on my lips. I bite my lips a lot when I'm stressed so my lips are always pretty broken. This fixes them, hydrates them and makes my lips look all healthy and smooth! I'm hooked!

I bought this product a week or so ago and at first thought it was great and nourishing but I didn't actually find it helped my chapped lips. Once it soaks in there back to being rough and dry. It feels ok on but for this price I thought it would actually help my chapped lips!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible. My lips hurt and were peeling. I thought I was going to have to go to the Dr., they were that bad. This product cured me! Can't recommend it enough. Worth every penny. I keep one in my purse and one by my bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's been a bit of a dry winter so I've been using this before bed. I've noticed the balm makes my lips less cracked and smoothes them right out! I didn't even think about how important lip treatment was before this balm! Love it

Got this a while back as a part of some gift set, and have been using it for a long while and it's not effective for me. It's very greasy and doesn't smell very nice, and it feels like it just layers on top my chapped lips and then slides off throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every night before bed and every morning before putting on my makeup. I will often use it during the day over a lip pencil or by itself. It does absolute wonders for my lips--I never have to exfoliate anymore! It keeps my lips soft and supple and fully hydrated. I originally received it as a free sample but have purchased the full size product and am loving it.

Big Thumbs Up  I have finally jumped onto the liquid lipstick band wagon and knew that My lips would need extra nourishment. I decided to upgrade from drug store balms to a high end one to see if it truly made a difference. Yup! Immediately! It alleviated that slightly tugging heavy feel and did not disrupt the wear of these matte lippies at all. Although 5x as much as my drugstore balm, this has become my new Holy Grail.

Got this in a gift set with the face wash, and I must say it's a nice lip balm. My lips feel moist and healthy it also smells refreshing. However I think it's over price for the full size and I wouldn't purchase this.
I love lip balms, literally have a BAZILLION! The first time I used this I fell in love. By far one of my favorites!!!

I was excited to try this product after having the rose balm, and after the first few days of using it, I noticed really dry and chapped lips, but continued to use t thinking it was due to dry weather. Over the course of a few months I've been using it and every single time, it ends up drying out my lips for several days. I know it works for some people, but definitely not everyone.
Amazing stuff but expensive stuff Try to bough in special set One of the best lip treatment for every day life staying in my purse i try !

reviews.review_title: Best lip product ever. Love the entire line.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I didn't think anything would help me beat my addiction to softlips, but this is the best lip protectant I've ever used. Living in Florida can be harsh on your lips. I have about 20 of these spread in my office, purse and house. Great to use before putting on a great lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful lip treatment that really works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using Fresh Sugar lip treatments for a number of years and this is one of my favorites. I use this during the day and Sisley lip treatment at night and I have none of those awful above lip wrinkles even though I'm 62. I highly recommend this product to everyone.

I know $25 is a lot to spend on a lip balm but this product really works and is a real life saver in the cold winter months! The product actually lasts a very long time so you will get your money's worth.

This is the best lip balm you will ever buy I know $20 is high for lip balm but the tint they give the balm is just fabulous looking on the lips and it hydrates my lips all day and isn't sticky or weird feeling on the lips

Got this as part of a Fresh set, and this is by far my favorite lip treatment I've used. Odorless, colorless, and leaves lips absurdly soft and moisturized (I am very prone to cracked, chapped lips). I also have the Sugar Nude, but this feels like a different formula, and is less sticky. Will absolutely buy again when this one runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: A holy grail for people with dry lips.  I travel a lot for work, and although at a steep price for a lip balm, it is the only thing that works for me when my lips are dehydrated from the dry air on an airplane and in different climates. I love that it's a twist cap so it won't accidentally fall off like the cap of a lipstick.  CON: I keep it in my pocket often, and I find that it becomes very soft/melts a little when it becomes warm. Also doesn't do well under prolonged heat/sun.

reviews.review_title: Ok but not worth the money
reviews.review_text: I got the Fresh birthday gift a few years ago and wasn't too impressed with it. I've been having chapped lips since PA decided it wanted to have winter now so I thought I'd give the Advanced Therapy one a try, even though the regular one didn't work for me. Figured maybe times changed the formula and with being Advanced Therapy, something would help. Nope. I feel like I'm reapplying this a lot more than I should be my lips feel soft while it's on my lips. I had applied this when I started this review and it is already starting to feel like I need to reapply. Staying power isn't the best. Not buying again.
I wear this every night and wake up with soft lips...I prefer this over their other version, which seems more soft and less hydrating. I wish they made the tinted lip treatments with this formula...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing & smells delicious.  Tastes a little bad, but that helps to stop my lip biting, so I'll take that tiny set back.

First of all, if you're trying to decide whether to purchase this one or the balm in the container, this one is way better! This balm is creamy, soft, warm, and so soothing! The version in the container is more stiff and waxy. Like other reviewers, I don't recommend storing this in your pocket or car or even your handbag on a hot day. It is very soft, and I can imagine it melting very easily. I love using this product because it's very nourishing and it feels so good. (My eyes flutter and roll back into my head when I apply it.) The only complaint I have (or is it a compliment?), after the product does its job and wears off after about 8 hours, my lips beg for more. I don't find this to be true with other balms, which I do love. Something about this one leaves my lips addicted and needing more. In an expensive way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I hate chapped lips.. and I hate even more, lip chap that just puts a wax on my lip.  Although you might think you are crazy to spend $29 on this Fresh Treatment - but it's worth it. It hydrates and is good for your lips! I can sometimes go a whole day without reapplying.. it is THAT good! It's legit, and works wonders.. even my husband will use it! He can't go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. It's a go to for super soft, silky lips. No glitter, no gloss, just soft and smooth with a delicate fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size tube (0.08oz) as one of my point perks purchases and I really hate that I love this product because $25 for a lip balm is quite expensive for me. My all time HG is still my tiny blue jar of Blistex Lip Medex but I find it super unhygienic to use in public when I'm unable to wash my hands prior use so this Fresh product really comes in handy in keeping my lips hydrated and plump in the winter months.

This has been a staple in my routine for years. I use it morning and night and it's does everything it says. It also healed my lips very quickly after having a burn reaction from a facial peel. It is worth every single penny spent and more.

This lip treatment is what gets me through the frigid Chicago winters without cracked lips. I feel like I have tried everything to keep my dry lips happy during the cold months and have had little success until I found this Fresh product. It leaves my lips feeling silky and my dry/peeling areas have cleared up. I love that it also lasts a while, it's a high price but you get what you pay for. Totally worth it, a must try for the upcoming winter months!

At first, I was shocked that anyone would pay $29 for lip balm, but I now understand why. I got this inside a Fresh gift set and I instantly fell in love. The scent is sort of like a lemon meringue pie and the product melts on your lips as soon as you apply it. I usually have chapped lips, as well as very dry skin around my lips, so I apply this generously. It soothes and instantly makes my lips moisturized. The only thing is that I did not notice a big difference between this and the Fresh sugar lip treatment in terms of smoothing fine lines or repairing, so I usually opt for the sugar lip treatment instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: very good product, I would recommend to everyone. I have also Fresh red lipstick. The color is fresh!
Feels very nice on the lips and smells great. My lips feel moisturized. I don't know if it does EVERYTHING they say it does but it is a lovely lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Truly love anything from the Sugar line, I have one in every bag so I'm never without.
The best lip balm ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wish I had bought sooner. Thought it was just a trend. I love this product.
Best lip conditioner ever
I put chapstick on every night before bed time. this is the only one that still exists on my lip and keeps my lip moisture and soft.

For the price I paid, I was expecting this lip treatment to be exceptional. Unfortunately, it just feels like regular chapstick that I paid $25 for. I have to reapply often and for the price, it's just not worth it. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: some may call it glorified over-priced chapstick, but i have yet to find anything that helps my lips like this product does. you can literally put it over chapped lips and it will make things smooth and great shortly after application. i often wear it alone or under a dark coloured lipstick. worth it in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is fantastic - a must have for any purse, especially on cold dry days. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i am not used to using a moisturizer for my lips but I love this product!! A little goes a long way. If you are a little heavy handed it will apply a little too greasy but I do love using this in conjunction with lip stains as it will not feel so dry on my lips.
This Chapstick saved my lips last winter. Repurchising for this one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment is the worst product I have ever purchased. My lip is exuviation after use. When I stop using it, my lip automatically become normal. It is definitely not worth the price.

reviews.review_title: nothing special, ends so so fast
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just another lip balm, didn't see any results after one month, it also ends in a minute. for the price, really not worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is excellent and I would buy it again. It keeps my lips soft even though I wear liquid matte lipstick every day. It feels nice and smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: EOS has nothing on this lip balm! I have been using this for awhile now and love it! I use it throughout the day, and before bed at night. Huge fan! Recommended for dry, chapped lips.

reviews.review_title: Really just an ordinary lip balm. Nothing special.
reviews.review_text: I read a lot of positive reviews about it so I bought it. I have to say it really isn't as magical or amazing as the reviews say. This lip balm does moisturize, but it does not sooth your lips immediately or makes your lips softer/nicer after few days of use. Some people said that they see result after a week, so I waited a week to see. On me there isn't any significant result. Overall, it is just a lip balm. And for an ordinary lip balm, $29 is too expensive.

I really didn't like this formula, the product is so soft that when you swipe it on your lips a lot transfers making it feel waxy. My lips did not feel moisturized rather it felt as though the product was just sitting on them. Because the stick is soft it also finishes really quick. I prefer the brown tube with the SPF waaaay better consistency.
My must have beauty staple for moisturized soft lips. I absolutely love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used to swear by EOS until I tried this. It's amazing! The cost is a bit high, but it's worth it. My lips are much smoother and I use it about 3 times a day, maybe more, and one lasts about a month or so.

reviews.review_title: Great lip treatment for all seasons!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that this lipstick doesn't come with any color. It does a great job at keeping your lips hydrating for a long time. You do need to apply it a couple of times during a day. I usually use it before I go to sleep so my lips feel smooth when I wake up next day.
Definitely my favorite lip product overall. Only problem i have with it is that i am running out and i now realize how it is overpriced. Not a huge problem for me but a little annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I was on Acutane and my lips were extremely dried out. Most other stick chapsticks did nothing, and the liquids were too sticky and would come off in minutes. This product is amazing! It hydrates my lips more than anything I've used and does not have a sticky or heavy texture after it is put on.
I've tried so many over the years... Until I found Sugar. The advanced therapy is my go to every morning & and every night before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the first lip product that I have used where I didn't have to reapply it every hour, on the hour. I put this on my lips and even after eating and drinking, I can still feel the product on my lips, doing it's magic. It is not greasy or waxey at all. It helps to keep my lips moist and somewhat plumpier all day long. A little goes a long way and therefore makes this very well worth the money, to me. I'm definitely impressed and plan to keep purchasing this after I run out.

This is my first time actually writing a review on a product. I've been using this for over 3 years now and this is the only lip balm I can use in the winter. Keeps my lips moist and fresh. A must for upcoming winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one of my holy grail products for sure. Makes my lips so soft and smooth. I use it in the morning after I exfoliate. Not sure why it's been getting so much hate recently, but to each their own I suppose. Let's see how it does this winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the scent and the luxe feel of the case but the texture left something to be desired. It's way too thin when applied to the lips. And an hour after application, I could feel my lips actually dry out more and feel less smooth... This is going back to the store.
Dried my lips and made them feel really weird. Going to return it.

Though this is priced high, I personally find this lip treatment very efficient and lovely to use. The smell is subtle, it isn't goopy or greasy, it moisturizes my lips to just the perfect amount. Couldn't be happier. I will repurchase one before I run out!
I love this product. it makes my lips soft without making them greasy, its the perfect amount of moisture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this balm, because I have been using the version with SPF and it has worked really well. However, I noticed that with this product my lips would start to feel dry much faster, and over the next days the skin would start to flake. I am not sure what may be the problem since both formulations are pretty similar, but there is some ingredient on this lip balm that did not get along well with my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I have very dry skin, including my lips, which occasionally end up cracking and hurting. Whenever I feel my lips starting to get irritated or dry I apply this regularly, and it fixes the issue before it gets too bad. It also helps to heal lips fast when they're already in bad condition. It smells absolutely wonderful- very sweet, sugary, a little fruity. It doesn't have much taste, and what it does have is pleasant. The container is sturdy- I've never had issues with it unscrewing in my bags or breaking. The only issue I've ever had with it is that it melts very easily due to how moisturizing it is. It's clear, but has shine. Overall a great product, and a must-have for my makeup and skincare sets.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail, The Only Thing That Works
reviews.review_text: This is the only 'chapstick' i will ever buy again. My lips pretty much always feel dry unless I'm using this. I don't have to use it often, usually just once in the morning when I'm getting ready and maybe once in the night when I'm moisturizing, but it really works. I'm on my second tube and literally need to buy another one (this one is out and I'm having to scoop it out now... and because I'm trying to ration it out and I'm not using it as much, my lips are already getting that dry, tight feeling).  I'm acne prone and this doesn't break me out. It feels amazing on your lips. Obvious con is the price, but I'm probably spent at least this on lip products that don't work. BUY BUY BUY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have ridiculously dry cracked lips..well..dry cracked everything for that matter. Anyways.. I have tried so many different chap sticks and everything either just sits on my lips, or makes them peel, or accentuates the dryness. This is different. Its sooo silky and my lips don't peel! I hate the price, I do. I think its ridiculous for a stick of chapstick but unfortunately I haven't found anything cheaper that works this good. So! I will buy again! its expensive..but I do love it!
This dried out and cracked my lips really badly. Throughout the day my lips would shed large flakes of skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the most amazing lip product I have ever used! It makes my lips extremely soft and smooth. The smell is great and it tastes minty and fresh. I have been using this product before bed and applying it under my BITE lipstick in the morning for the past three days, and my husband keeps telling me how soft my lips are. I will definitely be repurchasing this product,
I just keep buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a great chapstick, used with the lip polish makes my lips look great. It does run out quickly, but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Picked this up last fall and it ended up lasting me through winter. Very smooth and hydrating formula, doesn't even compare to drugstore lip balm/chapstick alternatives. Packaging is quite chic as well.

I've been using for two weeks and this stuff is amazing! I've noticed significant differences in how my lips look and feel. Would be great all year round but especially in the winter. Would recommend in a heartbeat. I have others as well in different shades but this one is incredibly soothing. Very long lasting as well. Price is high but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: People wonder why I would spend $25 on a lip treatment BUT there is seriously nothing like this product that is comparable, IT WORKS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm. It is very hydrating. I love that is very lightweight and not sticky. I have even come to like the lemony smell. I do agree that this product is way over priced, but honestly the product is THAT good. I feel so fancy when I pull it out of my purse to use it. I had to repurchase it because I was so sad I finished my first one. Try it at least once! But trust me, you and your lips will love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! It is extremely moisturizing and creamy with a very light, clean scent. I didn't give it 5 stars because even though it is great, the price is ridiculous.
It didn't do anything special then a cheap 3$ regular lip chap. But it was alright didn't notice a difference in lips
I have very dry lips and I've tried so many different lip balms but this defiantly works the best. It leaves my lips hydrated all day and has an amazing sent to it! Defiantly going to re purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried A LOT of lip balms, I even tried this brand but it was the honey lip balm, a few months ago I bought the first one of the advance therapy and it was GREAT! now I don't have to put lip balm like every single minute, I feel my lips soft and hydrated, best purchase ever!!!

My lips dry easily, so I am always carrying around and trying hydrating lip products. This one was a waste of money. It doesn't feel like the product is hydrating your lips from within, more like it just sits on top of. I noticed it also breaks apart really easily in the tube.

I love the original Fresh Sugar! I decided to try this as a nighttime lip treatment. I didn't find that it did anything differently than any of the other Sugar products. It didn't last as long as the original. I was reapplying more often. It also didn't have the refreshing scent. I'll stick to the original Sugar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used this product religiously every night before bed until it ran out. Yes, this feels nice when you put it on and moisturizes well while the product is on. BUT it does not last very long - I needed to reapply during the night and my lips still felt dry in the morning. There are a million other lip treatments out there that will do the same thing for MUCH less money.

reviews.review_title: 2nd TUBE, yes, I will get a 3rd as well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: My one down fall about this product is the price...but then I say, it lasts with me using it every single day, and conditions my lips every morning. I use this right before I put my makeup on every morning. It conditions, moisturizes, and just makes my lips stay healthy. I don't have to add any other kind of chapstick through the day. LOVE it. only 4 stars because I think the price is so high, but I will pay it for my next tube!

Aaaahhhh! Amazing application, so hydrating! One application lasts me forever, and my lips don't dry because of it. Great smell. Best lip moisturizer I've ever used. I am, however, taking a star away for bad taste. Yuck!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I actually own this stuff (not the advanced thearpy) but the others in about every color there is. I bought this one though because in the summer and winter I get dry lips. It clears up the dryness in one to two uses (no joke), it smells good, it's tasteless but if you get some on your tongue it wont repulse you. I put this one when I start doing my makeup and by the time i'm all done, I can remove the excess and have smooth lips for lipstick or I'll put a lipgloss on over it. But when my lips get bad in the summer, I'm unable to wear this outside because there is no SPF. My only complaint is that there is no SPF.

Pros: not sticky nor smolder ur lips; not too oily and does not grease outside ur lips; pleasant smell. Con: I thought this is an advanced treatment however it is not for super dry lips especially not when u want something strong and effective to fix chipped lips skins.

This Product is really Amazing. It keeps the lips supper soft and hydrated. It doesn't make the lips sticky or give any undesirable taste. I used this before I put any matte lip cream and before I go to sleep. I love this product u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've loved fresh products for years and have even tried some of the other Sugar lip balms in the line, which I to have liked.  I got this as a sample with one of my orders and figured I would give it a try since I liked 2 of the others I have tried. I was suffering with peeling lips due to a recent piercing I had got, and after only one night of using this stuff my lips had transformed.  No more peeling skin! It also tastes and smells like lemon meringue pie :) Which doesn't hurt anything.  I usually apply every night before bed and wake up with soft hydrated lips. Very happy I discovered this, and it will definitely be something I can't go without from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful product and keeps my lips soft and moist . I like the fact that it doesn't have a scent or taste and is clear but not glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip balm makes my lips so soft. It has a nice scent also. I got this as a sample when I ordered my Urban Decay lip gloss. The smell of this is a citrus scent. Love the feeling of this on my lips. So glad I received this as a sample. Now I have the actual lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It felt really nice when i first applied it, but it ended up making my lips really dry. I heard a lot of good things about this .. but i dont think it works for everyone

This stuff is amazing. Seriously! It's lemony scent makes me feel refreshed, and it applies so creamy and leaves a nice dewy sheen to my lips. And this stuff works it's magic immediately when you put it on. Since I've started using this, I rarely have flakey dry lips, and my lips haven't had so many lines. I'm Canadian, and if it can beat an Albertan winter, you know it's the real deal! It does such a good job moisturizing that I don't have to reapply it constantly like other lip balms, which makes me feel better about the price, since it'll last longer. Sometimes I'll even put this on my lips pre-lipstick as a lip treatment, since I wear a lot of liquid lipsticks. Even just leaving it on for 10 minutes it'll do its job. The packaging is super sturdy, so I don't feel worried throwing it in my bag. Other lip balms the cap always falls off in my bag and gets dirty, this cap screws on so that's not an issue. I really can't see any flaws with this product, it's definitely the best lip balm I've ever used. It's so soft and creamy. Even my boyfriend noticed a difference in how soft my lips have been since I started using this. For something I just bought on a whim, I'm so so pleased with this. I wish I had something bad to say, but I don't! It's worth the price. I'll definitely buy this again once my current tube runs out.

This is the best product ever to use on your lips. I live in Arizona so my lips are often dry and peeling but this has cleared all that up. With using the sugar lip polish at bedtime and then using the advance lip treatment I wake up to baby soft FULL lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product! A little goes a long way, and keeps my lips moisturized for hours!

Received a deluxe free sample of this and thank goodness! This has restored my lips in just two uses- the chapped dryness is completely gone and my lips are smooth as silk. This will definitely be invaluable during the harsh northeast winters!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample of this and didn't think I'd fall so in love. I'm glad I received the sample, I would never have thought to buy this otherwise. For starters, this is the only chapstick I've ever used that actually does moisturize, hydrate, and repair; after just one use, my lips were the softest they'd ever been. I can tell a difference in the way my lips look; they're a supple and never flaky. I no longer have very pigmented lips either - just a nice, sheer pink. Love!! One of my favorite things about this chapstick is that it does it's job without leaving lips shiny/glossy. It's not matte, but it definitely doesn't leave your lips looking wet. The product really lasts, too. I find myself re-applying it less often than other chapsticks, which is nice. I know the price is a big deterrent for purchasing the product, but it works so, so well.  Is $25 expensive for chapstick? Yes. Will I continue to buy this any ways? Yes, yes, yes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Bought this after a consultant used it when I got a makeover last week. I couldn't forget how soft it made my lips feel. While the 25$ is a steep price, it does make your lips feel silky smooth. I don't know if I'd repurchase because of the price. (I mean co'mon its a chapstick people.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Got a small sample of this and it was awesome! I have tried many products and this is one that will not dry my lips after a few hours. Definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The lip treatment has a great lemony-floral smell, I'll give it that, and keeps my lips soft for at least several hours, but I cannot justify a 2nd purchase at this time for such a steep price. I'll continue to seek other lip conditioners at affordable luxury pricepoints.
this lip treatment is so good, and it leaves my lips feeling smooth and velvety. I give it 4 stars, because of the price. which I don't enjoy. and honestly, it isn't worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. I put it on my lips every night, and every morning they feel velvety smooth. I love this stuff.
Definitely worth every penny! My boyfriend even dabs some on his lips and compliments it!

I have used a lot of lip balms, I have never found anything that has moisturized and been long lasting as this. It does plump a bit, but I feel the moisturizing has helped with smoothing my lips. I don't have chapped lips any more and using with the Fresh sugar scrub makes it even more helpful. It is pricey, but I feel it's worth it, because nothing has ever came close to making my lips so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I first bought this, I questioned myself for spending that much on a chapstick. But it is definitely worth every penny! I try to use it sparingly so that it lasts. I really love applying it right before I start my makeup application to keep my lips hydrated and prep them for lipstick/gloss. It is so hydrating and it really helps dry lips! I have very oily skin with very dry lips and this makes my lips feel wonderful.
Dried my lips :( I stopped using this asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this lip balm and it does its job. But its not the best balm in the world. I think it's way too expensive for a regular balm that you would use everyday.
When I first time bought ,I just want to try.but now ,I can't stop use it. I like it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and smelled nice. Lips were still chapped after use. Too expensive for chapstick that didn't moisturize

huge fan of the sugar line lip balms. this one is really a step above the others -- it's more moisturizing and lasts a little longer. (and if you've never tried the sugar line, they are fantastic. i won't use any other lip balm!)  highly highly recommend!
I use this every day after my shower. I had pretty bad dry and cracked lips but tried this out and never again. I love the product and will continue to buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This products saved my lips from becoming dry. Just applying it once around my lips was enough to moisture it, versus other brands I tried I had to apply around my lips more than once and the amount of moisture it applies is satisfying. I apply this mostly before I go to sleep and in the morning after I apply my makeup. Highly Recommended !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: From the packaging to the product is perfect. The only bad thing is that I want more product in the tube. I seem to run out so quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The Sugar advanced therapy lip treatment is the most luxurious lip balm. It's creamier than the lesser expensive version in the brown tube. I avoid carrying it with me to hot places like the beach as it will melt for these days, I use the gloss version of this product. I little tip for getting your moneys worth is once you get to the end of the tube, scrape out the bottom of the tube & fill into a honeypot. There's too much product beneath the rim of the tube to waste it. Sugar knows what lips like!
Love this lips moisturizer. My cracked lips recovered less than one week of using this. Love how it is not greasy or glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always get SUCH dry lips to the point that they are just hanging off. It's terrible! Especially in the winter. I notice it hydrating almost right away. I put it on before I start doing my make up and hair and by the time I'm finished with all of that, my lips hydrated and are ready for lipstick! :) Expensive, but really does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Keeps lift soft, works well at night. Expensive, but works.

reviews.review_title: not a must have , and so easy to melt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: High moisturizing but I have other product that can do the same in lower price. And the formula is so soft and easy to broke

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every night before bed to keep my lips soft and moisturized. The tube lasts a VERY long time. For me, over a year. I don't usually pay these prices for my skin care but this product far exceeds anything else I've used. Worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this together with the fresh sugar lip serum. And my goodness both together give you the most luscious and hydrated lips ever. I cannot stop rubbing my lips together. I kid you not at first I did not want to spend the money on a balm bc i was 100% certain I could find something cheaper as an alternative for my flaky dry lips. I stopped wearing lsptick bc it would look terrible. Blistex, Carmex, Chapstick didnt work anything. I actually felt like it felt drier. But after using this in conjunction with the lip serum im in love! It works great by itself too and stays moisterized for hours! I dont even need to reapply it unless I eat and drink. Its amazingg.
This REALLY WORKS! It made my lips soooo soft and moisturized. My lips were cracking and just really, really dried out and this changed all that!

reviews.review_title: Nice, but Not a Must-Have for Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This was moisturizing and glossy (maybe a little oily) and had a yummy sugary lemon scent, but I can't say this will become a staple for me. I purchased this for the anti-aging properties it touted, and I didn't really notice a difference. Maybe I was expecting too much. Blistex has a Deep Renewal lip balm that reminds me A LOT of this, and it's a fraction of the price. The search for the perfect anti-aging lip product continues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Amazing. You won't find a better one. It's the best out there. Not greasy, oily or drying at all. It looks great and works great. I also use the lip scrub regularly. Life changing if you are suffering from severe dry lips. If you haven't tried it, buy it. It's so worth the $$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Yes compared to other lip treatments at the big box retailers this product is expensive, but it's worthwhile. You know Sugar is made with quality material the moment you slather it on. It's got a very light sensual taste that not thick and pasty or greasy and leaves you wanting to wipe it off like a Chapstick would. It protects and nourishes for a baby soft pucker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I keep it on my nightstand and use it every night and morning and it definitely keeps my lips hydrated. Its expensive but well worth the splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a chronic dry lip problem (my lips are always peeling), and though it's too soon to tell if this product actually solves my issues, I LOVE the way it feels on my lips. It's probably my favorite lip balm. It's smooth and hydrating, doesn't feel oily or sticky and has a really nice subtle smell. Four stars, only cause I just wish it wasn't quite as expensive.

reviews.review_title: A real treatment as its name
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and chapped lip. This product hydrates my lip for long, and the flavor doesn't taste strong like other lip treatment. Have used 2 of it and like it so far.
an essential for sure. it hydrates and adds a finish on the lips that is beyond beautiful. makes the lips super supple & improves lips natural color without adding any color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this product a few weeks ago and cannot believe how wonderful it is. My lips are so nice and soft and not dry like they were. I love the texture and the smell...would like to try some of the other Sugar products that have a bit of color in them.

I love this balm. It is a bit expensive, but it's worth every cent. I've tried EOS many times but after they rubbed off of my lips they became extremely dry and chapped. With this though my lips always feel smooth, soft, and supple. I will only be buying this from now on.
It's nice lip chap and goes on smoothly, but not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It is really expensive, but it works. I have dry skin and lips. In winter and when I am in stress my lips get chapped, which hurts a lot. After I start using this product, my lips get much better in a day. I have tried many other products. My skin and lips don't get relief from oil-based products. This balm is amazing and not oily at all. If your skin is similar to mine (not likes oily products), I recommend it for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried a TON of product for my always chapped lips and this is easily the best lip treatment I have ever used. I love the smell, consistency and the hydrating qualities of this lip therapy. HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This works so well I had to buy the regular size! (I originally received this as part of a sampler) The sample size was very soft that it broke off when I applied it, but the larger size is more durable. I noticed the difference when I wouldn't apply it. The only set back is that I wish they didn't included BHT in the ingredients. Otherwise, this product is worth every dollar!

This is the best feeling balm I have ever found. It is so moisturizing that it is worth the money for having extremely chapped lips. Also great to apply a little bit underneath more drying lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best lip balm ever. Quite $$$ but worth it for me. I stock up on the 25% sale.

This is the best lip treatment I have ever tried, hands down. It is so satiny and indulgent. It is expensive, but a little swipe goes a long way. However, as other have noted, a significant amount of product at the end goes to waste because of poor packaging design. When you reach the end of the tube, there is still a lot of product to use that requires a little elbow grease to get out. You have to scoop it out with a brush or other implement-- I am going on a month of doing this to maximize the product.

reviews.review_title: Dig down into tube to get your money's worth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product; I use it every night before bed and my lips are always well hydrated when I wake up.  However, the great annoyance is that you have to use a lip brush to get out the last 1/3 of the product you've paid for. (See the attached photo.) If you throw this out when your lips hit the plastic ring, you're leaving behind a significant fraction of the product, which is a big deal at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this! A little pricey for a lip balm but worth it. It keeps my lips moisturized and plumps it a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The hands-down best ever lip balm I have used! I am someone who typically licks my lips, or bites them fairly often and always have chapped lips. This stuff has been a LIFE SAVER!! I can't say enough good things about it. I can put it on at night before bed and wake up still moisturized. It's the greatest.

I love this product I got it in a holiday pack at Christmas, it smells amazing like lemon pie I don't use it everyday so I don't no about lasting effects but my lips feel soft when I use it only complaint is that it the stick part broke easy but it works fine still.

When I first used this lip treatment, I felt like why didnt i use this before! I could see total difference with other products. It's highly moisturizing so I usually used this before going to bed at night, then get up with smooth, moisturized lip next day!

reviews.review_title: one of the best lip balms I've ever used
reviews.review_text: This is actually one the most effective lip balms ever. I have used various high end lip balms, all the way from hourglass to bite agave, but this will always be my top 3. It exfoliates, moisturizes, smooths lips and keeps them hydrates for about 2-2.5 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product - it seems to help with everything they claim. It works underneath lip color and alone. I pair it with Bite Beauty agave lip masks, especially at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This excellent product is amazing! It has a pleasant scent to it and is super moisturizing. I like to apply this at night before bed, and it softens and nourishes my lips. I love the packaging as well. So cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love love love this lip therapy.
Pro's smooth, no greasy, long lasting, good ingredients to provide your happy lips for anytime of the season...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the buttery soft texture and thickness of this lip balm. It may be too soft and slippery for some people. I think it is a little pricey, so it's better to get a sample or mini tube of this in a set. But I think I can never go back to regular chapstick after trying this! I love the sweet smell too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this as a 100 point perk a few weeks ago. I where lip balm or some sort of chapstick all of the time, so I'm always on the lookout for better things. I love this! It is so silky and moisturizing. It's pretty glossy, so It can be worn alone or under lipstick.

This lip balm/treatment is hands down the best one I have ever used. I've tried literally ever single one out there and this one just blew me away. I have naturally dry lips and this lip balm kept them soft and moisturized, not chapped, throughout the whole day and night. Now, I can't live without it!
I love this stuff, recently got a sample of it. Does anyone else think it taste like fruit loops? It taste just like it!
While it does feel like the most luxurious thing to go on your lips, it's too soft and doesn't last very long. Hence, for me, it's overpriced and too much hype.

Really works. Lips were dry from winter. Had been using Too Faced Lip Enhancer Extreme but burns my husband when i kiss him. This product really works, plumps up lips, hydrates, not sticky, no burn Slight odd taste, but it's natural. My Dermatologist friend also said many have an allergic reaction to SPF in lip products- don't realize it- keep using because the other ingredients mask it and temporarily help. This ones sans SPF

I am 32 years old and over the past 3-4 years I've begun to develop very deep lines in my lips. I started using blistex deep renewal with Q10 and my lines totally went away. Well I can no longer find this product in store so I was looking on Sephora and seen this product had good ratings so I was excited to try it. Well let me tell you my lines are back to being super deep and my lips are always dry. I'm about to throw this product away, so expensive and did nothing for me at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The lip balm I swear by. One of the most repurchased products I have. Scrub your lips with their lip scrub and then apply this after wards. Seriously heals cracked lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and very dry lips. All lip balms cause me to break out around my lip line. This is the only one that smoothes my lips and doesn't cause me to break out. I can even wear lips color again!!

I had previously purchased the regular Sugar Lip Treatment and absolutely hated it!!! I know everyone likes different things, but for me it had a drying effect on my lips, and felt awful. I would have never purchased this, but it was a free sample and it is so moisturizing, It is like a lip balm but when this does wear off, my lips are left feeling moisturized and sooo soft. This is definitely worth purchasing.

Love this! Very moisturizing and makes my lips so smooth. I like the smell. Only downside is the price. Pretty expensive, in my opinion, for the amount of product you get. Not sure if I will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this balm daily, and it really helps keep my lips from cracking in winter months. I love wearing it as a base under lipsticks/glosses. I also use it at night before bed. It really helps keep my lips from getting dry, and feels great on. I have lost track of how many times I have repurchased this, a must have beauty item for me.

I put this on at night before bed and use the Fresh SPF 15 treatment during the day. For years j had gross flakey lips, even though I used a lot of (cheap) lip moisturizers, but this stuff has totally fixed my problem. A friend with very sensitive skin recommended it and now I'm totally devoted to Fresh lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the texture, smell and how it goes on. What I don't love is having to reapply it every 15 minutes. It seems to dry out my lips rather than moisturize. Won't be buying again.

This stuff is frickin' amazing. Don't second guess. Yes it's expensive but if you're at Sephora obviously that doesn't matter much to you. It works! It's soooo hydrating. If you put it on before bed, when you wake up your lips will be smooth as can be. And it smells delicious. But if you're picky about scents I would go into the store and see if you agree. I am picky about scents but everyone has different taste. I personally think this is fresh and bright and amazing. Worth the $$

I do think this product is nice. It is very hydrating and my lips love it. I however do not think it is worth $25. I also prefer the lush moisturizing lip balm ( which I believe is $10) and I feel like I got better results from that. Needless to say, I will not be purchasing this again. It's too much money for a Chapstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Purchased this on recommendation from associate at the store. I bite my bottom lip alot and was looking for something to heal and smooth out the roughness. I use e.l.f. Lip exfoliator every couple days as well, but just after two days of using this I noticed an improvement. and I've been using this since, I almost don't want to go back to the eos balls... The only issue is that it is soooooo expensive, otherwise I would've given it 5 stars...

The hydrating feeling doesn't last and leaves the skin on my lips feeling like a hard shell. I'll go to reapply the balm and it doesn't do a great job softening the already hard parts. Eventually the entire lip gets tough once the balm is absorbed and needs to be peeled off. I've used two tubes consecutively of Advanced Therapy and I haven't seen an improvement. The only relief I get is when the product is physically on my lips. It's far too expensive for the short time relief it provides.  My sister used the same Advanced Therapy a few years ago and said it is different than how it is now. The ingredients may not have changed but the quality and proportions may have. Whatever it is, I find longer lasting relief from using raw coconut oil and Shea butter. That's too disappointing because the ingredients in Advanced Therapy was very promising.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Really works on super dry, chapped lips. I love to wear this before wearing lipstick to make sure my lips are as smooth as possible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome lip balm that can keep my lips hydrated for a long time. This is very moisturizing, and it doesn't feel thick, waxy or sticky after applying. It feels really smooth on your lips and light. Love this lip balm so much. I use this at night, and use my colored lip treatment with spf during the day :) Love all the lip balms from fresh! <3
This stuff is the only balm I have tried that keeps my lips hydrated all night. I am extremely prone to dry, chapped, cracked lips and this has worked miracles for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this every night before bed and my lips stay soft and smooth. I'm on my fifth tube. Every time I try to switch to something else, I end up coming back.
This product is wonderful, but the Sephora balm works just as well and it's $20 cheaper. The main difference is the container.
I like the smell and feel of this. It keeps my lips moisturized. Not as addictive as other choices out there. $25 is a little steep but it lasts a long time.
Price is definitely steep for what you get, I still love the product, however, and use it everyday. Packaging is very well designed and has a nice fragrance, does a decent job moisturizing as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the scent and the feel of this lip balm, but it's not as healing as 25 bucks should provide.
best lip balm treatment by far..only one I ever buy. keeps my lips smooth and moistened..

This is absolutely my favorite lip balm. When you apply it, your lips will definitely be smooth in a matter of minutes. No matter how cracked or dry my lips may be, this is my lifesaver. I'm devastated when I run out.

reviews.review_title: Good stuff but not worth the money
reviews.review_text: I love Fresh products and really love this lip treatment but it's expensive. You can get the same results from a store brand patroleum jelly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got braces recently and ever since my lips have been really dry. Several times, they got to the point that they were cracking and peeling. After I got this and applied it overnight my lips stopped cracking and peeling. If they get really bad again, all I have to do is reapply this for a few hours and they will get rehydrated and soft. I will 100% buy this again and again. Best thing I have ever gotten from Sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Makes my badly chapped lips soft and heals them quickly! I have made several others big fans of this as well :-)
Works great but not worth the price
One of the best product ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is the perfect solution to sensitive and easily irritated or chapped lips. I apply it every night before bed, and my lips are in great shape the next morning. I also keep one handy (currently beside my living room chair) in case my lips feel dry during the day. It's more expensive than the Lorac vitamin E stick I used to swear by, but Lorac stopped selling theirs. I tried a few other vitamin E sticks and none were quite up to par. I received a small sample tube of this awhile back, and loved it! I've been a fan since.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: You only need one use to see the difference. It is extremely hydrating and comforting. I apply every night and my lips feel soft and plump in the morning. The only other comparison is La Mer's lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this expensive expensive chapstick. It works so well to hydrate and soothe lips. It is expensive but think about it as an antiaging lip product, not only as a lip balm, it keeps lips plump and hydrated it will help in the long run with lips lose volume due to age.

reviews.review_title: Works fine, but not worth the price tag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: As a lip balm, this product is fine. It doesn't last very long on the lips. I haven't noticed any difference in the small wrinkles around the lip area. The price of this product is not reflected in its performance. The best thing about this product is its packaging. I love not having to worry if the top is going to pop off if i have it in my pocket.
Love this scent and instant smoothness. I miss this product when I don't use it.

This balm does help with dryness BUT it is not long term. Something that claims to give advanced treatment should last longer on the lips. I find myself applying this too often. It did help to hydrate my lips but as soon as the balm dries up i feel the sting again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant about the product because it's so pricey for a 'luxury' lip balm but got this as a deluxe sample to give a whirl and loved-loved-LOVED it that I'm going to buy the full-sized when I run out. I'm a lip-balm fanatic during the dry 'winters' of northern CA but despite wearing drug-store brand lip balms all day I still had chapped, dry peeling lips but after using this I feel like my lips are smoother and moisturized with a buttery feeling without that slimy slick feeling I get from my drug store chapsticks and I can apply a lipstick over it without it sliding off (again, a nod to my drugstore chapsticks' tendencies...).  My only gripe is the product is that it's so soft in the tube that as you apply it, the product will move and rub against the sides from the pressure of your lips and get a ring from where it touches against the tube opening marring the product. It's not a big enough gripe to dock a point off but it's something to note that this stuff is very soft and I can imagine if you rotated it out high enough while applying that you might just break the tip off so I'm careful to not treat it like my lipsticks by having it up too high and only have enough exposed at the top to apply when needed.
Expensive but awesome. Love what it does for my lips, husband is addicted to the light coconut-lime aroma and I had to purchase one for him as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this.  First, I should say that my lips are constantly cracked 24/7. This product REALLY helps in that department.
