I've tried multiple lip repair/therapy products such as the Bite Beauty Agave Lip Mask, Bite Beauty's lip scrub, Bliss's lip scrub, Rosebum Perfume Co's lip balm, EOS, Burt's Bees, etc. And this product is the best at repairing my chapped lips (I' have two of the smaller version of this product as the bonus come with other fresh products that I bought).  What I cannot stand about this is that it BREAKS in the packaging. It's in my purse all the time and it's not like I drop my purse or leave it in the car for it to melt, but both of the smaller versions of this product have sorta broken INSIDE the packaging. I've somewhat salvaged them to where I can still use the product. I'm hesitant to buy the full-size of this product because I don't want the same thing to happen and waste my money because it broke. For $25, you'd think it would last....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Over the years I have suffered far too many cold sores from sun exposure. Because of that, the shape of my upper lip outline was scarred and at one point seemingly invisible. There seemed to be no delineation between the lip and the skin above it. I purchased a multi-piece kit with this in it and foolishly let it sit in my drawer for a few weeks. Eventually I used it a few times at night and couldn't believe my eyes! The outline of my scarred lip area returned! The underneath scars are still there, but I now have actual upper lip definition in the area where before it was like someone had erased it. I have tried the similar formulations which come in the brown tube or the colored variations (such as rose'), but the Advanced Therapy is the ONLY Fresh lip product and product of its kind that I have ever had actually HEAL my lip area. I recommend it to all of my friends and have to hide it from my daughter! I hope Fresh NEVER stops producing this amazing product!!

reviews.review_title: Not as good as the original Lip Treatment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this thinking it would be better than the original because it said Advanced in the name. But it dried out my lips and caused them to crack, and it was not nearly as plumping as regular balm in the brown tube.

reviews.review_title: good product, but not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: i've tried this version as well as the classic formula (with spf) in the brown tube. advanced therapy is slightly firmer, whereas the spf version is slightly softer. (i wouldn't leave either in a pocket or a hot car, though.) i prefer the advanced therapy formula, but i wouldn't repurchase either product at this price.  it's a very moisturizing lip balm, but it doesn't last long on my lips, and i have to reapply frequently. i finished each tube in about a month. granted, it is winter, but that's just not enough bang for my buck. if you reapply infrequently, or only use this at night, you might find it's worth the high price. i didn't.  i've heard people swear this is worth the money because nothing from the drugstore compares, but i haven't found that to be true. i prefer nivea lip butter (applied with clean fingers, since it's in a pan), with some aquaphor over top to seal in moisture at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating, I use each night before bed, throughout the day in the dryer months. I suffer from cracked dry lips in and this is the only lip product I've found to heal and prevent besides good 'ol Vaseline. Haven't noticed any winkle smoothing power quite yet but possibly if I used more. Very very soft so be mindful when applying. Use this after the Fresh sugar scrub to fix chapped lips, Combo is GREAT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and lips. This product really helped me keep my lips moisturized and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this lip balm, because I suffer from dry mouth so my lips get really dry. This works really well to hydrate your lips. However, the one thing that really bothers me is how soft the stick is, it's a little too soft and it starts deform at the tip after using it just once.

I had such high hopes for this, but was overall disappointed. I got this for Christmas, and couldn't wait to use it. My lips have always been dry, all year round. They're always peeling, dry, and chapped! In other words, EW! So I've been on the look out for a great nighttime lip product!  First off, I absolutely love the smell of the balm. It smells like lemon sugar! Secondly, I love the packaging. Very chic and classy, simple, and it's just nice to have. It's definitely a luxurious lip balm. Thirdly, applying the lip balm on the lips is like a dream! It honestly feels like I'm applying a warm butter on my lips that melts right away. I'm addicted to applying it because it's that amazing! But the reason I gave it three starts, and the reason I'm disappointed, is because I've been using this every night before bed for two months now, And my lips are still incredibly dry, and peeling every day still.  Meaning this lip balm doesn't work or get the job. I'll still continue to use it because I love the smell and how it feels putting it on. But I don't think I'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I cannot tell about the wrinkles as I'm only 24, but this definitely changed my (lips') life in winter! Canada... known for cold, windy days in winter. My lips would get so dry. I put this balm right before going to bed and let it do its magic overnight. Smooth and soft lips guaranteed in the morning!  P.S.: Also great when you plan to wear lipstick the next day to avoid the annoying flakes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'll be honest-I didn't realize how much I love this product until one day I ran out and used other chapsticks I had laying around my house (Marc Jacobs, Bite Beauty, EOS, etc). After a week of severely dry lips, I bought this a week after using my other products. NO more cracked, dry, peeling lips. This is simply amazing.
I have been using this for over a year now and it is truly the best! Makes my lips feel moisturized and plump. I also like wearing this in conjunction with lipsticks/liners. The smell is great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed in this product as I did not find it as hydrating as drugstore products...found it very not worth the price. Seemed to just sit on my lips and not sink in.  On the plus side, it does smell good and goes on smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing. Will repurchase for each Winter but expensive to use year-round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This treatment is incredible. I use it every night before I go to bed, and every morning before I leave the house.  I am very lazy when I put my retinoid on, and I tend to get it all over my lips (major Retinoid no no!) This treatment quickly helped repair the damage I had done to my dry, painful lips and now they feel softer than before. I will buy this over and over again.
Although it is a tad pricey, works wonderfully. I have noticed a difference since using.
So I put this on a night before bed and my lips are so soft and moisturizer in the morning. I will be purchasing another one to go in my purse!

If you have chronically dry lips, this isn't the product for you. It is not strong enough to help lips that are really dry (actually made mine peel,) I find myself putting Chapstick over and under it.  Wears off in 5 minutes, and has a very specific smell that I don't want to continuously wear all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Keeps my lips soft and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this product and i was hesitant on if it was worth the money or not but i am typically know for chapped lips but not any more if i use this along with the lip scrub and its like magic.

reviews.review_title: soft lips without the sticky feeling
reviews.review_text: My lips were painfully dry with the weather and needed some relief.  I hate those Chapstick/Carmex balms because they are sticky or artificial feeling/tasting.  Was recommended this by an associate and it helped my lips right away.  I use it every morning and night after I brush my teeth and I haven't had an issue since.  Very clean fresh feeling without the sticky mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great product. Just a bit pricey. Average time is about 3months use depending on weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the consistency, not too oily or thick on the lips but very moisturizing. I also love the refreshing sweet, lemon scent that it has. It's a great lip balm to carry around and apply whenever your lips feel dry. I love this product! I would buy it again. I just wish the price was a little less. Still worth it though!

reviews.review_title: Love it! Don't leave home without it.
reviews.review_text: Kind of pricey but I love it. Always keep one in my purse but can't take it to the beach or it will melt. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have really dry lips, I use this at night and I wake up with soft lips! I've also noticed that my lips are a bit more plump (not like a huge difference, but enough to notice a tiny bit) which I love! It's also helped with a few wrinkles (from smoking cigarettes too much in the past).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It heals my crazy chapped lips so quickly. It lasts for hours and smells and tastes great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this lip treatment due to being a smoker, my lips are always dry. This product was sadly NOT what it's cracked up to be.  First of all, the price is $25, so I thought that it would work. That is a very STEEP price for a chapstick, basically. When I tried it, it smelt good, and it glided right on. Easy application. However, it felt like it just sat on my lips, rather than hydrated them. I rubbed it onto my lips and then again, that made it nonlasting.  Avoid this product by all means. It's not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: my lips feel instantly smooth, even on my driest days. cannot recommend this more. hydrating, light and natural looking but also a great base under a lipstick or eve over a lip stain. LOVE

I bought this lip treatment about 3-4 weeks ago and I'm almost out.. I haven't even been using this product everyday and that's the sad part. I had such high hopes from the reviews and I LOVE fresh products usually but it was not worth the price. It was refreshing and helpful to my dry lips but the product disappears so quickly.

reviews.review_title: I wish I could give this more than 5 stars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Over the years I have gone through chapstick like a crazy person. I found this and it gives my lips life! This stuff is amazing. I even got my boyfriend and his friends hooked on it! You can wear it with or without a lip color on top. It makes your lips feel silky smooth and look supple. I recommend this to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Definitely wouldn't recommend this lip balm. It's extremely thick. I usually use the Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 but switched to this one for the winter. This one makes my lips dry and even peel. I will be switching back to the other one for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is a really nice product. i like lip balms that are in packaging like this so you dont have to dip your finger into the product. its very moisturising

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This balm is very very nice as you put it on your lips and for about 30 minutes afterwards. I wish it lasted longer because I have to keep re applying it. As i am re applying it throughout the day my dry, cracked, aging lips are definitely looking and feeling better. But it is annoying to have to keep getting it out all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've tried many different lip balms, including drugstore and high end. Fresh lip treatment is my favorite. It's creamy, hydrating and smells delish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wish I had never tried a sample of this because I feel ridiculous paying $25 for a chapstick, but it just helps my lips so much. I'm a lip picker so winter and my own fingers are my lips' worst enemies but thanks to this product dry patches rarely appear for me to pick at. I took a star off because of the price and how quickly I can go through it, but I can't help but continue to repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recently moved from a year round sunny climate (think sun burned lips) to a cold northern climate (think very dry skin and chapped lips). I have always been in search of the perfect lip balm/treatment that feels good and heals at the same time. I FINALLY found it! Thank you Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is not worth the money. It does help out dry lips, but not much more than your $3 dollar store chop stick. Would not purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Chapped Lips Became Even MORE Chapped
reviews.review_text: Yes, it's true. I guess I am the odd person out, but this made my lips worse. I tried using it for a week and had to return it. I already had the worst winter lips I've ever experienced, but with this... Awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have ultra dry lips and am constantly applying moisturizing lipstick, lip gloss or lip balm. I received a deluxe sample of this with an order. This lip treatment is superior to all others I have used - it's so soft and leaves my lips hydrated for hours. When it runs out I will be purchasing a full size. This is worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am VERY cost conscious. Truthfully. $25 for a lip balm is not my normal price point. This is a well deserved exception to my regular rules. There is nothing else as good at moisturizing my lips as this product. With daily use, I find this lasts me about a full year. No waxy or sticky residue like other products. Light lemony scent. I received it in a Beauty Insiders birthday gift two years ago and have been hooked ever since!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my husband because he loved the mini one I got for my birthday a few years ago. He loves that the casing is metal and you need very little product. Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Awesome; just wished it lasted longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Living in New England with very dry skin is hard enough but when my lips started (sorry for this) cracking and shedding daily, I needed something serious. This lip balm is amazing-It healed, soothed, protected and stayed on my lips longer than I would expect a product that is so glossy to stay (it gives a nice shine, not goopy or tacky at all). HOWEVER, I am giving it 4 stars because for $25 I would like it to have lasted me longer than 2 months, even with daily use. It's the only thing that works though, so I suppose I will be rebuying.

reviews.review_title: My go-to for polar vortex protection!
reviews.review_text: Easily the best lip protectant i've found yet. Even in the coldest temps my lips stay hydrated, plumped and soft. the formula is light, not greasy, and smells vaguely citrus-y. Love it, couldn't face the chicago winter without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment, it is moisturizing and really sinks in. I use once in the morning and nightly before going to bed and my lips feel good throughout the entire day, I don't find the need to apply any other balm.

This is by far my favorite lip balm. I always make sure to have one with me. The smell is fabulous and you don't have to constantly reapply like many other lip balms. It also leaves a non greasy finish so you don't have to worry about hair sticking to your lips. Perfect applied nude lipstick or alone for a natural look. I just love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Yes it's expensive but one tube last me a long time. And my lips are soft and hydrated. I use this product and lypsol for my lip care

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Angular chelitis snuck up on me for the first time this winter. It's no fun. I had been using eos lip balms regularly but still managed to get it, this is the only thing that helped. I used it all day everyday and at night for about a week or so and it cleared my angular chelitis. Now I know what to do if I ever get it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best balm for your lips hands down. However I did take off a point for the super high price tag on this product.

This has changed my life!!! I have tried every lip balm from atore brand to high end. This beats them all the price is a little high but beyond worth it. I have not had one day of chapped lips after buying this product. Finally a product that does what it claims to do. I am so impressed! I will never stop buying this product! Trust me it is worth every penny!!!

After reading all of the reviews on this product, I finally decided to splurge. Boy, was it worth it!!! There's nothing better as far as lip balm goes. The day I got it I applied it at night as part of my routine. I woke up in the morning with results! It kept my lips moisturized throughout the night, and I saw improvement with texture right away. My lips were definitely more plump, and no other lip balm has ever kept my lips this soft and supple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive lips and have developed dermatitis from a popular new sunscreen that seems to be in EVERY lip balm and lipstick these days so I was happy this one didn't have that ingredient.  It's a lot thicker and balmier than the other lip balms from Fresh and it's a great healer for super chapped lips or just as an everyday moisturizer for the lip area. I use it under pencil for a nice, natural finish that lasts all day long without looking too glossy or being uncomfortably dry.  As an added bonus, it's moisturized the skin right above my lip, too, which tends to get a little dry and flakey in winter.  I don't see this as an expensive product, perhaps because it works so well with such a small amount of product applied. And because it doesn't make me react or make my skin burn or swell.  But price per application (I use this just twice a day - once in the morning and once before bed, that's all I need) isn't exorbitant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I took a point off for the steep price, that's just ridiculous - although I'd buy it again lol. I was looking for something to help soothe my cracking lips this winter. I tried the regular balm in the brown packaging, but it didn't last and wasn't hydrating enough, so I tried this. I use it after the sugar scrub (also way overpriced) and I find it does a good job hydrating and smoothing them. I like the texture a lot and it stays on my lips for a few hours, which was surprising. It has really helped my lips so far, I'm liking it more and more as I go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have started using the Fresh Sugar lip products recently and have had very good results. I use the lip scrub and lip serum in the morning after I brush my teeth, and this Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment at night, and I have noticed a big improvement in the texture of my lips. It also has a pleasant scent.

reviews.review_title: Ideal to keep lips soft and hydrated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a treatment that seems more like a treat. Love the texture and the lovey lemon and sugar scent/flavor

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of the Fresh Sugar Advance Therapy Lip Treatment and loved how it made my lips feel; very soft and silky. This is my go to product at night. It helps moisturize my lips and keep them soft throughout the night. However, I do find that this product is a bit pricey, especially for how little product you actually get. Therefore, this is not a product you want to keep reapplying all day!
I have a terrible habit of picking my lips. this is the only thing that has helped soothe my lips enough to get me to stop

I got a mini last year in a multi pack of mini lip balms, and I've loved all the colors, but the plain one is my go-to at night. I tend to apply a color during the day but my lips get dry since I forget to reapply, so I swipe this on before bed and my lips are super soft in the morning. The only thing that makes it a 4-star instead of a 5-star rating is that for the price, it doesn't last super long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Read and pay attention to the reviews! Disappointing! Doesn't keep lips moisturized. Not what it's cracked up to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been dealing with my lips burning like crazy from being chapped this winter. I went to Sephora tonight to return a soap and glory lip balm that just didn't do it for me and one of the super friendly sales ladies directed to me this product oh my goodness I love this it just sinks in and I have pretty sensitive lips and the smell didn't bother me at all. This stuff is the bomb. :D

reviews.review_title: Love it but its too expensive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is awesome, it works well but $25 is just too much for the amount of product you get. I'll switch back to Kiel's once I'm done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it! Not sticky, smooth and nicely scented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing, and the Fresh Sugar's lemony scent is heavenly. Keeps my lips smooth and soft. Product lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Works very well, I put this on every night and wake up with soft lips. BUT the amount of product that you get for the price is ridiculous. This lip balm doesn't go very far at all. 3 stars because of the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was hoping for great things from this product.. And I just didn't see the results a $29 lip balm treatment should provide. I gave it a 3 because the smell is amazing! Light and fresh.. Some citrus. And it's fine, but I can get the same results from a 3 dollar drugstore brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: So. This stuff is wicked expensive for a lip balm, totally agree. However, I don't want my beauty lips to age. This isn't a balm you put in your pocket and apply 35 times a day, buy EOS for that (totally great!). I apply this as part of my bedtime routine. I'll apply this VERY last before I get into bed and in the morning I can honestly say that I can feel it on my lips still. Sometimes I'll apply it in the morning too after my morning routine. My lips don't dry out, they look and feel great, and there is definitely a slight plumping effect! I'm on my second one. Fresh products are great! In my opinion, it's a keeper.

reviews.review_title: Don't waste your money on this HOAX!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have really dry, chapped lips. I started using this after all the great reviews and at the suggestion of the store associate. First, I thought it was RIDICULOUS to pay $25 for chapstick - oh sorry, lip therapy treatment - but then I thought, Well, if it works then it's worth it! IT DID NOT WORK!! It feels good on your lips when you first put it on, but then 5 minutes later, your lips feel dry. It only lasted me about 2-3 weeks.. maybe because I had to keep reapplying because my lips kept feeling dryer and dryer. By the end of the tube, my lips had started to PEEL! I'm not blaming the product for that, it could be the weather, but it definitely did not make them better. I also just read the details on Sephora and found out it's supposed to be anti-aging and plump and smooth your lip area as well - definitely didn't do any of that either.  Don't waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I never understood the hype about this product until I tried it - now, im addicted. Nothing else leaves my lips feeling as silky-smooth!

Let me start off by mentioning that this product ITS WORTH EVERY PENNY!!  It's glides super smoothly, leave lips really hydrated and it smells awesome. I've been using other balms from the line and I simply love them. They're just keepers.  Only thing, WATCH where you leave them. They melt easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm not really sure how I feel about this. I had originally been using the $22 Fresh Sugar - Untinted Lip Treatment for a while and I found that one to be way more moisturizing and the product lasting longer on my lips than this one. Probably won't repurchase and will be going back to regular lip treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips started splitting on a trip to NYC and I popped in a Sephora and grabed the sugar lip therapy. I put it on before and after dinner and again at bedtime. Amazing!! I woke up with healthy lips. No splits or dryness. I'll never buy car ax or blistex again.

reviews.review_title: The Best Thing I've Tried So Far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have had extremely chapped lips since childhood, so I was thrilled when this worked! It moisturizes better than any other lip product I've tried and the effects last longer. I wish it was less expensive, but I'm willing to buy it because it works!

This year my skin/lips have been INTENSELY dry. I was applying and reapplying drug store lip balms every hour at minimum. I felt like a slave to the stuff because I just couldn't do without it. That was until I bought this Sugar Lip Treatment. I apply once in the morning and once before bed and that's it!!! My lips are so soft and have stopped burning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe sample of this product and I fell in love. It is super hydrating, and it smells really nice. Unlike other lipbalms it keeps your lips moisturized for a loooong time. I still think that $25 for a lipbalm is overkill, but I am already considering purchasing it after I run out of my deluxe sample.

I have chronically dry lips and was constantly reapplying lip balms to avoid that hideous flaking. Since I've started using this lip balm, I've needed to reapply less and my lips feel more hydrated on a daily basis. It also smells nice and has a smooth application...none of that tacky feel on my lips.
I love this stuff but it requires a lot of application and often. I'm beginning to wonder if it actually dries out my lips. I still love it ;)
Does everything it says it will, and does it well. The only problem is that it seems very loose in the container, I'm always afraid it will break off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: it smells good, it feels great on your lips, but sweet baby jesus, this is the worst packaging ever! the tube doesn't support the stick of product at all, so after using it a few times, it breaks off, then you have this lose stick of semi-solid balm rolling around in there, getting all over everything. This is such a poor design for such a nice product. Please, fresh, redesign the tubes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the product and will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had purchased the Sugar lip treatment in a tinted color - honey - and loved it so much I started wearing it at night, but wanted to not waste the tint on overnight use, so I got this untinted one to use at night. I wake up with super-soft lips.
Very good product. My lips was very dry. I use it at night. It keep my lips hydrate overnight.

I love this stuff! It is the best lip balm I have ever used. It glides on like velvet. My lips get very dry. Other lip balms go on but seem to just stay on top of my lips. This stuff seems to sink in and leave a softening barrier that stays on for hours. My lips seem to crack in places, especially at the corner of my mouth. I put this stuff on and could feel immediate relief. It really is worth the money but...just a warning. I used this stuff so much that it seemed to only last about 4 months (maybe longer) but, in my mind, this is a positive too. I usually end up throwing out partially used lip balms because I find something else I think works better. This stuff I used to the last drop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best Moisturizer balm that I have ever purchased. i went to the store intending to purchase the Sephore Tinted Lip Balm...but one salesperson showed me this one...I was at first a bit concerned about the cost as it was around $25 ...the most expensive lip balm....but when I tried it ..I was a goner...I loved its rich moisturising effect.... A little bit once a day is all I need now...once every mornin.. and its effect and texture stay on the whole day...I am not much of a user of Cosmetics...but When and if I use...them ..i Love to use this one as the base...for feeling soft and smooth lips....
Fresh products have yet to let me down. This is another great product by them. Great along or under/over a lipstick.

reviews.review_title: favorite of all the sugar lip treatments.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i just started using this and its by far my favorite of the lip treatments sold. There is no color it smells like lemon and sugar and it glides on so smooth and i don't usually have to reapply unless i drink liquids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this as a promotion a few months ago, and I loved it immediately. I used that sample down to the very end, then bought another. I am used to the cheaper lip balms, and I am rather cheap myself. Ha! But this is one of those things that I will splurge on, it's that good. I can really tell the difference on the days where I get caught out somewhere without it and use one of the cheap lip balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This really works--totally worth the investment! Best lip balm/treatment I've ever tried. My lips instantly felt smoother and hydrated. I initially bought Fresh's sugar lip polish exfoliator, but returned it after lackluster results. This, however, is a game changer. Your lips will thank you!

I use this every night before bed. It has light sweet smell and nice texture. I notice a difference in the appearance/health of my lips when I run out of this product and don't repurchase right away. It actually makes a noticeable difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: During the winter my lips often get very chapped and I need to exfoliate them with some scrub and a toothbrush. After that, I use this product and my lips feel amazing. They are instantly soothed and non-greasy. This product delivers everything it says and I am very happy with this product. I got it in a sample package awhile back and I immediately bought the regular size as soon as I finished my sample.

reviews.review_title: The last lip treatment you need to buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the only thing you need to keep your lips in great shape, even during harsh winters.
best lip balm ever~~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff really does what it claims to do! I bought it once, used it all, and loved it. But then I thought about the price and the $3 lip balm you can buy anywhere. And I bought the cheap stuff, trying to be frugal and prudent and stuff. Bad decision, at least this time. ;D This lip treatment moisturizes, softens, doesn't need to be reapplied 100 times a day, helps with the little lines starting to show themselves around my mouth. Doesn't feel or taste like wax. I'm a convert now. I'll never doubt again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best lip balm! It's long lasting, super moisturizing, and a light fresh scent. Applying it even feels like heaven :) Definitely worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is well worth the price. This lip balm works so much better than anything i've tried before. It is not sticky and it moisturizes for a long time. I only have it 4 stars because the only bad thing is that the product is very fragile- don't apply too hard or else it will break and don't store anywhere that is too warm as it will melt/break off.  Even though this happens, it is my go to lip balm and I repurchase all the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's decent lip balm. I expected more instant or intense relief since the price is pretty steep. Love sugars lip scrub but I've found cheaper lip balm with equal or better results.
I have been looking for years so a lip treatment that can treat my chronic lip dryness, this is THE best lip product I have ever bought!

This lip treatment is amazing. I am very picky when it comes to lip balms and chapsticks. I use this every single night before bed and in the morning my lips are still velvety soft! Well worth the money. You get what you pay for with the Fresh products!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I swipe this on before bed, and in the morning my lips are hydrated, soft and comfortable and plumps. Makes lipstick go on smooth. If you have a dark lipstick that you want to downplay, then apply this first and dab on the dark lipstick and end up with a gorgeous soft stain. I found this to be more effective than the hourglass lip oil which costs almost twice as much!
Works good. You don't need a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is a lifesaver during the winter. goes on easy, feels good while its on, and works better than any other lip balm I've tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Doesn't have a bad taste, feels good when I put it on, but not sure it's helping in the chapped lip area. It's nice. Not waxy like Chapstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is the best lip treatment ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this lip balm at night. I do use it sparingly since it is so pricey and I have other cheaper things that I can use daily. This has definitely been saving my lips during the winter, though. I gave it 4/5 just because of the price and how quickly you can go through the tube.

I LOVE this lip balm so much! I use it carefully because it is on the expensive side. If you're looking for a quick and guaranteed fix for chapped or damaged lips this is for you. Smells great and feels fantastic!
This is my go to lip product. Super hydrating and makes your lips feel like velvet. Also doesn't make you feel like you need to keep reapplying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I've been having serious issues with dry lips and cracked corners because of the Proactive I was using (I guess it got on my lips and was harsh at the corners of my mouth). Since I picked this up, I put it on every night after washing my face, before applying any serums or treatments and repeat in the am and throw some on from time to time during my work day. It has totally changed the condition of my lips. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This definitely refined the lines on my lips. I put it on every night and there are improvements in the morning. Don't use it on the day though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you've tried all kinds of lip balms, treatments to moisturize your lips and they still somehow dry out, then try this product, you put It on before you go to bed, and when you wake up, your lips are soft; this is another one of my must-haves

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had been having a big problem with chapped lips, but this therapy treatment was a God send. It feels great on your lips and is super hydrating. I used this along with the Fresh Sugar Lip Polish. Go great together!
love it. bought it twice

reviews.review_title: Not a good fit for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was inspired by the reviews. Tried it for over a week and it was drying and left my lips feeling roughed up. I am back to my simple aloe lip gloss.
I love it. I was a little spectacle about purchasing it since it's a little pricey but it works great it really does hydrated your lips and it so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had gone into Sephora looking for a lipstick that I could use with a hydrating chapstick, as my lips become very dry in winter and I have the tendancy to lick them. A beauty technician recommended this product to me with her own personal stamp of approval, saying she had horribly chapped lips as well and this had worked wonders for her. I feel like the overall condition of my lips has improved, but I have to constant reapply in order to keep my lips from drying up. I will most likely still purchase this product in the future, unless I find an alternative that will work with a lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm I have ever used! I use their regular lip treatment most of the year, but when the weather turns cold, I switch to the advanced. It keeps my lips hydrated and helps me keep them from getting chapped in the cold weather. I keep one in my desk, one in my bag and one next to my bed so I can always get my fix.

Is it expensive? Yep. Is it worth it? Oh yeah! This is the only Fresh stick balm without SPF, so I keep it on my night stand and use it right before bed. For that use only, it lasts about 3 months. It's all natural, the lemony pound cake scent is relaxing, and every morning I wake up with beautifully soft lips. This product makes me HAPPY. No other lip balm really compares, and I've tried 'em all. It's the one insanely overpriced thing I buy for myself, but at $25, it's a luxury that won't break the bank. Plus it's the exact amount I need to spend to get free samples and promo code items! Speaking of which, sometimes a deluxe sample of this is a promo item, so be on the lookout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is way overpriced, and i've found things for a dollar that work better. the tube is really small and it melts easily. do not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment it always saves my lips from being super chapped and it lasts a while. Its so good that my husband has his own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: We all live in a world where we need lipbalms. As a child, my mother told me that I would become addicted to lipbalms. I have tried numerous brands and this one is perfect. It is hydrating and exfoliating, smells really good. I use this lip therapy at night. I apply it once and that's it. Kind of expensive but worth it.

reviews.review_title: It may work better for some than others
reviews.review_text: Is it just me, or do the fresh sugar lip treatments with SPF smell better than this? Don't get me wrong, it still has that signature lemony scent but it smells a little too sweet for my liking. The lip treatments with SPF is on point in terms of scent. I got a mini of this from Fresh's fresh fix duo. I was really excited to try it on, as I'm a big fan of the regular lip treatments. So I put this on before I go to bed. I wake up and.... Nothing happened. Yes, this is more moisturizing than my usual night time balm (Burt's Bees beeswax lip balm) but the end results are still the same. Perhaps it's because I've literally just turned 15. Maybe this treatment will actually make a difference on aged or damaged lips. I'll use this mini up, but I won't be repurchasing. Why would a 15 year old girl need a $25 lip treatment anyway?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: this balm is really working. It acutally makes your lip feels better even you dont use it when you feel your lip is good. Because some other lip balm, they make your lip feels good when you are applying them. Once you stop use it, your lip got worse. But for this Fresh lip balm, it really makes your lip nurshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you can afford to spoil yourself a little this stuff is wonderful. It will make your lips feel silky smooth and hydrated. I use it before bed, as it's too expensive for constant use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best chapstick I've ever used. Makes my lips feel great while exfoliating them as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the way it melts on your lips when you apply it, I love it way it makes my lips look on and well after I've applied. It smells and tastes great. It also lasts me forever and I apply it every night and morning. Definitely recommend, even despite the price, because of how long a tube lasts me. I'd much rather splurge for this, than buying and tossing/losing a million chapsticks that don't do squat for me.
this is the best lip treatment I have ever used! It stays a long and keep my lip moisture. Very nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is the best Ive ever tried, tastes deliscious, hydrates and plumps, repairs damage from excessive dryness. I wear it to bed, have one on my desk at work, one in the car and one in my hand bag. It doesn't get better than this.

Ran into to sephora with super dry lips and asked for anything that would be like a lip balm. Was shown this. Appalled at the price! And the product although slippery and soothing has an odd bitter taste. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried this as an alternative to Bite's Mask, since I didn't like Bites packaging. I didn't last I had to keep reapplying all day. And when I didn't my lips would start peeling. So I'm going back to Bite. I'll deal with bad packaging over bad product any day.

I am completely in love with this lip treatment. I live in an incredibly dry climate and before I started using this every night before bed, I would have to apply lip chap multiple times during the day. Now, all I have to do it put this on before bed, and my lips are good all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite daily lip product! It is smooth and silky and is my go-to for dry lips. It glides on really smoothly and you don't need to use very much product, so it goes a long way! I am so obsessed that I have 3; one for home, one for the office, and one for my purse!

After reading a lot of reviews I went with this lip balm instead of the dior creme de rose , I've given it a few days and will be returning it. Didn't feel like it gave my lips any moisture just sat on top of them , not something you can wear under lipstick. For the price it should be amazing! Going to try the bite agave mask next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. It is super nourishing and hydrating. This product deserves a 5-star, but I had to subtract 1-star because it doesn't last long. I have extremely dry lips, so I have to reapply this constantly. As a result, I used one full size of lip treatment in 2-3 weeks. For $25, I would like it to last at least a month or so. But for those of you who don't need to reapply constantly and don't mind the price, I highly recommend this any day. Maybe when my lips aren't so dry, I will go back to this. But for now, I am going to stick with something a little bit more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love all of the Sugar lip products! My lips feel super soft after using this lip treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the Fresh Sugar lip products for over a year now and absolutely love them! They leave your lips super soft and the tinted ones add just a hint of color. I would definitely recommend this treatment for regular use, especially in the winter when lips tend to get dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is now my new lip balm. It is waxy enough to stay on almost all day, so I apply morning and night. It has a nice smell that is very neutral and not strong or overbearing.

reviews.review_title: The BEST product for dry lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: My son and I both have insanely dry lips. Aquafor works fine for him, but my lips have been enduring wear and tear for so many years that I need more. I have tried countless high-end and low-end lip care products, but this one is the BEST. My lips are instantly moisturized and it's long-lasting moisture - not that waxy lubrication, but actual moisture. I think this product is best for day usage. At night, I use a lip scrub two times a week sand use Kiss Me Tonight by Philosophy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great product to put on before bed and wake up with perfect lips -- its so hydrating. I haven't noticed any plumping, though. The taste is a little off-putting at first, but you get used to it after a few days of wear. Overall 9/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips seem to lean towards peeling... even when I have a lip balm on and have exfoliated. I've tried multiple products, but the Sugar products are the only ones that actually work. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: it plumps, softens & moistens. what more do you want?

reviews.review_title: Hands down, the best lip balm!
reviews.review_text: I have dry lips year round, and have tried many lipbalms. This is by far the best lipbalm! It is super moisturizing. I wish it was less costly, but I guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best I've found for using on my lips at night before bedtime. It keeps my lips soft and there's no peeling around my lips. Since it doesn't have an SPF listed, I use my Fresh lipsticks during the daytime. Also, I like the scrub that Fresh makes for really getting rid of any chap buildup from harsh weather.
Great lip treatment. And smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm I've ever had. It makes my lips so soft and smooth, and it's very hydrating. It isn't sticky but makes my lips look glossy. I'm in love!
I like this product. It moisturized my lips and made them smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was really looking for something to buy just to get a VIB bag. So i picked up this kit that contained a clear lip balm with 2 other colors and a lip scrub. i'm not much a lip balm but i thought i'd give it a try.  I really really love how hydrating these balms are. I'm even more surprised how long they last on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just started using this and i cant stop. its the best product especially because my lips are alwaysss dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I took accutane, for acne, for almost a year and since then I've never regained the moisture on my lips, which used to peel off like crazy. This is the ONLY ONLY ONLY lip care product that has ever made a difference in the moisture and texture of my lips. I cannot live with out it!
Best balm I've ever tried. Thick and hydrating without being sticky or uncomfortable. Stays around for hours, perfect for a bedtime lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: To keep my lips in decent condition, I apply this at bedtime. Works terrifically!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this constantly. Its so hydrating and it smells great. Can't ask for a better balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite product from this line. The only thing I don't like is the way bleeds into my mouth sometimes but it makes my lips feel good so whatever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not sure of its ability to plump and smooth wrinkles around the lip area, but it certainly hydrates the lips. Feels good...not tacky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried this product reluctantly. I really enjoy some of my other Fresh products, but had tried the lip sugar w/SPF in the past and didn't care for it. That being said, I'd been plagued with chapped, cracking lips for months. My usual physician recommended aquaphora was not helping. This stuff worked!!! I usually apply when I wake up, once during the day and before bedtime. This stuff lasts! My lips aren't cracked or chapped any more. It feels great layered underneath other glosses and lipsticks too. I will not be without this product.
Amazing at hydrating lips with a gear scent. Not sticky or slimy at all. Perfect lip balm in great packaging. However the product does go quickly and is quite expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good stuff about these Sugar Lip Treatments. I use the Advance Lip Treatment every night and the color ones most days. I've talked about these several times on my blog @ BaltimoreBeauty dot Blogger dot com.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love FRESH products. They literally are, like an oasis of incredible items that do a million wonderful things, and I never want this line to be discontinued! Ever! First off, the Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 and this Advanced Lip Therapy are really no different to me, except the price. The good thing, though, is that they both work astonishingly well. In Cleveland, it gets very cold, and this product is excellent at keeping my lips soft and beautiful 24/7. I am a true believer in this product, and the company in general, for making quality one of their main priorities. The only thing I do wish could be changed, is the amount that is given. I bought the Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 in August, and I am already running low. Then again, this product, and other items from FRESH, are GMO free, and I can't whine about the quantity size when it works so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a good lip treatment. The only negative thing about it is that it has a bitter taste. Once you put it on your lips, you have to be careful not to touch your lips with your tongue. Kind of disappointing.
It really works! No more dry/chapped lips for me..I use this lip treatment everyday, before I go to bed & maybe 2-3 times during the day. My lips has been very soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have notoriously dry lips, and need something to keep them hydrated longer that my lips aren't going to become dependent on (the way certain lip balm companies add ingredients to actually dry you out more). This works amazingly! It's smooth, very hydrating, and tastes nice. I put it on before bed and feel great in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Have enjoyed the other sugar lip treatments but once I tried this one, it blew the others out of the water. My lips have never felt so smooth and soft without any stickiness. I can't believe they out did themselves.
Worth every penny. Smells great, feels wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this as a bonus gift a while ago. Feels great on my lips and smells incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This smells and tastes yummy- really moisturizing but I wish it had SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for this product after reading reviews but this did nothing for my lips and it's not even winter yet. I'll stick to Rosebud which is very effective and a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It makes my lips feel really conditioned, and it doesn't dry them out like most lip balms do. I have asthma, and my lips tend to get dry easy from having to breath with my mouth open, and from the dry weather here in Arizona. I will keep using this product as long as they keep making it.
i thought this would be a more seal on my lips versus just hydrating chap stick....somewhat disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried a million lip balms, and this one is the best. It's so hydrating, and there's no SPF which usually irritates my skin! I always have 2 on the go...one for my night stand and one in my purse. It is expensive, but it's worth the cost. It has anti-aging benefits, it hydrates and there's no stickiness or smell. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Sometimes Summer lips are more chapped than during the Winter. Within three days my dry chapped lips were hydrated & back to normal. First time I tried this product but will add it to my favorites list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips were always dry and peeling until I picked up this product! Not anymore because IT WORKS! Super smooth and moisturizing. Even when it wears off my lips still look and feel good. 5 Stars!

I was super skeptical about this product because it's pricey for a Lip Baum but after using this I can't go back to any other brand. It's def worth every penny. I use to have a problem with dry lips and now my lips are super moisturized all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment combined with the Sugar Lip Polish.These two products make my dry lips feel so smooth. As I always say in my reviews - I would love to be able to buy these products in my home country.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: One of the best lip treatments I've used! It nurishes lips and lasts quite long. I usually put it on my lips in the morning and night before I go to bed. Its high price is the only downside though. Still great product if your lips get easily dried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment is amazing. It not only moisturizes my lips but has actually made them look smoother and plumper!

After hesitating to purchase this because of its high price, once I bought the Advanced Therapy lip treatment I was very pleased with it. A little goes a long way with this; I tend to apply only at night (before sleeping) to maximize its use. Leaves lips feeling supple and smooth.

reviews.review_title: Effective for damaged lips, but pricey
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is effective at repairing damaged lips, but a bit of overkill in my opinion if your lips are basically healthy and not cracked or dry. Also, it's obviously very pricey. I find that Blistex Medicated lip balm is just as effective on cracked lips, maybe even more soothing, yet it costs only $3 or $4 at the drugstore compared to $25+.  That said, the Sugar balm does last for a good while, just as long as e.g. Blistex. I've been using a travel sample I received from Sephora (0.08 oz) every night before bed. It's been more than a month and it's still going strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I don't know what happened this spring, but my lips and the skin surrounding my lips became extremely dry and irritated. It was red and itchy. My lips kept peeling. I started off with drug store branded lip balm and those helped for a while, but then it was like my lips grew resistant to the effects after one month and I had to look for alternatives. Fresh Sugar Advanced Lip Treatment is expensive in my opinion, as I finished using it in less than a month. However, it has helped my lips return to the natural moist state, so I guess it was worth it. 4 stars because it's slightly over-priced and because it also feels greasy and my boyfriend hates it whenever I kiss him with this on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I originally thought Clinique had the best moisturizing lip treatment with Repairwear Intensive Treatment and then fell in love with Marc Jacobs' Make-out Liplock (also good). But this moisturizer is the best of them all! Since their is no SPF it is extra moisturizing. I even bought one for my mother (she is 73) and she is hooked! Excellent for year round but even more so in the winter! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment its one of the best!! works great and is more like a treatment (like the name suggests) then a lip balm that just sits on top of your lips this product actually works!! only complaint is that it runs out too fast i wish i had an endless supply so i don't have to pay $25 eveytime i run out :)
A few of my friends said this product is really good. But it just don't work for me, doesn't change anything.
This is a holy grail lip balm. I got it in a sample set from fresh and I make sure it's always on hand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been a fan of the regular Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment since it was released. I refused to buy this one for a while because I really didn't think it was different/special enough to justify the higher price point. I was wrong. The Advanced formula is just that - advanced. I have chronically dry lips and the regular one was the only balm that previously helped them. This one has made a major impact in only a few days! My lips are so soft. Silky. They haven't peeled or been flaky since I started using this (a common occurrence for me - even in warm months). This balm does everything it claims to. My lips look more plump...younger and fresher. My friend asked what lip color I am wearing yesterday...and I didn't have anything on but this. I think it is improving the natural color of my lips, as well. I've started using this in conjunction with their Serum and my lips look and feel better than ever. Both are definitely worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I honestly do not think one could find a more satisfying lip treatment. From the smell (who doesn't love sugar?) to the silky moisture that slides on your lips, and LASTS, one would have to be daft to ignore this product.  Oh, and let's not forget it contains NO parabens, sulfates, dyes, or triclosan!  Since it doesn't include SPF, (which is totally fine since other lip balms in their line do), my favorite time to use this treatment is right before I go to bed. Waking up with luscious lips is the best feeling.  Anti-aging moisture for the win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried this lip treatment for the first time after utilizing the version with the SPF in it. This one is much much better! My lips don't dry out quite like they used to and this is a great all around lip treatment.
I use this after the lip scrub and it keeps my lips soft for the rest of the day. Even my bf steels it sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hydrating. My lips are extremely dry all year round and this is my go to product. I'm reapplying a couple times a day as needed. I usually go through this product every two months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: The first time I received this product was as a sample and before that sample was even gone I purchased the full size. This lip treatment is amazing! My lips feel so hydrated every single time I apply it. Will definitely be purchasing this again and again.

I personally love this lip treatment, it is very moisturizing and really penetrates deep into my lips. I do find myself reapplying it more than I would like to, but it is a very affective and smooth lip treatment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Leaves my lips hydrated and smooth, comes in beautiful packaging, smells amazing. I've noticed that even when it has faded, my lips don't start to dry out or crack like what happens with my other lip balms. Well worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this with the regular Sugar balm in the daytime, and this at night with Clinique's lip wrinkle treatment at night. Slowly but surely, lips are looking more hydrated and fine lines are diminishing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wrote a review almost exactly a month ago on the sugar rose tinted balm, about how much I loved it. Now a month later I'm pretty much out. I'm disappointed because this is by far my favorite balm, but I have to apply it multiple times a day. Super moisturizing but definitely not long lasting. The price is way to high for a product that runs out so quickly. I may re purchase, but use it sparingly. Another drawback is that here in California it's super hot, so it melts very easily. Such a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was plagued with chapped lips all winter & could not find anything that fixed it....until I purchased this product. In just a few days of using Fresh Sugar several times a day, my problem cleared up. I will not be without it next winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It does a good job of moisturizing, lasts a reasonably long time and tastes good. But the tube only lasted through a month of moderate use, so for the price I just don't think it's worth it. Going back to my drugstore standby.

reviews.review_title: good, but a bit too pricey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment was included in a deluxe sample kit that I recently received. It works very well, and it definitely moisturizes and nourishes the lips. The smell is also very nice - sort of a light brown sugary smell but nothing overpowering. My only minor complaint is about the price because although it is a good product, that seems like a lot for the size of the product.
Like so many other reviews say....it's worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was really hyped to use this but it just didn't work for me :( it was like a regular balm I've used and I just didn't see the difference. My lips however felt soft, moisturised and smooth but my lines did not fade anyhow. The smell though is really candy lemony and its nice. I've had it 4 months now, using it twice per day, and there's still some in the tube which I use on and off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Super hydrating and feels amazing on your lips. Smells a little like lemon - a very fresh and summer-y scent. It lasts about 2 hours on your lips before feeling like it is gone. For how expensive it was, I was hoping it would last a little longer before getting that feeling of needing to reapply but that wouldn't stop me from purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the best thing I have ever used on my super dry lips. It is extremely moisturizing and the consistency on my lips is very nice. It also smells amazing. Kind of like lemon cake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this as part of a VIB ROUGE kit- tried it once and I love it. My lips feel so moist and soft after applying and it takes care of the dryness I suffer from in the lip area. I will definitely be ordering this again- a friend at work asked me what I did to my lips because they look so much better since I started using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite lip product. I love the softness and just the overall feel when I saturate my smile. I keep this tube with me at all times and would 100% recommend.  My only gripe is that it melts easily if kept in a pocket and once it melts or the stick is compromised in any way, its useless as an easy stick to lip application... you will have to apply to finger then to lip, so keep your tube in a cool location if possible.

I loved this product when I first got it! It made my lips so soft & it even smelled really great. I left it in my purse that was in the car & it melted a bit so I just let it harden back up & it was fine but after that it wasn't the same. It gave my lips little, tiny bumps and I know for a fact it was from the lip balm because it was the only thing I used on my lips. I had an allergic reaction to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I Can SO Tell A Diff. W/ My Lips & Lip- Color Application w/ this! I like to apply it after I exfoliate my lip's, brush my teeth (Always put something on after, now my something is SO this!), a cpl of minutes before I apply lip-color, and before bed! I try to use it sparingly (perk) and a little goes a L-O-N-G way! When I do run out I'm def. gonna buy some! Btw, everything in the FRESH perk set is So awesome & when I run out I will have to replace the sad empties w/ new!

reviews.review_title: love!! LOVE LOVEE.. but far to expensive.
reviews.review_text: have loved fresh products since i first begin using the rose mask. I have sensitive/dry/and sometimes oily skin. So i took the chance of trying the lip sugar... my lips are thankful, but my wallet is not... Not only is it only filled about halfway, the product seemed to meltso it was great the first couple of days.. But not so much later on. .

reviews.review_title: Wont order this product on line again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this product, but the lip treatment arrived broken off and stuck in the cap. It must have gotten too hot along the way. I don't have the time to return it, but will wait until I can get to a store to buy it again.
Love it so muchuff01 Fresh never let me down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Nice lip feel- not thick like the Fresh Tints- creamy, hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one of the BEST Lip Treatments I have used, its worth every penny - after using once in the morning and once before bed, my lips have never been so baby soft using any other lip treatment/balm. I am so glad Sephora introduced me to this product, it is good for those who do not or can not handle fragrance and are not looking for color with their lip moisturizer. All the cracks and dry flakes are gone and I rarely use any lip primer . The only time I use lip primer now is when I do not use my FRESH SUGAR ADVANCED THERAPY BALM for about 5-7 days.My lips do seem much fuller and look plump and hydrated. I recomed this product to anyone who wants natural looking, baby - soft, plump and hydrated lips without any hassel...simply apply 2 times a day, a thin layer is all that's needed , and forget about it. This will do all it promises to do and more. Definitly a high quality product !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I guess I thought this was going to be super amazing for the price... Nope, doesn't feel any different on my lips than carmex or chap stick. I've actually had to reapply it in the middle of the night if I've awoke because of dry lips. Definitely not worth over $10.00 let alone $25.00!!!
I thought that I would never pay for an expensive Chapstick but honestly this has changed my complete opinion!! I love this soooo much and it's is like clouds!
I got the sample size with my order. I tried it and i loved it! I will absolutely buy it! It leaves your lips really smoooth!(: and it lasts for a very long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I thought Chapstick was where it was at when it came to lip care. No other brand, high end or drugstore, touches Sugar, though. This stuff, although expensive, is amazing at hydrating, smoothing and cushioning your lips. It has a slight smell/flavor, but isn't perfumy or overwhelming like some other lip treatments. It works wonderfully at those tasks, however, I don't see any plumping effects. This is ok with me but don't buy this if you are looking for a plumping effect.

reviews.review_title: Who say's SUGAR is bad for you ?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this SUGAR product and all of the colors that it comes in!! My 10 and 11 year old daughters are also hooked on it. It does melt easily, so place it in your freezer for a bit before heading out this summer. This product is a must have :)

I LOVE this lip treatment!! At first I was a little shocked at the price. I was able to justify the cost by how well it works for my lips! I have very dry cracked lips, and this stuff really helps. After using it, my lips are soft and fuller looking. I will be buying it again!

This lip treatment will leave your lips baby soft for hours, and it smells great! The smell actually reminds me a little bit of coca-cola, but in a subtle way. My two complaints: the product itself is very pliable, so you can sort of feel the stick bending as you press it against your lips-- I'm concerned after a few more uses it'll just turn into a clumped mess. Also, this things is insanely expensiveu2026.If you ever find a good deal (or get the VIB Fresh Lip special, like I did), snag it while you can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product works. Sugar Advanced Lip Treatment is the best product for the lips I have found. Worth every dollar spent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the fresh smell and it is the best moisturizer for my lips. One application lasts for a few hours, which is way better then my $10 tube lip treatments. It smells fantastic and works even better. Highly recommend it.
Moisturizes lips well, and has a delicious lemony scent! Only problem I see is that stick is on soft side, and would probably break easily. Love the screw on cap that prevents an ugly purse mishap!

reviews.review_title: The best lip balm out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I constantly have chapped lips, and I have tried COUNTLESS products, but none have even come close to the high quality of this! 100% worth spending $22.50! It even has a great lemony smell! This is definitely my favorite lip balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the original when I got it as a birthday gift from Sephora last year. When I saw the Advanced Therapy, I thought I'd see if there was any way they could have improved upon the original--and they did! I can't believe how well it heals chapped or dry lips. I use this with a nude lip liner sometimes and it's perfect. The texture is like buttery silk. Love!!! New fav!!! Can't live without product.
Best lip balm in winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This took care of my horribly chapped, dry lips when nothing else could. Now it keeps them soft and pretty :)  I recommend buy the sugar lip scrub as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually use FRESH Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 in clear and it works better than this one. I've been using Fresh Sugar Advanced Thearpy Lip Treatment for about 6 months, maybe a bit over but it doesn't keep my lip as moist throughout the day compare to FRESH Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 in clear. It does moist my lips but does not exfoliate and wears off within a couple of hours if I don't eat/drink anything after I've applied it on. But I have to reapply every time I drink or eat because my lips are just that dry which is a bit annoying because I do drink a lot of water. As for if it smooths winkles, I don't know. I don't get a feel of enhancing volume as well. I will not be purchasing this one again mainly because it's not worth it for its price.

reviews.review_title: Bought this based on the reviews...disappointed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have INCREDIBLY dry lips and I'm always trying different balms/treatments so I had high hopes based on all the positive comments. It's just like all the others...just sits on my lips, looks greasy and doesn't penetrate. I would probably have given it a 3 or so as it's no better or worse than all the others...but for me it's a 1 cuz I was majorly disappointed :-(
Love love love this!! Works like a dream! Made my lips soft as ever

reviews.review_title: The best lip protection that I've ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the Fresh line and their lip balm is the best that I've ever used. This one has SPF protection.

reviews.review_title: amazing, and you see improvement of your lip!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have to say, this is one of my FAVORITE lip balms. I got it as a sample with the lipgloss also in fresh's sugar line, at a local mall within my area (fresh was having a spin to win) I admit it goes on a bit too greasy, but this problem is easily solved by leaving the lip balm in the fridge overnight. The next morning it will glide on thin and nice.  Anyway, I love this lip balm! it is SUPER hydrating, and I saw my lips get pinker and softer within a week! Although its expensive, it is very worth the price!
I love this stuff. I use it in the morning when I'm getting ready and at night when I'm taking off my makeup/washing my face. Goes on so smooth and feels wonderfully nourishing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: First, the smell is amazing. Secondly, the application of the product is so smooth and instantly hydrating. I noticed that it is not a superficial moisturizer meaning that after 30 minutes on my lips they don't feel dry again. I tried to use it as a lipstick base, but that didn't work very well for me. I didn't think the lipstick could get enough coverage. It is kind of expensive for a lip balm but I am sure I will purchase again as this product is very nice on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use to suffer of dry lips, and tried everything, but nothing helped! Combine this with the exfoliater and you will have soft, healthy, smooth, full lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have always suffered from dry lips that even peel a bit. Not a cute look under any lip color. I have been using this only at night before bed, and I have noticed that during the day my lips do not get as dry as they had been.
