I recommend this along with the Sugar Polish, but I only use the lip scrub about once a week. This is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have really try lips and had high expectations from this product considering that it is expensive. However, it didn't do anything for my lips. I'm very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! Goes on incredibly smooth & makes my lips feel super soft. It also keeps my lips from being dry & flaky. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is that I feel like I have to reapply a lot, but that doesn't stop me from continuously buying this.
I put it on every morning and every night my lips are alwYs soft it's an essential item!!!

Not worth the price! In my opinion it works just like any other lip balm. I've used it almost every day and STILL have to use it every day because it has not made a difference overall. Too expensive for it to just work the same as any other!

I have an issue with dry lips. I must keep them moisturized or they are uncomfortable or even crack sometimes. I have to stay on top of moisturizing or I would not be able to wear lipstick, when I want to. I can honestly say I have tried so Many of these products, at all price points, I have lost count This is by far the very best. I keep one at home, bedside and one in my handbag at all times. I would be heartbroken if it were to be discontinued .
Wear it to bed and during the day if I'm not wearing the tinted color version. It's well worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this and just will not try any others, again. I have gone back and forth, but this is by far the best ever. Living outside of Chicago, temps are extreme,and this has never failed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many lip balms. You don't even wanna know how much. All those lip balms that I've tried makes my lip skin flaky and start to peel once it drys. But this one it's so hydrating and doesn't make my lip dry when it dries out. This is a must have !

I had the regular sugar lips which I loved, my lips were extra dry this winter so I purchased this. It had a bad taste when I would accidentally lick my lips, and it was too pricey, I felt the drug store brands did the same job, if not better.

I absolutely love and rely on my Sugar advanced therapy. I use it every night before bed to keep my lips from being dry and flaky. I ran out and tried something else and had to switch back. I will not go without it again!!!

Can't say I was overly impressed with this Chapstick - didn't feel like it moisturized my lips it was more of a gloss nice to use in a hurry on my way out the door. Most likely won't purchase again though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Fresh's sugar lip balm is my favorite lip balm. It is very light and very moisturizing. The only thing is the lip balm can be a little greasy if you over apply it. I also love the packaging! Unlike other lip balms - its very sealed so gross stuff wont go in the product.
Fresh lip balm is amazing. It is very moisture
Super moisturizing! I don't know that I'll ever go back to regular lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love all the regular Sugar Lip Treatments, but this is really great for those times when my lips are even drier than normal. Same great scent and texture with more healing power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have insanely dry lips and I've tried many different lip products out there. I put this on at night when I go to bed and it makes a big difference. The biggest difference I've had with ANY other product so far. It's the BEST.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my go to lip quencher. Makes my lips feel soft and hydrated without feeling sticky. I've given this as a present to my mom and niece who are equally addicted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hydrating but made the edges of my lips itch.

Absolutely love this balm. I've started noticing the lines on my lips deepening a little and this has really helped to plump up and improve the texture of my lips.  One star off because for best results, you do need to reapply fairly often. This is a small amount of product for the price- I wish it were either a little bigger or less expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm ever. I use it overnight and the Dior addicted during daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It never absorbed and just was there. I never noticed a difference in my lips. It never helped the dryness and peeling. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was told this was the most highly moisturizing lip product Fresh makes but I honestly think the ones with spf provide better moisture. I've been using this stuff nightly for 2 weeks and have yet to notice any difference.
Very thick in consistency and did not penetrate to moisturize effectively. Dryness did not improve.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Yes, this is quality lip balm. Tastes good, goes on nice and smooth, makes your lips look nice and healthy. But I've purchased lip balm under $5 that does all the same things and lasts the same amount of time as this one. It's just regular run of the mill lip balm. I gave it 4 instead of 3 stars though because I love how the top / lid twists on and off the balm - that really helps when it's lost at the bottom of my purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes
reviews.review_text: This stuff is just too good! I've had allergic reactions to a ton of lip moisturizers, and this is the only one that seems to keep my lips happy! The price tag is a little steep, next to most drug store brands, but it is worth every penny. It's very hydrating, non-sticky, and long lasting. Makes me lips so soft!  Tip:: After I've used all of it, I will stick my finger in the bottom of the tube - there's still quite a few uses down there! I just wipe my finger off afterwards. You could always use a lip brush too, if you want to keep your finger clean. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It moisturizes and makes my lips feel like new. I would totally buy this product again.
Love love love this! Can't go wrong. Buy it
Amazzzzzzing,the best and worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product was essentially just like any other lip balm I own, I for sure did not see any intense hydration that I was looking for. Not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product - I'm on my fourth tube. I use the lip scrub twice a week and this before I go to sleep and have been for about 4 months. My husband doesn't really notice to much about my beauty routines but he defiantly has noticed how soft my lips are lately. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it! 'Nuff said.

I love the Fresh lip tints, so I figured I'd try this lip therapy. Whoever said this is great for chapped lips during the winter months is so right! But this definitely is a go-to moisturizer all year-round. Only problem I find with all the Fresh lip products is the metal tub. In the summer, the product melts.
moisturizing and nourishing.my favorite lip balm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Although it's pricy, it worths every single penny. I have a very dry lips and it's difficult to find a lip balm that really works on me, but this one keeps my lips so hydrated and has improved my dry lips, the only disadvantage is that it runs out very fast

This is the most luxurious lip balm I have ever used. It is so rich and moisturizing. I only need to apply it once in the morning and once in the evening without needing to constantly reapply it like cheaper alternatives. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It is the first lip balm I've ever used up.. Not like other lip balms, it really hydrates and moisturizes your lips deeply, not just like applying a wax film on the surface.. (hope it makes sense!) However, it is too expensive and I found the one from Elizabeth Arden also does a nice job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought last year and immediately loved it. It took exactly one year to use a tube and now I've bought another. Long lasting silky feel makes my lips feel awesome for hours and hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is la great treatment for your lips. My lips were dry and definitely not smooth enough for lipsticks (or kissing). I use this at night and occasionally in morning when getting ready. I love how it feels-not heavy or sticky. I highly recommend this product.
Leaves my lips super soft even during polar vortex! Get two.
This really works!! It glides on. Doesn't feel sticky and repairs the most damaged lips. I buy this over and over again.

My lips were in REAL bad shape, cracking and flaking apart. I needed the big guns, used this religiously and my lips are looking so healthy now. Had to reapply quite frequently which was really my only criticism.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the way it makes my lips feel! Hoping it will keep my lips young looking!

It does keep my lips smooth and has a fresh scent but it feels thin on the lips. It also seems to come off easily. So I usually wear this at bed time that way it does its job before I accidently eat or rub it off.

reviews.review_title: Great feel and light lemony scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The Fresh Sugar lip treatment goes on silky smooth and has a very pleasant lemony fragrance. It is hydrating, but does not seem to last as long as I expected it to, which is the reason I didn't give it 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product only covers ur lips with a waxy feel. it wears away soon. does not hydrate lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I would use a natural and highly used balm - one that was used for many years . I always thought there is nothing else so natural and settled for the way it worked - but then I tried this great product by chance and found a natural and way better way to kern my lips soft and young looking being an older woman ! This has worked like no other - I like the neutral ( plain ) I also when need use the colors honey my favorite when I am looking for color . I can layer my lipstick over any color and they keep my lips moist . This product is a God sent ! Thanks fresh ! No more bee stings lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This Lip Balm is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: My favorite ever. I have super dry skin and use this every night before bed. Keeps my lips hydrated & from flaking
works really well, the smell is cute also!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've become obsessed with Fresh products and this is one of the greatest lip treatments I've used. Gives a slight dewy appearance once applied and helps to repair damaged lips due to dryness or cracking etc. Just be careful when its hot , I had it in my pocket on a very hot day, it melted :( so it stays in my handbag or at home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: great flavor (i hate lip products that smell or taste weird), super moisturizing in cold WI winter, cannot be without. doesn't last quite as long as i would like, or maybe i'm just addicted to applying it! :) SUGAR lip products are the best though! you won't regret trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Feels fabulous and a bit more hydrating than the original

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love, love, love this product to the point I will drive 45 minutes just to get it. I want no other lip balm on my lips ever again. It is luxurious, softening, gets rid of lip lines, and has a nice feel. A must have in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I sing that song ..Lips like sugar (Echo&The Bunnymen) when I see the results of using the lip treatment with the scrub. Good stuff + worth the price if you want soft dead lip skin free lips!

reviews.review_title: Best thing to happen since electricity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of buying this since it is $25, but I decided to get one. It's honestly the best thing I've ever used on my lips - ever! This stuff is absolutely amazing! This not only hydrates my lips but soothes away any irritation after exfoliating my lips. I use this after I exfoliate my lips and I tell you if I use this every night before bed I don't have any chapping or discomfort through an entire 12 hour work day. I also use this any time I wear lipstick and I don't experience any drying or irritation. I have some slight discoloration (lighter coloring) on the inner part of my upper lip and this product appears to be correcting this issue! I wish I had taken before and after pictures. I encourage anyone/everyone to try this lip treatment. Your lips will make you want to smile all the time because they feel so amazing! :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm I've tried. It helps repair and nourish the lips. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Wow. So worth it. Back for more. If only I can get myself to use it only at the most-needed times, due to the cost. It feels nice, smells nice, makes lips look like they were airbrushed, and WORKS to heal cracked and peeling lips. I really just feel like throwing away all my other balms. Even the similar formulation products just don't compare with the results this delivers. For serious sufferers, THIS is salvation worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best balm for my lips at night or over lipstick to hold in moisture. My lips always feel hydrated and soft. I can't go to sleep unless I have applied my Sugar and where I go my Sugar goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: My husband's knickname for me is desert lips. I rely on this to combat my dry, flaking lips. This is the only lip balm I've come across to fix my lips. It's expensive, but it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The price tag might be a bit discouraging, but I'm extremely unabashed when it comes to spending money on quality lip products because I have characteristically and exceptionally dry, chapped lips. No matter what I use ranging from drug store to higher end lip balms and treatments, nothing is able to soothe and satiate my lips like the sugar lip treatment has been able to. I apply it every night before I go to bed and my lips are hydrated and plump the next morning and throughout the day. It's not sticky or over-glossy like many lips products I've tried, and I like the twist-up packaging. I don't know if it's just me, but I use these up so quickly and I always find myself going back to sephora for more! It's DEFINITELY worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is simply the best. First had some as my birthday gift (thanks Sephora) but quickly became addicted. Have tried lots of others, keep coming back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a must have item in my bag. I literately bought several of these and put it into different bags. Because I always forget bring them with me when I switch to carry another bag. LOVE them so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Nothing could soothe my chapped lips, I tried so many products. Then I gave this a shot, totally rejuvenated my lips in just 24hrs. I absolutely recommend it, especially in the winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I suffer from chronically dry, chapped lips, and I always keep coming back to this product. It seems expensive for lip balm, but nothing else that I've tried even comes close to working as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is soothing on my lips. I love the glossy look it adds to my lips, with or without lipstick.
Excellent for dry lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am currently on my third tube of this balm and I will continue to keep buying it because it is wonderful! I am a huge fan of the regular, tinted Sugar Lip Treatments and gave this a shot and was very impressed. I use this in the morning and at night as part of my skin care routine and it keeps my lips moisturized for hours. I'm still young, but I'm hopeful this will help keep my lips looking young for years to come! It may seem like a steep price but it's worth it and it's lasts for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The advanced formula is the BEST. keeps lips fresh, and especially for anyone with dry lips and also changing temps. LOVE IT, and worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always keep this lip balm stashed in my nightstand table because it is the best at soothing your lips instantly as well as keeping them smooth all night long. It is extremely hydrating and smooths your lips over night for extremely smooth lipstick application the next days! It is a highly recommended product by me and it smooths your lips as well as plumps them to make them look flawless a few hours after application as well as instant hydration! No other balm like it, worth the price tag!
This is my very favorite treatment for lips! I've given it to many of my friends as gifts, and they all love it! Your lips remain moist and soft all day.

I have been using this stuff for about a year now. Before using it, my lips would be dry and uncomfortable no matter what I did. I always wondered why because I make sure to always stay hydrated, and was always using chapstick and lip gloss. My lips changed after using this. They are plump, very comfortable even in this dry winter weather of new england. Put it om before you go to sleep and see how great your lips feel in y,the morning!! Great product.

I have had extremely dry chapped lips and was hoping this would be therapeutic for my chapped lips. I really expected and hoped for more. I honestly was more impressed with my eucerin aquaphor lip therapy. It blows sugar lip therapy out of the water. Won't be purchasing this 25 dollar tube again. Plus didn't last me all but 3 weeks. That's how often I was applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a lip treatment that's hydrating without feeling heavy, and a friend recommended this. I haven't stopped thanking her. My lips have never felt so fresh and wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: For the first winter ever - and what a winter it is in NY, talk about dry! - I don't have chapped lips. This stuff is just the best ever. Just wish it weren't so expensive.
Holds up during a brutal Michigan winter!

reviews.review_title: Won't use any other lip balm!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. What I like best is that it has no flavor/taste. I hate those balms with artificial flavors. This balm is not greasy and lasts on your lips a long time. I know it's pricey but totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it! Really moisturizes and smoothes dry lips. Despite the price, I can't stop buying this lip balm.

the lip balm contains good ingredients, it slides on my lips easily and softly, and it doesn't irritate my lips 'cause I have sensitive lips! Definitely repurchase this and will try other lip products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am constantly searching for a lip product that will help my chronically chapped lips and I've tried everything- but this seriously has been the best. Feels great, smells great and I notice a difference! Softer, smoother lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Really did not like this product. I only got this because the original sugar lip treatment with spf 15 was out of stock. The salesperson told me this is more moisturizing, etc. It ended up drying out my lips to the point where they started peeling. It could've been a strange reaction I had to the product. I definitely recommend the other lip treatment with spf with the brown packaging. That is by far the best lip treatment I've used to date.

reviews.review_title: Fresh sugar advanced therapy lip treatment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best lip treatment I have found! It is hydrating without being sticky and truly moisturizes the lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years now... My lips can get sensitive to some of the regular lip balms out there, so I tried this out of desperation. Not only does it not irritate my lips, but they feel so good. This goes on smooth and smells fabulous. I keep one in my purse and one in my bathroom at home so that I always have it handy. I highly recommend! ! !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This Fresh Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment is exceptional. It's nothing like the chappy balms from the drugstore! This is skincare for the lips. I've been using it overnight for about a week now, and I can really see a difference on my lips and the skin around my lips. I've recently invested in some high-end lipsticks, and this Fresh treatment ensures the best results. Well worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm a devotee of the fresh lip treatments and have pretty much all of them. They are amazing, worth the money, and live up to all the hype for sure. This is another great product, but if you already have the original balm (in the maroon tube with SPF), I don't think there is any point to buy this one. They seem identical to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is, by far, the single greatest lip balm of all time. I was a devoted (addicted) blue ChapStick user for more than 10 years, but this product has a smoother feel and the moisture lasts so long. $25 for lip balm seems ridiculous, but it's worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the 2nd tube of this I have purchased, and I love it! It makes my lips very soft and plump. I use it every night before bed, as well as right after I use my Fresh Sugar Lip Scrub to make my lips extra soft.

This lip treatment is the only thing that I've found that heals chapped lips almost overnight! It goes on smoothly and feels like butter for your lips (and I mean that in the best way possible). It is expensive but it's worth the cost.

During these extreme winter months, my lips have gotten EXTREMELY dry, cracked, just awful... I tried the Josie Maran lip treatment and it did NOTHING for me, so I decided to give this product a try and I have fallen in LOVE with it, it's truly amazing, I put it on at night and when I get up in the morning my lips are super moisturized!. No more cracks, no more dryness!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product and keep repurchasing! I get very dry lips in the winter and I just put this on at night before bed and my lips wake up so much better than with any other product I have tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Skip this one if you're in dire need of moisture and your lips are cracked and chapped. This products seems to dry out my lips more than they were before I used it! The product goes on globby and it doesn't even taste good. I'd rather rub pure sugar all over my lips with some oil to exfoliate than buy another tube of this stuff. Great concept, poor execution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: its good, but not lasts for very long time moisture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have problems with my lips getting dry and my lipstick clumping. The clerk recommended this product for my problem. It's overpriced and I don't feel that it is any better than some of the moisturizing lip balms that I have purchased in the past.
This literally cures my dry lips and makes them feel healthy without the greasy feeling. Also doesn't dry out my lips if you don't use it all day. Best thing I've ever purchased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a staple in my bag at all times. I love how light but luscious this lip balm feels. I use it before bed and wake up with soft lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Fresh Lip Treatment. I have this (no color) Advanced Therapy Treatment and also the Rose and I love them. This really keeps my lips moisturized and conditioned. The Rose is great too, it's just the right amount if color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's smells good feels good going on but I noticed my lips are getting every dry since I've started using this my Carmex works better then this so I will not be buying this again.
This is a great lip product for those dry and chapped lips, it is also convient that it is a balm so it's not sticky like some moisturizing products. It applies very smoothly and velvety.

reviews.review_title: Expensive but does what it says!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Since using this my darker lip colors look and last better and longer, this is a great treatment that isn't goopy or sticky. Great for applying at bedtime.

I asked for a recommendation for the best product on the market to heal dry, chapped lips, and was told without a doubt that it was the Sugar Advanced therapy Lip Treatment. Although it was pricey, I decided to try it. Unfortunately, it has not shown to be any different than any other lip balm, even those at a fraction of the price. I will not be purchasing this item again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I get disgustingly chapped lips, like wake up in the morning with bleeding lips chapped lips, I own all of the major drugstore brands various forms of chapstick, and they did nothing to help and I was about to book an appointment with a doctor to figure out what was going on with my lips. The SA at my local sephora was my last hope and she did deliver. Within a day of using this product, my lips went from reptilian to human being. A little bit goes a long way with this stuff, and I only use it when I am having some serious chapping issues. The fresh lip balms are very melty I've noticed (I own every color), and this is no exception, so when I am not using it to treat my lips I keep in the refrigerator.
My all time favorite. Well worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I mean, it is probably one of the pricier lip balm out there but it's like a treat and it works amazing! I bought the tinted ones they felt less hydrating but this one definitely is a life saver. I was having cracking lips that hurt and this soothe the pain. Fell in love since then!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to lip treatment. I love wearing it to bed for added hydration and when I'm out in the hot sun or drying, harsh cold it's always comforting.

I've been using this almost a year now and I love it. I smoke and suffer from dry lips especially in the winter time. And this is good to apply thru out the day or before putting on a lip stain or lip stick. I personally use at bed time and I see a difference in my lip conditions altogether. The dark stains from smoking have lightened and my lips aren't chapped anymore. It smells good. Very subtle scent. Recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is such a fabulous lip treatment that I can't help myself, even though it costs a bit. Simply put, I love it! With my lips natural pigment, which is quite deep, it looks absolutely beautiful. You will not be disappointed. My only problem is I want to eat it because it smells so yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many lip balms. I found this one about a year ago. It's the very best. Stays put, moisturizers and treats lips like no other. Sehpora is one of very few places you can find it. Please don't discontinue this amazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Years ago, I got a sample of the original, along with honey and another color and I loved it. So I ordered this one thinking it would be better but I was disappointed, especially for the price. I can't live without some type of lip gloss or lip moisturizing stick because my lips are perpetually dry. I actually found that the OTC lypsyl does a better job at keeping my lips moist for much longer and is significantly cheaper. I wished I could love this product but I won't be getting this one again.
My favorite! Extremely moisturizing and perfect for surviving the cold winter in NYC.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just my favorite. Hydrates well, smells great and smooth my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only lip treatment that helps with my extremely dry lips during the cold winter in NYC. I have tried many many different brands and finally found this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best chapstick I've ever used... hands down
I've tried this several times and my lips are left incredibly dry. It takes a few days for me to heal my lips after wearing this. I love the smell, packaging and durability, but will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am willing to shell out a rather nutty amount for this little stick! (When I had my Beauty Insider 15% discount last month I got two, to reach the 50 dollars, and get the deal. . . . So worth it.) Love this stuff! On lips, I mostly use the Fresh lip treatment and color balms. Terrific products.

I bought this thinking it would be excellent, especially with the steep price! But I was very disappointed. It made my lips feel greasy which I though would be good. But it just wore off after a few minutes and left my lips almost dryer then before! I recommend bite agave lip mask if you want a miracle lip fixer!

reviews.review_title: Did not moisturize for me at all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I did not care for how this product went on too dry to heal my lips. I threw it into a drawer after trying for a few days and revisited it recently and it was even worse for my chapped winter lips. I have had better luck with generic chapstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: We have brutal weather in Chicago and I use this every night before I go to bed. love it and lips feel soft and product is still on in the morning. Has a lemon/citrus scent and taste. I am not really a fan of that.. if they made this in honey or vanilla I would be the happiest gal ever. Now just want to find a good scrub and lip mask to complete my regime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I was looking for a hydrating treatment for overnight. This product exacerbated the dryness I had been hoping to treat. My lips were so dry,bumpy and flaking after 2 days of use that I had to return it.
Needed a treatment that would hydrate my lips at nighttime since I have chapped lips. Goes on feeling extremely buttery but that's about it. Not worth the money!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Got this as a holiday gift for my sister - I think it will be my go to stocking stuffer for her from now on!  Love this product, love all the Lip treatments by Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this with the soy face wash and received it in a travel tube! It is my go-to lip balm for the winter, especially to prevent overchapping and cold sores!
This product is amazing! Although a little pricey, it's worth every penny. My daughter was constantly borrowing my tube at night, so I surprised her with her own for Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased it with excitement after tried it on my lips at the store. My first impression for this lip balm was comfortable. It's smooth on my lips with such a wonderful smell. However, when I had a longer chance to put it on for a day, I was quickly disappointed. I felt like applying a layer of tacky wax on my lips. This lip balm softens my rough lips just a bit, but It would be a mess if I tried to put any lip gloss or lipstick on after. So, I returned it and came back to my favorite lip treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Living in a very dry environment, it is almost impossible to keep our lips from cracking. This product definitely does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only lip balm, gloss, treatment, or color that doesn't cause painful breakouts for me. Pricey, but it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I keep this on my bedside table to apply just before bed. It is also really great for days at the beach in Oregon where it is often cold and windy. A note: Do not store in a pocket against your body or in any place excessively warm as the formulation is extremely soft and melts easily.

I've tried sooo many balms! My lips are super sensitive and get dry really fast. Usually, I can't even wear a lipstick because of the dryness. This product made a miracle to me! And it's the only one that keeps lips hydrated all day long. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ok, this stuff is pretty good, but VERY pricey.  I think this is the perfect balm for an occasional (think 2x daily) lip balm user who is looking for some extra protection, for whatever reason. It has no color and smells great.  However, if you are thinking that this is going to be the end-all-be-all of lip balms, you'd be wrong. Smith's Rosebud Balm is actually cheaper, and better, if you're the type who NEEDS lip balm.
Best Chapstick ever but way too pricey for me. I just use soft lips, cheaper and works the same as this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Winter in South Dakota is cold and DRY and I always have trouble with chapped lips. I apply this right before I go to bed and my lips are so soft in the morning. It has significantly helped my lips look better. I don't apply it during the day a lot because it doesn't stay on your lips very well if you do a lot of talking or eating or drinking. I will be buying this again! It is pretty soft stuff to so it doesn't last long but its totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this a couple of weeks ago and have been using it ever since, and I must say, my lips feel great! I read on a lot of reviews that it made your lips even dryer, and that did happen to me, but I just exfoliated and kept using it and my lips felt great after that. I'm not sure why that happened, but I ended up getting great results, and believe me, it is HARD for me to get nice, silky, smooth lips, and I've tried tons of other products.  Having said all that, I'm still not sure if I will re-purchase because the product does run out very quickly, I've already gone through half the tube and it is really expensive, so $28 a month may be a bit too much to spend on lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had gotten sample sizes of the tinted spf versions of this balm, and thought I would try the strong lip treatment. The product has a nice texture when it goes on your lips, but I wasn't particularly impressed with the level of long term hydration. I noticed other reviewers posted that it just made their lips dryer, and I suspect the same is true for me, though I can't be sure. I would usually use this as a night treatment. Overall I think it's overpriced for what it is, and though I like the natural ingredient list I think I will be looking elsewhere for my next lip treatment.

I got this about 1.5 years ago in a sample size, it has lived in my memory as tasting delicious, melting easily and working fabulously. It tastes like sugar and honey but not it a too sweet way, my friends would love to steal it from me because it tasted so good. The only problem with this overall great product is that it melts really easily, I live in a relatively warm area and walking around town with it in my purse would lead to melting. This was in about 80-100 degree weather in which there is no humidity. I was covered inside of a beige purse, it wasn't like it was laying out in the sun. I have extremely flaky and dry lips. Besides practically medicated lip balms that I have to put on every 15 minutes this nothing had ever worked before this product. This product 100% changed that . It only needed to be applied every hour for me although I obviously wanted to apply it more because it tasted so good. After using my sample size for a month I had nearly perfect lips. A definite great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The winter here in LA has been super weird with its weather. HOT COLD DRY HUMID, and it just wreaks havoc on the lips that I unfortunately lick way too much. After trying different lip balms for four days of chappy terror, I finally give in and rush to buy sugar. I usually buy the regular, but my lips needed some extra TLC..ADVANCED therapy. Seriously, within the night my lips were already healing themselves. Of course the price is ridiculous, but when my lips need saving, I'll give whatever I can. brb, slathering advanced therapy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I purchased two lip balms from Sephora: Sugar and Clinique. Some of the reviews indicated Clinique was far superior to Sugar (for $2.00 more) so I tried both. Sugar wins my vote! I will buy a couple more for my purse and my nightstand. Brilliant!

I use this with my night routine. Love the way it applies to my lips, moisturizers it and the light scent. My lips are hydrated when I wake up in the morning and doesn't leave any flaky skin when I put lipstick on. My husband also loves it and uses it everyday. He used to use aquaphor and he'd rather use this than that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this! I really did but it didn't help. In fact, it made my lips more chapped. I had to keep applying the lip treatment. Though it felt like nice buttery goodness when you first put it on, a few minutes later my lips felt dry and desiccated. And I would reapply. This was a constant cycle. I ended up quitting and just applying the bigelow lip gloss i had laying around.
This is the perfect balm for chapped lips! Long lasting soothing product :)

This product was recommended by the staff. I love the scent, only thing is it runs out quickly. It can also be on the expensive side. I've tried similar lip repair product from Clinique, it works bit better than this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I tried this out because I wanted something both clear and moisturizing. I also wanted to see what the craze was about the fresh line so I purchased this. I liked it at first, it was very soft and creamy. BUT it's one of those products that you have to keep applying over and over again. It dries out your lips and does nothing for them. Over priced with nothing to show for it. I'm never buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have constantly battled with dry lips. Every fall, my lips turn into a dry, cracked, peeling mess. Not getting any relief from regular chapsticks, I decided to go to my local Sephora store to see if there were any other options. My salesperson brought me the Sugar Advanced Lip Therapy and the Sugar Lip Polish. My lips were incredibly dry and cracked at the time, so it wasn't an instant miracle when I tried it, but it did provide more relief that I had gotten from chapstick, so I purchased both items.  Can I just tell you that I am amazed by these products! I've used the Sugar Lip Polish 3 times in the past 3 weeks, and I use the Sugar Advanced Therapy lip balm daily. My lips are AMAZING! Not a single crack, no peeling, just beautifully moisturized lips. I'll be a customer of this product for life!
If you need a basic lip gloss for hydration only, this is the one to go with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but it just doesn't live up the hype if you are looking for a repair lip treatment. Performance for me was on par with other products I was using to try and treat my recent and frustrating chapped lips. Plus - The product does apply smoothly and has some moisturizing properties, scent is not overpowering. Cons - Somewhat softer than others so if you twist up too much it will squish. Not a tosser but not a fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment for dry lips ever. Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It has the signature smell that SUGAR lipbalms have. I don't know if it lasts longer but definitely a life-saver in these cold and dry heater months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: very moisture. loveeeeeee it so much!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think this is a very good lip balm but I don't find it any different than the original one. It has a very similar scent and feels the same on the lips to me. I do find these to be hydrating. I was expecting this one to be more hydrating than the others but it is just on par with them. Like the other flavors, it does has a slick feel and it lasts an hour or two at the most. I would repurchase another one of these lip balms but maybe not this one specifically since it is the same as the others but more expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It smells good and it's really hydrating. However, I don't think it has the treatment effect, it's simply a good lip balm. I use a lip balm quite a couple times a day and this $25 lip balm won't last too long. I will probably spend less money on other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my lips were incredibly dry this winter. This feels great when you put it on. Your lips stay soft and they feel nourished. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: A lot of people are not loving this product for chapped lips. That is a fair assessment, but it isn't what this product is really for. If you are looking for an anti-aging product that will keep your lips supple and smooth over the long haul, this is for you. If you are looking for a fav lip balm, I recommend Fresh's usual Sugar lip balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lips tend toward dryness year round, but in wintertime it's particularly bad. I've used dozens of products over the years, with varying levels of efficacy, but never really settled on a product for sustained use, until now. I started using Sugar Advanced at night about a year ago and have had it in constant supply since. I apply it liberally every night before bed, when my lips are very dry from the day's activities. It works overnight, and I awake to moist, restored lips. It's the most effective product I've used and makes my lips look naturally plump and hydrated
i use this every night before bed. It has helped keep my lips moist and smooth, even in the dead of winter. I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ok so I understand this product is a little bit of money but it has become the only lip balm that I wear...and I have tried everything. My lips are super sensitive and a lot of the brands out there leave them either dry or burning in pain but not sugar lip treatment. It is the ONLY lip balm I recommend to people if they are searching for one. It's worth the money for me:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a lip balm junky. I go crazy if I dont have something to put on my lips. With this said, I've tried pretty much everything out there. I love the scent and feel of this product. It goes on like silk and feels amazing on your lips. My issue is that there are a lot of other products out there that feel and smell great, hence the reason why I dont think it's worth the $25. Also, it doesnt repair mildly chapped lips which I found disappointing... I really like this product, but I wouldnt buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical to spend this much on a lip balm... Being a guy I don't require anything too fancy, but when your lips are chapped and sore, you'll shell out what you need to get the problem fixed.  For about a week prior to purchasing this lip balm, I was using the big brand you can find at the grocery store check out stands, and while it temporarily eased the boring pain or chapped lips, it didn't help with provide the deep hydrating my lips needed.  After being recommended this product in store, I purchased it knowing that Sephora provides it's customers an industry leading return policy.  I immediately noted the extreme softness of the product, it applied with a silky smooth feeling, wasn't too tacky or greasy. It tasted good, and stayed on even after licking my lips and eating/drinking.  Being that I am Canadian, one of the most notable features of this product was that it stayed soft in VERY cold temperatures, which is usually a problem with most lip balms.  I would certainly buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've always loved Fresh's Sugar Lip Balms and this one is no exception. I like its citrus smell. The texture is fine, not sticky at all. It's good to hydrate your lips on a daily basis but I would not recommend it to someone with chapped lips; it will not repair your lips. Also, I didn't notice any difference in the results with this lip treatment and Fresh's Sugar Regular Balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the way my lips feel after applying this product! The lip treatment does seem to last for about an hour..ish. I do wish the effect of this treatment did last longer than just when it is applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great little lip product. I don't notice any plumping, but it's terrific at nourishing and smoothing lips. The less expensive lip products seem to wind up drying my lips but this one continuously hydrates. (wish it did plump though)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this primarily before I go to bed, for nighttime moisturizing. But you can use it any time of day. Great smell and good texture - not waxy at all.  used this for over a year - can't live without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Put this on before I go to bed and my lips are soft still by morning. 4 stars due to the cost

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lipbalm out of the Fresh lipbalm collection and I've tried them all! It is tasteless and extra moisturizing. I use this during the night since it doesn't have spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm a guy and I love this product. It is a bit glossy but it is so hydrating and I do notice that it plumps and smooths wrinkles around the lip area. It is super repairing and with constant weather changes here in Vancouver I find that this nourishes my lips back to health. I often only wear this at night and use another product during the day. I am on my 5th stick now and I can't live without this. In the winter I do use this all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This stuff is completely worth the price. This is all I use now. I believe I am on tube #5. Its wonder and light as everyday wear but also very healing. If you happen to get cracked and bleeding lips, this stuff will heal it over night. I highly recommend it.
I absolutely love the product. It isn't sticky and I feel an instant improvement after applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm going to be honest, and please keep in mind that this is just MY experience with this product. I would appreciate it if others would not mark this review as not helpful simply because I'm not raving about it and giving it a shining 5 star review..  On to the review.. Let me start off by saying that I think this is a good product, but it is certainly not my holy grail lip balm.  Pros: - The tube is well constructed, solid, and feels very sturdy. - It moisturises my lips. - Doesn't feel greasy or sticky. - It has a pleasant smell and taste (a very light lemon scent and taste).  Cons: - I have to keep reapplying it (even after not eating, drinking, or licking my lips). My lips are not dry or chapped at all to begin with, so I'm not sure why I seem to have this issue. It does moisturise my lips in the little time that it lasts, but no better than some much cheaper lip balms that I've tried. - The price. At $28 CAD, its really pricey. Given how many times I have to reapply it, I will go through this product fairly quickly.  Overall, I think its just your average lip balm. I will not be repurchasing this. I'm not blown away by its performance. Having tried many others, my favourites are still the lip balms by Burt's Bees and Jack Black. In my opinion, they perform much better and are not nearly as expensive.  I hope your experience with this product is better than mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Soothes dry lips and lasts for hours.

reviews.review_title: This Stuff Gets Me Through Chicago Winters
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I kid you not -- my lips are constantly dry during Chicago winters. This is the best lip treatment I've found. I put it on before leaving every time I head outside. It's fantastic. You can also wear your lipstick on top to create a tinted gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was always curious to try one of the fresh sugar lip balms to see if they were worth the price. I am surprised at how much I like this product. It is not sticky and very smooth. It tastes almost like a light key lime pie or lemon bar and is not overpowering. I do feel this product is overpriced but I will be buying it again. Give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not worth the cash and not as moisturizing as the original. I had to constantly reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a big coffee drinker and although I do drink water to balance my caffeine addiction, sometime a girl needs a little extra help when it come to hydrating lips. I live in Chicago so wind + cold air = dry lips. I use sugar in the morning and before bed and it does wonders... no flaky lips ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product made my lips feel soft & hydrated. I'm still somewhat skeptical about the claim that it can smooth the lines around my mouth. Maybe I need to apply it more often?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend this balm. I have always struggled with chapped dry lips daily, throughout the day. Once I started wearing this at night, my lip problems disappeared. I don't even feel the need to reapply during the day because it has restored my moisture balance so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth, very soft, but doesn't last super long and doesn't have a noticeable effect on my lips. Can do better for less $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just purchased my second tube of this! I love this sugar advanced therapy lip treatment because I have extremely dry and peeling lips and its hard to find a product that really penetrates the dry layers of my lips. I typically put it on as the first step when I am doing my makeup so that it can soak into my lips by the time I do my lips as my very last step. My only gripe about this product is how quickly it runs out. I have tried to reduce the amount of times I swipe back and forth but the texture is so soft that it wears down very quickly. For the price , I just wish it would last a little longer my Dior lip glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i am a firm believer and avid user of the rest of the fresh sugar lip line, but the rest of the line doesnt even compare to this. my lips get super super dry, especially since we are heading into the colder months, and this stuff is a must have for dry and cold weather. it is like a miracle potion, especially when used with the fresh sugar lip scrub. it is the best thing my lips have ever felt
Love the packaging and all the color. No more drying lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the second time I have tried this product. The first time was when I got this for my birthday gift a few years ago, and I really didn't see the big deal. However, this summer I burned the living daylights out of my lips (I packed the wrong lip product, thought it had SPF in it). I tried EVERYTHING, and after a month, my lips were still peeling and dry, and the irritation had spread to my skin at the corner of my lips. I put an intensive healing cream on my lips, which began to heal them. However, I was using a lip balm with lanolin in it, and it was not allowing my lips to heal properly. I got this in the Fresh Skin Savers kit during the 20% off sale at Sephora, and it is AMAZING. Love it. It is very luxurious feeling. The reason for only 4 stars is the price. Very high. It looks like Fresh puts this in with lots of kits and gift sets though, so I'll likely grab one of those up and get it again!

Well, this Fresh lip treatment from is just amazing! I'm never running out of stock of it, it is one of my favorite Beauty secret. You should definitely get it, your lips will get a lot of compliments!  It hydrates your lips amazingly, definitely improve the definition of the lip and enhances the volume. Promise, it is not a lie.  Enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I can't live without this amazing lip balm! I have very dry skin, hair lips. Use this product several times per day. Non waxy & moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was only looking for a product that would help with my chronic chapped lips... but was shocked when I noticed how much fuller and plump they now look!  The chapped symptoms disappear immediately after the first few applications, and my lips are fuller after about 10 days of use, 3-4 times a day. I apply a thick layer in the morning after I have eaten breakfast & brushed my teeth, a quick swipe once or twice mid-day, and a final generous coat just before going to sleep (again, after brushing my teeth).  I live in San Diego, which can get very, very dry during fall and winter. I am so glad I found this product just in time for all this dry weather... and the holiday photos, haha. I'm 24 and usually do not wear any lip gloss or lipstick, but having my lips finally healed has given me the confidence to finally start looking into trying some out :)  Buying this is hands down the best thing I have ever done for my lips. Yes, it is expensive, but so is blowing through 21984129 tubes of Burt's Bees or other generics. I am noticing I actually use the Sugar treatment *less* after awhile because my lips are healing (not getting addicted to the product). I am looking forward to keeping this as part of my regular beauty regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Look - I'm a guy how was using lip balm every 5 mins! This stuff is amazing! Only have to apply a few times a day! People think I'm crazy for spending this kind of money on it but it's totally worth it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one thing I hope I will never be without. It's long lasting and delivers. Love, love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product, used to use blistex but this is so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm so in love with this stuff. It is expensive ($25), but not unreasonable if you compare to clinique's lip therapy product ($27). It goes on so smoothly, and makes lips feel amazing. It has a pretty glossy finish that looks great alone or on top of lip color. I put it on before bed and first thing in the morning. Habit forming!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was searching for more than a year for a good lip treatment I have a wrinkly dry lips & after 2 weeks of using it I noticed an over all improvment in my lips.

25 is a little excessive for something I tend to use so often, I couldn't even finish the balm off because it melted and fell to the ground! It smelled really good, but it wasn't the moisturizing balm I needed for the winter months! Felt like I reapplied more often than usual...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been having a lot of problems with super dry, flaky lips lately and this has totally taken care of it! When combined with the Fresh Sugar Scrub, my lips are smoother and softer than ever!

reviews.review_title: Does not hold it's shape in the tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It does moisturize well, however it seems to melt at a pretty low temperature- about 75-80F which is the temperature range inside my home (no air conditioning). Because it does not have SPF I only keep/wear it at home and as soon as I brought it into the house it started to get very soft and melty. It was still usable for a few more days, but eventually it broke in half and melted all the way down into the bottom of the tube. I can't imagine it would hold up well if left in a car during the day or was carried in a purse outside on a warm day. This product might be better In a lip pot instead of a stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: All of the Fresh lip treatments taste great and are super moisturizing. It makes these lips feel wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have literally tried everything when it comes to lip balms and treatments for my constantly chapped lips and this is the real deal. I finally feel like my lips are nourished, smooth, and hydrated. I bought a set of Fresh products and a small tube of this happened to be in the set...and it was a game changer! Love this stuff, I just bought a full sized tube acouple days ago. I know everyone is different but this worked for me when I didn't think anything would so I definitely recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of the good reviews and I have to agree with all as this is really nice and noticeable difference in one night, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I put this bad boy on every night right before I sleep. I wake up with hydrated soft lips every time!

reviews.review_title: Works perfectly, just a little funny taste
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a month now and I use it morning then night. It keeps my lips hydrated, especially in the colder seasons where I definitely need a chap stick. The only this is the taste, but I got over that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this. It makes my lips feel so smooth!
On my third tube of this lip balm and it the best. I have super dry lips and after using this, they are smooth and hydrated always. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to trying this after reading so many positive reviews. Unfortunately, having tried it, I'm a bit underwhelmed. Don't get me wrong, I think it's a good lip balm. It's pretty basic though, and in my opinion, overpriced.  Pros: It feels nice on the lips, not too greasy and has a slight lemony scent and taste. It does slightly moisturise my lips.  Cons: I find that it wears off easily (even after not eating, drinking, or licking my lips). I have to keep reapplying it, and my lips are not very dry or chapped. The price is another con, and another major reason why I will not be repurchasing this product.  Having tried many others, my favourites are still the lip balms by Burt's Bees and Jack Black, and they are no where near as expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I keep it on my bedside table and put it on my lips every night and wake up with a nourished mouth

reviews.review_title: dont leave it in hot wheather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am so sad mine melted a little bit after I left it in my car when I traveled to Zion NP in July...T T It can not stands straight now. I have to push it back to the middle after each use - -||| But it is a good lip treatment with good smell, it smells sweet. Moreover, the package of this lip treatment seems high end. My friends wondered at how a lip treatment can be so good looking. The packages of Fresh brand are usually high-end and heavy~~~~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My Thoughts: - pricey (but worth it, i started with a mini one from a holiday kit) - heavy and large (relatively compared to other lip balms) but the container feels of high quality - product is super soft (i only turn up to use the product a VERY little bit) - AWESOME smoothness - Very moisturizing and feels really nice - I live in a dry humidity climate, so its always in my purse.

reviews.review_title: best lip treatment ever but too pricey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i love this product. it can be use as lip balm as well as lip mask overnight. but it is too pricey for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money made my lips drier! would not recommend,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this product! Only thing is that for chapstick, this is a tad pricy. Great quality though and I DO recommend it!

I had both the lip treatment and the regular spf 15, they seem to work just the same. Which they both work really great my lips are not as bad as they use to be. The only other thing is that the stick breaks easily inside the tube after putting it on:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I keep this on my bedside table to use at night after my regular beauty routine. I have noticed my upper mouth wrinkles have lessened. I recommend this product not only for the hydration but for a beauty product.

I have super dry lips I felt it did nothing for them I need to use something with the menthol effect. It did work wonders for my daughter her mouth gets super red in the winter it was almost immediate and took all the upper lip redness( from licking) away.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating, great for lips at night!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this multiple times and absolutely love this product. It is expensive but effective for use at night keeping my lips hydrated.

I have had chapped lips my whole life. Nothing I did could ever get them to be hydrated and normal- no DIY treatment, no over the counter lip balms.....that was until an employee and Sephora introduced to me to this GEM! What first hooked me was the scent. Smells amazing, but the fact that it actually works is what made me realize that I'm willing to pay the price for this balm! How anyone could or would want to leave this in their car to melt (which is unsanitary anyways) is beyond me. I do notice that it is plumping as well. It's minor, as it doesn't have peppermint oil to irritate your lips. (Thank Goodness!)

reviews.review_title: I can't live without this stuff!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I USED to get horribly chapped lips. Not since I started using this almost two years ago. Nothing I've ever tried comes even close to this. My lips don't become reliant on it. I use it alone, or over a stain. It is very pricey for this type of product, however in my opinion - worth every penny. During the winter months I also use the Sugar Lip Polish. (Another great product) I lived with dry, even cracking lips for many years. I am happy to report I now have soft, smooth lips all year long! (I know, I should drink more water...)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not sure about the anti-aging properties but this stuff is nice. I put it on before bed and it's the first product that I have used to still be around and moisturizing when I wake up. Most products dissipate before morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is great. I like to use it on my lips at night and it keeps them soft and moist. It does not have SPF, so I use other lip products during the daytime and goes on colorless. Nice light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm i've ever tried. Better than any bert's bees or other lip balms. During the fall and winter my lips start to peel and then I get into the habit of peeling them myself. This stuff helps to prevent the peeling, although I have to make sure to put it on 3 times a day. Never thought I could find something so soothing and it smells good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only thing I use on my lips. I love it. Works great in the Winter too!
Absolutely love this product! I apply at bedtime every night . It makes your lips feel so smooth. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST lip balm! I constantly HAD dry lips, using this lip balm changed that! i also love the regular and tinted varieties! Plus it smells like citrusy vanilla to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this shortly after it first came out, and I had cracked and chapped lips. What I had used for YEARS was no longer working for me. This is now my holy-grail lip balm. I have one in my purse, one in my room, one at work...I am SO IN LOVE!! My lips are never, ever chapped anymore, and I only have to use it now twice a day. I sleep with a thick application, and once during the day (the office I work at is very dry), I usually put a thin layer on. It also has a slight scent, but not over powering, and actually very pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great lip treatment for night time. But I do use this during the day as well. Keeps my lip moisturized for a long time without feeling sticky or looking oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the impact you instantly get with applying the lip treatment. It does what it says to heal and protect, I can see the difference.my lips feel healthy and kissable :)

reviews.review_title: Melts and not secured in tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I got this as a mini and left it in the car for an hour in my bag in the shade and it completely melted. I had another mini and every time I applied it I felt like the stick was going to break right off and when I only had 1/4 of it left, it did. This stuff is moisturizing, but to me it's not worth the mess and caution I have to take when applying it. Maybe the full size tubes are a little better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this because i had super chapped lips and it smelt good. But after using it until it was COMPLETELY GONE, I can truely say this is the best chapstick ever, and the best item i have ever bought at sephora!

reviews.review_title: The only lip product I swear by
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: The absolute best. This is the only Chapstick that actually heals my lips. It's makes them soft and healthy. And I do believe it fills them out. Not huge injection status but they look full and moisturized. It's so expensive, especially since I run through these like crazy. But-I absolutely love this. For me, it's worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using Fresh Sugar products for about 2 years now. Was introduced to Fresh when I received my birthday gift from Sephora. I particularly like this advanced therapy lip treatment. It glides on so smoothly and it is made without chemicals. Use this every night before bed and love the soft results I get!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: At first, I was hesitant to purchase this product due to the cost. But, it was worth every penny! It actually improved the condition of my lips rather than merely providing a quick fix like other lip treatments/balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have problem chapped lips that peel, and have tried every remedy possible for years. This seems to be the best one out there, even better than one I paid over $40 for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes my 3rd purchase if this product. Amazing! Worth the money especially now that winter is coming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've probably written one other review in my life, but I wanted to make sure I said something about this lip treatment. It is amazing. Just perfect. Stays and stays and stays. Very moisturizing and does not need to be re-applied over and over. It makes my lipstick work better too. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip treatment I have ever used. I use it every morning and every night and I love the way it makes my lips feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a lip balm that actually healed my lips -- and this one is proving to be a winner! After a day in the sun with no lip balm :( or a hike in the cold without chapstick, this treatment helps my lips get back to normal by morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips have always been chapped. No matter how much water I drink, what I do. Always chapped and when I try putting on lip balm and lipsticks after exfoliating I still get that line of gunk that is gross. I was pointed in the direction of the Fresh lip products and I'm in love with this. Where this has been my whole life, I couldn't tell you but it is simply wonderful. My lips are smooth, they are no longer chapped and they look like a million dollars. I noticed that this product gives me the plump that one of those peppermint glosses do without it being irritating at all. I absolutely love the smell as well. It's expensive, however I feel that this is worth the price especially with the way my lips are. I'm now addicted to putting this on and will never stop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice and smooth to apply and make lips feel really silky. Wish it had an SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much that I hoard it. A little pricey but a nice treat!

reviews.review_title: Lip balm that will change your life
reviews.review_text: Yes, it is pricey. But it is also AMAZING. My lips have never felt better. This stuff does everything it says it will. Use it morning and night and I guarantee you will see a major, positive difference!

This stuff is AMAZING! It makes my lips so smooth and plump without being sticky or waxy! I use Fresh's Sugar Lip Polish as well; they're the perfect pair! If I could only use one beauty product, this would be it!
It was good but that good for the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I continue to come back for more when I'm out of this!!! I absolutely love it! Keeps my lips soft, it has a great feel, and I don't have driness anymore. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Sugar and have several other Sugar products. This one, while having many of the attributes I like, like soft on your lips, not waxy or sticky, lasts a long time...it has a bit of a chemical taste to it...a little bitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is lightweight and super soft. Not sticky, or too greasy, or u00fcber shiney. It's just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm frequently dehydrated and my lips are very dry. I use this wonderful balm several times per day and it keeps my lips moist and feeling good. I keep several around the house and one in my purse. Can't live without it!

reviews.review_title: Throw out all your lipbalms, this is the one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've never came across anything more moisturizing in my life! the smell is very pleasant too, a little goes a long way I find. I've tried some of the other colors, they leave a nice tint . If you want it bold, apply more. Definitely worth the buy, even if it's a little pricy !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since my stint with Accutane, my lips have been relentlessly chapped. This product is the only one I've found that keeps my lips hydrated and smooth for long periods of time. I can even skip a day without getting too dried out. I used to use Aquaphor, but it's thick and sticky. This, however, glides on easy and all I feel is moisturized relief. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I asked someone who worked in the store to recommend something for my lips to replace my cheap chapstick that wasn't doing anything beneficial for my dry/aging lips. THIS IS IT! Worth every cent, smooth, moisturizing, comes in colors, not sticky, doesn't taste bad. It's such a treat to put this on and I feel like it's actually helping my lips rather than just coat them in wax.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips looked SO SO bad. UNTIL I got this. I cannot tell you how beautiful my lips look now. No other lip treatment compares. It goes on smooth and unlike other lip treatments it doesn't feel waxy... My lips soaked this right up. I wore it overnight and when I was lounging around the house.
