SOO worth the $$ and I will buy it as long as they make it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try this product line last year when it was the birthday insider gift. I LOVE IT! I always have dry lips and this product seems to last all day
This product is good, however; for the amount of money I preferred the shapstick in the drug store.
Love the feel of this lip balm but the only disadvantage is that it causes my lips to become dark. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ...but maybe I'm rationalizing the price. I do like it, use 2-3x/day. I've tried a lot of lip balms, range of prices, and the only one that worked was Burt's Bees original. This one is much nicer, and seems to last if you take care of it--don't need much.
I have been using this lip treatment for about six months, and it has really made a difference in the softness of my lips. I am very pleased with the product and will continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: and stays on lips for a while. convenient to put on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm! It keeps my lips moisturized and soft. I know it's a little pricey for a lip balm but to me it's worth it!

While I appreciate the good stuff in this balm and it feels soft and creamy, I am unimpressed with this advanced therapy version. It's not different enough from the original to warrant the price change. I got this because my lips haven't taken the summer heat well and I needed more than just lip balm. But I find myself reapplying as often as I do with $2 Chapstick. I'm going to be returning this for the Lip Shine which actually rehydrates for a much long period.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite product! im on my 3rd tube now, which has never happened with any other brand before haha a light coat gives long lasting, non waxy coverage or can be use as a base for colored balms etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this only at night before bed but I like it. It's nourishing for the lips. I have not paid attention to see if the antiaging claims are true but its definitely hydrating, not sticky, and it has a nice light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started Accutane, which dries out your skin like crazy. Dry lips are the most annoying side effect of the medication and nothing seemed to help it...UNTIL THIS. The amazing Sephora employee at my local store turned me on to this. I am now using one tube a month on my horribly dry lips. It is expensive, but you get what you pay for. This provides a crazy amount of hydration and smells amazing. I love everything about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pricy but I am addicted to this lip treatment. I never let it run out and always stock them up. It just works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I keep returning to this lip treatment because it does repair, nourish, makes lips soft and smooth the wrinkles around the lips. It is a bit pricey and that is why I try other products. But this lip treatment is the best. My lips never cracked during the winter and were not dry during this summer. And best of all it does NOT have any bad chemicals in it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a bad habit of biting my lips and as a result, my lips get really rough, dry spots that make it impossible to wear lipgloss/lipstick. I've tried every lip treatment I can get my hands on, but nothing has worked. This stuff immediately made my lips feel less of a wreck and within a week of using several times a day, had cleared them up completely. I'll never use another lip balm again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: for approx. the last 10 months I have been using this treatment on my lips and surrounding lip area. I use at least a tube every 30 to 60 days. I use it whenever I think of it and I apply it to lips, above the lips to help correct the fine lines. I even apply it to the puppet lines and under my bottom lip. I am 62 yrs. old and it helps my drying ageing lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to buy the original Sugar Treatment in a brown tube, so I decided to give this one a chance. I was a little disappointed with it since it didn't do much difference. Yes, it did moisturize my lips, but not for long. I feel like after a while, my lips started to dry out and chip. I wasn't crazy about the smell either, the original Sugar treatment has a much nicer smell. It does have a nice creamy texture though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing you notice when you open the tube is the wonderful scent. But that's not why you should use this product. The balm (for lack of a better word) is not at all greasy, yet it is substantial enough to make your lips feel really soft. I can't wait for winter to get here to see it do it's real magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a birthday gift for my sister. She loved this, and is now addicted to the whole Fresh Line. It works wonderfully and se couldn't be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though this lip balm is pricey, it's well worth the price for its super moisturing effects on my lips :).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and dry lips. They love Sugar advanced therapy lip treatment. I'm not sure how much better this is than regular lip moisturizers I buy elsewhere, but the ingredients are mainly natural, and it does feel great and I feel that I am giving my poor dry lips a treat every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment! It hydrates my lips all day with just one application! I haven't had cracked lips since I started using this product. I use it every day on top of color. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended to me by a sephora consultant. I am absolutely in love! I work at a pool in the sun 7 hours a day, four days a week. My lips were sunburnt and dry before I picked up this product. Since I started using this I have had nice soft lips that no longer peel or crack. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a little pricey for what this product does just glides on surface do not feel any moisture penetrating into lower layers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product saved my lips on two occasions: The first from a severe windburn after sailing and the second from an allergic reaction to something I ate, which caused months of uncontrolled chapped lips. I tried every lip balm and remedy on the market. This was the only one that worked - and now you won't find me without it!

reviews.review_title: Best lip treatment I've ever tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never go back to regular lip balms. I didn't know lips could be this soft and truly moisturized!

reviews.review_title: Best lip treatment, totally beat Kiehl's 1
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've finished THREE of this lip treatment. It's a MUST HAVE! It does moisturize & protect my lips. I also use it as a primer for lip colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The title says it all. As a long time lip balm addict (you know what I'm talking about), this one is absolutely perfect. It goes on smoothly, never feels waxy, has a lovely smell and does NOT (like many other balms) make your lips feel drier later on therefore making you actually need to use it more and more often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip balm ever! It costs a little more but is worth it. My lips are never dry now and so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this at night right before I go to bed and wake up with smooth lips. Love the Fresh lip balms and treatments but don't leave them near heat as they will make them soft enough they break & you have to smosh them back together or put them in the fridge to harden back up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the consistency of the lipstick feels very good on and last a long time! I want another one...residing in Florida my lips are constantly dry but not any longer with this product.

I had very high hopes for this product, seeing all the rave reviews it has. However, I was EXTREMELY disappointed. And that might even be an understatement.  Sure, it felt nice upon application, and made my lips soft for the moment. However, it did nothing in regards to long term results.  Definitely will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff, makes my lips so soft and smooth, smells great and doesn't feel too heavy. Smells amazing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip hydrator ever! Use it every night, lips have never been smoother! Well worth the price!

reviews.review_title: Best lip treatment I've ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product is amazing left my lips nourished and soft!! Pricey but TOTALLY worth it.. Another plus no GMOs

I always wanted to try this but wasn't sure about getting it on-line. Our store just opened and I am SO happy I have this!! My lips feel amazing!! I have my friends try it (guys & girls) and they are loving it too!! I love it and can't wait to get it in colors!! Feels great!! Oh and smell nice too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best chapstick. i wear it at night and i wake up and its seriously still there. i have never used such a long lasting treatment. love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my friend who is now in love with the product and swears it is amazing. He loves the luxe feel of it whereas I love the packaging but feel it's overpriced for a lip balm, which is essentially all it is! The scent is very faint but pleasant--overall it's an affordable little splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment! . It feels so great and tastes good too. Use it night and day, but use the ones with spf when going outside. Love all products of this brand. Best lip treatment I've ever used.
Love this product.. So far the best lip treatment ever! Its a must have, my lips are as soft as a baby's.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product absorbs well into my lips and keeps them moisturized and soft. I haven't noticed any diminishing of lines or lip plumping, but honestly, I didn't buy this product because of those claims. I've only been using this balm for 5 days and my lips haven't been chapped like they chronically are. The only downside is the price, but if you're looking for an excellent lip moisturizer look no further.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to replace blistex. I love it. Smells so good. The downfalls to this product however: very little for the price you pay, super creamy but too creamy that it melts fast. I recommend storing the product in the fridge, keeps the chapstick cold, hard, & I find makes it work better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah this is expensive for a lip balm but it is AMAZING. My lips get dry and cracked and peely, but not at all since I've been using this. It really conditions your lips; it doesn't just sit like a waxy film on top of them, which is what everything else feels like compared to this. I barely have to reapply it, it really lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very disappointed, and dissatisfied with this product. I returned it a few days after initially purchasing it. I did not benefit from use of the product, and even experienced minor skin irritation after applying it repeatedly. I normally do not have noticeable sensitivity to lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought three of these. One for my purse, one for the car, one for my schoolbag. Can't get enough. It smells so good I could eat it! So moisturizing.

Well i recently purchased this about 2 weeks ago. It leaves my lips dry and flaky after about an hour. It doesnt plump my lips. It actualy makes them apear smaller. And i see my lip lines are still there. The box said it takes a month to see results but i dont think i could keep putting this product on my lips for another 2 weeks. Maybe later i'll see improvement. But i honestly dont see my self buying this again. Sooo NOT worth $25.00 i wouldn't even pay $5.00. Sorry fresh sugar just my honest opinion.

I absolutely love this and use it year-round. It goes on smoothly and is perfect when I don't necessarily want any color on my lips. The best part is it has SPF and really protects my lips from sun and wind.

I was given a sample version of two of the normal kind awhile back (one was Rose, and I think the other was plain). I fell in love with them! The scent is great and I could tell after just one use my lips were smoother . I like using this more than Chapstick now. The main downside is the cost. I wish they sold all these in the smaller sample sizes. They're more compact,and would be cheaper. I decided to get the medicated version for the larger one .. I want to make sure I get a good one if I spend $20 + on a chapstick
Keeps my lips moist all day long and doesn't leave anything behind because it absorbs into your lips perfectly
This is such a soft, great moisturizer. Love the cute packaging and tube too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm by Fresh. i have extremely dry lips during the winter to the point of cracking. And this is the only product that heals and prevents that from happening. I always keep one in my bag.
$25 for 1 tube. it works; but this small tube doesn't last you very long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product! I have some kind of sugar lip balm always near me. It taste like bitter lemons and real sugar all mushed up...its so yummy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip treatment! Use it at night & during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to have chronically dry, cracked lips. Now when I put this on my lips before I go to bed, I wake up with perfectly smooth, plump lips. Its seriously like magic or like lip injections overnight. I would have never believed that a product could transform my lips like this does. I have already repurchased. I never want to be without it!

reviews.review_title: The advanced formula is the best!
reviews.review_text: I don't love spending $25 on this, however it is the ONLY product I have found that works this well. I've continued to purchase it multiple times & will continue to purchase it. I love to use it in the winter before going to bed & when I awaken in the morning I can still feel it on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only product that helps my dry lips. I never want to be without this.
It's just lip balm, and not a particularly moisturizing one at that. It didn't really do anything for my chapped lips, so I returned it. It was simply too expensive to not be spectacular.
Best lip balm ever!! Long lasting and hydrating! Must have!
I use this before bed as a night time lip moisturizer and it leaves my lips smooth and hydrated. way better than drug store brands!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite! The price point is higher than I would normally pay but I love this stuff... I now carry it everywhere! Highly recommend!
Great lip treatment! Feels really good and the scent is WONDERFUL!!!! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Sugar products and this intensive lip therapy is the best. I have very dry lips due to a combination of medication and exercising (I am a mouth breather). I use this product before I go to bed and before I run. My dry, cracked bleeding lips are no more!!!
This lip balm just make my lip so soft and moist! Just can live without it!!! Must buy this and try it! You will not disappoint it!!

I don't have a sephora close to where I live but whenever I do see one and find nothing else in the store I always grab this item! A few months ago I developed numerous heat blisters on my lips, bumps that you couldn't see but I could def feel. It made my lips so dry and I tried everything I could find at grocery stores. This was the only thing that helped! Makes me lips moist and soft and makes them look plump. Def a regular buy for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What more can I say - the product is as advertised, so when I ran out, I had to have more. It goes on smoothly, and provides a very mositurizing base for lipstick in a shade, any shade. I think it makes the lipsticks look better as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this twice already. love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite lip treatment! this always makes my lips look amazing! If I run out of it and don't use it for a couple of weeks my lips get dry and cracked but once I get it again and use it for two day si will see great results!

This is the best lip treatment I have found. I normally suffer from chapped lips, all year long. As long as I use this day and night, I do not have chapped lips. If I go out in the sun, I use the one with SPF protection. I love all the Fresh balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm one of those people addicted to chapstick...but it never seems to really make a difference. This Sugar Lip Therapy really does! There is an immediate feeling of softness of course, but it also feels like it is healing my lips overall! I found a new addiction :)

I am obsessed with moisturizing lip treatments and this one is one of the best! I put it on at night and my lips are so soft in the morning. even if I apply in the morning - it doesn't wear off until mid day, with one application and drinking coffee etc...!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live in Southern Arizona where it is very dry, sometime our humidity is 3 to 5%,, so you can imagine what this does to your lips. This Lip Treatment is fabulous. At first I thought it was a little too expensive, but I have since bought about 5 tubes and given them to friends. I was always putting on lip moisturizers, sometimes 10 times or more a day. No more. Now it is in the morning, then mid afternoon if I need it and bedtime. Highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason I bought this over the other colored sugar lips is because this one does not have SPF. I'm allergic to their SPF ingredients (anything that ends in -benzone). But this one does a great job at hydrating and not making my lips peel all the time. Just wish the other sugar lips were SPF -free too or at least formulated with titanium or zinc oxide instead. Usually I lose my chapsticks but with this being 25.00, I make sure I don't lose it I'm almost done with the stick and plan to reorder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment. It is the most hydrating lip treatment out there. LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received first as a gift and I'm hooked. If you have dry lips, this is the answer to them!! I live in ND and it's very dry here in the winter time. Been using this and no longer have dry lips!! Works great in the summer months too!! Being out in the sun, using this keeps my lips hydrated!!! A must have

reviews.review_title: Hands down the most amazing lip balm ever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got the mini duo for my birthday 2 years ago and have been an avid fan ever since! It moisturizes really well, gives you a bit of a glossy look without being sticky like a lip gloss or waxy like a chapstick. Definitely worth the price :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on a whim with a gift certificate, and I love it!

reviews.review_title: Hands down, favorite lip care brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini Fresh lip care duo as a Sephora birthday treat last year, and it's a lip saver! I started using it during the winter months, so my lips were red, dry, and itchy. Regular chapstick wasn't cutting it. After a few nighttime applications, I was hooked. Lips soft and smooth! Since then I have purchased both the advanced lip therapy and the original. Both are amazing. My mom and aunt purchased both loved the tinted versions, since they give enough color while also being amazingly rich. Also, A+ for the packaging.
I got started with this from getting the birthday gift that Sephora gave away last year. Thanks Sephora!!!

I have always been a fan of the Fresh lip balms mostly because of the packaging but also the scent. This one is really lightly scented compared to others, and is also at a higher price point than the rest. I threw this in as part of a gift recently and my friend who's never tried it absolutely LOVES it and applies it constantly. If you're willing to shell out ~$25 for a lip balm, you'll definitely like this one for the 'luxury' factor. Otherwise there are decent options out there for 1/5 the price if not less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before I bought this product, my lips were cracked, bleeding, and peeling because of cold-dry weather. I have a very sensitive lip and Burt's Bees, Clinique, L'Occitane, etc didn't work out.  This is by far the best lip product I have ever tried in my entire life! its very soft and hydrates like you wouldn't believe. I love it and I always have 2 or 3 sticks as my inventory at my home and my purse, LOL

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have one in my purse, one on my desk and one on my nightstand. This is the best lip treatment I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great product. It's not waxy or goopy. Does a fantastic job keeping my lips soft and moisturized. I use it at night, before bed, and have great results the next morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't think it would for much more then any other balm BUT decided to take a chance. Cracks, bumps AND dryness disappeared in less than 2 weeks. Maintaining with 1-2 used a day. Highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great chapstick. Goes on clear. Great for the beach and cold weather. No more chapped lips!
Good flavor... but not quite fit for my lip... I mean feel like there is something float onto my lip..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light lemony scent. Solid. Leaves your lips naturally shiny and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good product; recieved as part of birthday insider free gift last year. loved how it made my lips feel and kept them mosturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My lip condition became better since I used it.I bought another 3 immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this several times for myself, and for gifts. Everyone I give it to just loves it, as well. I use it in AM & PM to keep my lips feeling & looking great. I love that is paraben (and many other chemicals) free. This Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment is definitely one of my desert island products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend this to anyone with flaky dry winter lips. It's a blessing and it smells nice, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got these as a free birthday gift and really like them. I got both the translucent and the Rose tinted treatments. I don't think that they really plump and smooth wrinkles, but I WILL say that my lips are finally not chapped. I've spent the past several months with semi-chapped lips and since I've been using these lip treatments, my lips are back to their old softness. Yea!
Love this stuff! Great moisturizing and love the sugar scent.

I LOVE sugar products! I use this lip moisturizer because my lips have always been extremely dry. I have tried other products like a little famous yellow/red one rhymes with barmex, anyways it didn't work, it only worked temporarily, I needed something LONG TERM! So I use this every night and every morning and it really does keep them moisturized thru-ought the day. I would give them 5 stars but it is pricey. BUY IT.
I feel like I got back my lips from my teenage years after using this stuff! I layer my own lip balm/lipstick over it, and it still works wonders.

I love this stuff. It's just really not even funny. I've always been a bit particular about my Chapstick/Lip balms and have never found one that I stuck with. But this I love. It's extremely hydrating and gives your lips a slight gloss. I do love the fact that it seems to last quite awhile as well. My only problem with it is the price (little high...) and in my last tube the product broke off with about a quarter left so that wasn't too fun. But this is my second repurchase and I can't see myself stopping anytime soon!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after I ran our of the birthday gift versions from this past year. I was extremely excited to try it and after just a few days I noticed a big difference. I then descided to pair it up with the Fresh Sugar Lip Polish and -wow- my lips are smooth, soft, and overall much improved :) I give this a 5 star!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: honestly, I suffer badly with chapped, dry lips. I buy tons of li balms they just moisturize for a little then I have to reapply almost every 10 min. today was my first time applying fresh sugar advanced therapy. HUGE DIFFERENCE!!! I literally applied only twice today and WOW my lips looks so luscious. I thought and in fact knew this would be just another regular lip balm but i had to try heard so many good reviews. Honestly, I am throwing away all my cheap and even not so cheap ones. this one is a WINNER!!!! MY LIPS LOOKED SO FULL too!!!! i did moistorize well good before i sleep but i did that all my life. THIS ONE REALLY IS EFFEctive!!! and stays and protects!!!! I LOVEEEEEE WILL CONTINUE BUYING FOREVER. I didn't experience any mushing or lip treatment breaking just apply lightly. don't press hard. it is delicate but so effective.!!!!! totally recommend and totally in love!!!!
Decent lip balm but not worth the money. Lasts a few hours, so soft a tube doesn't last long due to the need to reapply. Will not purchase again.
I really like this Lip Treatment. It is very pricey, but I love the way it makes my lips feel. I use it once a day in the morning to moisturize my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best lip balm I have used. It does an excellent job repairing and nourishing dry or chapped lips. I have also tried the Dior rose lip balm, which I love, but I find that with the Fresh one, I don't have to reapply as often. Also, I like that the the lemon scent isn't as strong as the other Fresh lip balms.
This is the most moisturizing lip balm I have ever owned. I had tried and liked the regular (brown tube) one and the tinted rose one, and this one is even better!
I've tried EVERY lip treatment to heal my dry chapped lips and this is the only product that has every worked on them. Great product!

This lip balm is very soft & light. You have to be careful to not press too hard on your lips or it can ruin half the stick. Normally that wouldn't be too big of a deal but this stuff is kind of pricey. However, this stuff really delivers gorgeous soft lips. I am totally hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only thing that could keep my lips smooth in the winter. I was hesitant to buy it at first, but it immediately made my lips sooo much better! this is a much have if you have really dry lips.
Definetly a must have! Carry one in my purse, one in my desk drawer and one on my night stand! Don't think I can live with out this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely worth the money! Sheer, great scent and smooths wrinkles :)
This is the best of the best. I live in AZ and always applying chap stick, etc, until I found this. I use it maybe 3 times a day max and it is just GREAT. Highly recommend it.
I was much happier with the original lip treatment in the brown tube. This doesnt seem to do anything extra special and in fact doesnt even seem to moisturize or plump/ smooth lips that well.

I can't speak to anti-aging effects, but I can say that this is definitely above average when it comes to keeping lips soft and smooth and doesn't wear away quickly. Doesn't feel like a waxy 'chapstick' product or petroleum jelly balm, lips feel very hydrated and I don't feel like I have to constantly reapply it. I like the locking tube cover so it can't open or advance with the cap on and ruin or waste the product. I am the type who has collected hundreds of lip balms in search of that perfect one, and this is as close as I have come over the years. Definitely recommend especially in dry climates.

I can't resist hype and I love my Fresh Sugar tinted balms, so it was a given I'd get this eventually. I love the smell and it smooths on nicely, but sadly I've found that it absorbs quickly and leaves my lips just as dry as before. I'm giving it two stars because it's a pleasant little product, but not worth the price. I'm still looking for a decent lip treatment!
Definately not what i expected!!!! An for the prize..not worth it!!
Totally worth it - actually absorbs into your lips, not just a film over them

I really like this. It makes my lips super soft, and it has a pleasant scent. You do have to be careful and not use too much pressure when you apply this.  I wish this stuff lasted longer though. If you use it everyday, it'll probably be gone in a month....and for 25 bucks that's not long enough.
I love it. I love the color ones as well. It feels a little pricey for a chapstick-type product but it is worth it. My winter lips look 10X better.

I've been using the Fresh Sugar lip treatments for several years, and have been using the advanced therapy treatment for about a year. My lips are very dry, chapped, and peeling. I use the advanced therapy treatment every night and morning, and can definitely see and feel the difference. My lips are softer and smoother. I love the way it feels on my lips, and it smells nice, too. I ran out once, and hated going to sleep without it. It's pricy, but lasts a long time and is worth it. Another balm just wasn't the same!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the Sugar lip products and own every single one of them - for some reason my skin and lips have been really dehydrated recently and this lip treatment has worked wonders. It'd definitely been my go to to keep my lips moist without my hair getting all stuck to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a fan of the Sugar lip treatments for years now and have tried most of their tinted balms and the original lemon scented balm. I was thrilled to see that they had an advanced therapy lip treatment. I have dry lips and my obsession with lipsticks doesn't help with that either. After just one use at night, I woke up with incredibly soft lips. And by putting on their Petal SPF balm throughout the day, my lips continue to stay moisturized. It's amazing! I wouldn't expect less from Fresh, this is such a great quality product. It's definitely pricey, but so worth it. Their balms usually last me awhile too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have chronically chapped lips and often have to use up to 4 layers of chapstick to last 3 hours. I came to Sephora and one of the ladies suggested this to me. I carry this around with me wherever I go! It keeps my lips moisturized longer than any other chapstick and it is super smooth. My only issue is that I wish there was a nicer flavor and fragrance, it tastes and smell kind of like vaseline.

Other chapsticks and ointments for lips are too goopy, and might require you to continuously reapply too often. This one is soft, has a great mild lemon fragrance, and wont irritate or tingle the harshest of chappiness. I Put it on every night before sleep and it definitely makes a difference.
I have really dry lips and find most sticks too waxy. This Lip Therapy is soft and healing. I use it several times per day. I wish the cost was a little lower but the investment is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this is expensive for a lip balm, however, very worth it. No other balm feels as good as this. Lasts a long time LOVE IT
I keep coming back to this product. It is the BEST for hydrating lips. Use it at night and wake up with lips that have repaired overnight. The most hydrating lip product there is.
Love this along with the sugar lip scrub.
I use this product before sleep, to keep lips soft and hopefully prevent wrinkle lines. As it's only been about a month, not sure about the wrinkle part but my lips have become soft and smooth!!
Awesome lip treatment smells nice very hydrating highly recommened

This is the first (and most expensive) lip balm to actually stop my lips from chapping/peeling/flaking. And I'm the sort of lip-balm addict that always has one in her pocket. My lips are even smooth enough for lipstick! I'm on my second one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Non-greasy and wonderful for very dry lips. I love that it has a very mild fragrance and no nasty flavor. Great product

I am in love with this 'treatment'. It's super smooth and hydrating. The flavor is pleasant. I can't wear lipstick over it though so plan on night use if you are a frequent color wearer. Also it's $25 for a stick which is very high for a chapstick not matter what you call it.
this lap care is pretty good. smooth and a little sweet.
I love this product!! I have noticed a great improvement on my lips since I bought it. I loved it so much that I threw out all of my other chap sticks!!!!!!!

I first tried the Fresh Sugar Lip Treatments when I received my Beauty Insider birthday gift, and was very impressed. I opted to get this Advanced Therapy product because I was looking for something without sunscreen to use at night, and I am so glad I did. Adding this with the Fresh Sugar Lip Polish has given me luscious lips.
I have a problem with dry lips. I use this product daily under my lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with chronically dry, chapped lips, and this is the best list balm that I have ever used. I've tried a ton of different products, and this one just hydrates the best. My only complaint is that it's quite pricey, and I apply it frequently, so I run out quickly.

It melts way too easily. My hubby likes this one in his pocket and melted the first day. It even works great on my four year olds lips. But again it's so soft he breaks it (and he's careful!). For the price point, there's got to be something better. Not worth it. Too expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Sugar lasts all day. Gave me great protection skiing on a windy sunny day. Works wonderfully as a base coat to any color of lip color. This has to be my favorite lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live for this product and have been a Sugar devotee for years. I keep plenty around so I never have to look hard I love this so much. It has helped me break my addiction to chapstick because I don't have to apply it constantly throughout the day, once or twice and I'm good to go. I can't say enough how worth the money this is.

I am a Chapstick guru. I've tried every Chapstick out there and although sugar can be pricey it is worth every penny. I put it on about 10 x a day. Now that I have tried sugar I cannot go back to any other brand. Highly recommend.

This left my lips silky smooth and nourished, but I can't really vouch for any wrinkle smoothing! I guess I missed that promise, so I was quite pleased with the super conditioning treatment for my lips. I put it on at night before bed, and wake with moist lips and no smears of goop on my pillowcase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was struggling with dry chapped lips this winter, and went into Sephora and the girls suggested trying this. I am so happy I did! I put it on at night and even after the first night I noticed the next morning that my lips were softer, moisturized, and even more plump! I have been using it for a month now and my lips have never been more beautiful and healthier. It is a bit pricey, but you do get a lot of product, so it should last a long while. :)
I've been using this for about 2 weeks now and my lips have never been softer. I just wish it had SPF. Then it would be perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the original lip treatments first but decided to try this one as a night treatment as it does not have any SPF in it. However, I find myself neglecting my regular lip treatments and using this one most of the time.  I like it better because I do feel like it benefits my lips more; they feel much softer and more nourished with this treatment. I also find it to be less oily than the others and more like a balm that absorbs well. The only downfall is the price, but I don't regret my purchase!
This is a very nice chap stick. The only reason I put 4 stars instead of 5 is the price. It's a bit expensive.
Instant moisture, but I had to continually apply this product for consistent moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment. It makes my lips hydrated and shiny, to the point where I don't need lip gloss or anything else. My favorite lip balm by far.
I can't say enough about this product! It's amazing!
My skin is VERY dry. It gives me physical discomfort if not moisturised. This lip treat is amasing. Every time I put it on I feel like my lips are quenched in moisture. A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment is the best that i have used. It regenerates your lips to perfection. I love the tints so cool.

reviews.review_title: Not any better than other Sugar Lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels the same and does the same as the 4 other ones I already have...would not purchase again. There is nothing 'advanced' about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips used to be chapped and dry when I put this lip treatment on for a day the next day my lips are repair of chapped lips I love it and I high recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it a lot, however it is not worth 25 dollars! Will get it again though because its my birthday this month and I get itas part of my birthday present from Sephora :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has saved my lips this winter! I wouldn't normally shell out this amount of money for my lips, but I was desperate. This is incredibly hydrating, smells great (light lemony scent), and contains ingredients that I recognize! I especially like putting it on before bed and waking up with soft, supple, hydrated lips. This is the best lip treatment out there and I will continue to repurchase.

Normally I think therapy lip balms are a bunch of BS- maybe I've just had bad experiences with them. I didn't think this would be any different, but I bought it because I liked the scent. Um, I am so impressed. This has actually helped the texture of my lips. Most chapsticks I apply multiple times a day- honestly I think they just dry me out more sometimes! This one, though, twice a day- max. My lips feel so hydrated and healthy. Seriously, no BS. I know it's a tad expensive, but considering how little you'll use- it's worth it. Splurge. You will not regret it.
very smooth- feels great and makes a nice base for lipstick.
My lips are always dry with this. It keeps them moist and prevents them from flaking. I like that there's no color so I can wear it under lipstick or gloss without clashing.
Best lip moisturizer that exists AND lasts!!

During the day my lips dry out. I always put on a lip treatment before I go to bed. This product is ok. Doubt, I'll spend this much again. I think I might go back to using Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm with SPF 25.

I purchased this at the beginning of January because I suffer from really chapped lips & I've tried all of the drugstore brands to no avail. Last year, I received the mini duo for my Beauty Insider birthday gift & was amazed at how nice my lips looked with the Sugar Rose, just a small flush of color. This Advanced Therapy is worth the price when you add up all of the chap sticks you buy at other places yet never finish the tube, these are the only lip balm/treatment product that I've EVER finished and repurchased! I usually use this one in the morning under lipstick and at night before bed. I have definitely noticed that my lips look fuller, the wrinkles that most people have on their lips have smoothed down nicely and recently I got a lip piercing that I couldn't use any lip product that wasn't natural (a vertical labret). This not only kept me from having terrible chapping during the healing process but actually aided in the speed of healing! I will continue to purchase the Fresh Sugar lip products, they are definitely second to none :) Highly recommended!!

Very disappointed with this one. It goes on smooth and feels nice for about half hour, but after that it's back to ashy lips. The only reason I purchased this is because I was pleased with the birthday sample I received this year. But this advanced formula is not working for me. Plus the product doesn't last long. I just purchased it and it's almost gone. I followed the directions of your Sales Representative to use it morning and night, but I guess that's too much.

I use the sugar daily I usually buy the regular but decided to try the new advanced. It is super smooth and has helped make my lips fuller. The taste is a little different, I like the originals taste better but u get used to this one quickly. This one does not contain a SPF so I use in morning and evening and the original during the day. I

I've had chapped lips and dry lip corners for seven years, and found myself reapplying Carmex and Vaseline every hour or so. One swipe of this stuff keeps me moisturized for half a day! The only downside is the price-- I'm not sure this stick would even last me a month.

After reading another reviewer talk about being pregnant with the worst case of chapped lips ever and this stuff working, I decided to try it b/c that was my situation, also. I didn't want to spend the $25, that seemed like a lot, but I had easily tried $25 worth of various other products that hadn't worked thus far so I decided it was worth it! And it surely was, it is the ONLY thing that has helped! Seriously, miraculous! As with the other Fresh lip balms (of which I have several), the texture can be a bit too soft and squishy for my liking but i just apply sparingly and it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm I've ever tried, love the smell, going to buy another one sooner
makes lips super soft

U can also re-apply product w/lipbrush if you want to by-pass damage & co-contamination of your lip products. Food residue & bacteria rest on/around the lips area. Blot lips w/a moisturizing mild lip toner on a lint-free towelette, blot gently & apply your lip product. Very refreshing. We all learn but we r NOT born knowing everything. Lipstick fall-out can happen with the very best of lip products. I will not say be smart, but learn as much as u can about applying the product. if u like/luv or value the product y not use a handy (yet inexpensive) retractable lip brush (should easily fit in your cosmetique case (organizer, etc.). Apply gently apply to lips rather THAN mashing it on 2 your lips and swirling it on like an antiperspirant the way men sometimes do. OMG! With lip treatment/tinte via the classic twist-stick form you have 2 b gentle. Otherwise, stick 2 plain old chapsticks. Fresh put a good deal of effort into the science & beauty of nourishing lips w/moisture. The ingredients are excellent.

Impulse purchase that I thought I would be returning, but fell in love instead. Great for cracked dry lips, smells and feels amazing, great alone or under lipstick/ gloss. I even use it on my 3 year old---great natural ingredients and so much better than anything I have used.

Everything you would want in a lip balm. With the standard lemon drop ish scent of the rest of the sugar line it is refreshing and sweet. Goes on smooth and stays on to moisturize much longer than traditional lip balms. Great product.
This is my third tube!!! I just love this product. It keeps my lips moisturized, soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love LOVE this lip treatment. I dont think Ill ever be able to use another lip balm again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of those people who is inclined the lick my lips excessively when concentrating or understress. This product is my holy grail for not doing that. It's super hydrating, moisturizing, and doesn't burn when I have licked my lips too much. I've stashed multiples of this product in my car, office, and on my vanity so I never am without it.

This product does work ok as a moisturizer though the moisture does not appear to last very long. I have not noticed a plumping, I used to use lip plumpers but wanted something more like a balm and this does not really have the same effect. Smells nice though and does not feel sticky or thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is, hands down, my favorite lip product ever. I put it on before bed and my lips are still soft and moisturized when I wake up. Use it before a heavy work-out and even with all the sweat, breathing hard, and gulps from the water bottle, the product stays put and keeps doing its job. I never want to be without this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment is the best I've used. It made my lips soft and luscious. I put it on before bed and wake up with fabulous lips!
I love the Sugar line and have several around the house for keeping my lips moist in our cold NW climate. This one is especially moisturizing, tasty and effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soo smooth and it completely hydrates your lips and makes them soo smooth. Its scented like parfume but you dont taste it. You only need to apply it once every couple hours and your lips be lucious. The only con is that if your obsessed with chapstick like me, it goes fast and it is expensive. I bought this once and it lasted me about 2 weeks but I also applied it vigorously. I have tried so many diiferent lip treatments and chapsticks from this to the average pharmasutical chapsticks. Baby lips is a cheaper verision that attempted to replicate the sugar treatment but they failed. There truly is nothing like this!!  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * OVERALL: MAGNIFICENT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is smooth and silky, but does not offer intense relief of severe dry lips. I like the smell and the feel. Like other reviewers have stated, you get the best benefit from applying at bedtime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the cheer kit and starting using it right away. I woke up with a few breakouts around my mouth. I stopped using the product and tried again a few weeks later and the same thing happened. I have very dry lips and I wish this worked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ran out of my regular Sugar Lip Treatment and my lips became extremely dry! This deeply moisturized my lips back to normal!

reviews.review_title: Can't believe it's even better than the original
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been addicted to the original Sugar lip balm for over a year, but decided to try the advanced therapy one the last time I placed an order. I was shocked to find that it is even better than the original! I have very sensitive lips that seem to peel and crack all the time, but the Fresh balms make them smooth and moisterized. The advanced therapy version seemed to last longer and go on a little smoother. Love!

Love all Fresh Sugar Lips products. By far this is my favorite. I keep it near my bedside and apply at night and always wake up with soft lips ( I chew on my lips during the day and usually have cracks by dinner time). The only downside is that I don't use it during the day because when I try to carry it in a pocket it melts into a super expensive mess. 5 stars because its worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many lip balms but this one is the BEST!!! I love that it hydrates and stays on for hours. I also love that it comes in different colors because I hate lipsticks and this is a great product to replace them. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love, love this!! Worth every penny. The scent is nice and subtle. And keeps my lips moisturized. Will buy again.

I consider myself an addict to lip product and have chapstick, balms, glosses, etc. around at all times. This product is now my favorite because it feels like it's nourishing my lips without gooping them up with product. There's no overwhelming scent that could compete with anything I'm already wearing. And unlike a lot of lip treatments out there, I don't feel like it's medicated and leaving behind any side-effects.
This stuff is a bit pricey but worth the splurge

I first got this as a Sephora Bday gift. I fell in love with it. It helped my lips in the summer and winter and especially if you apply it before lip gloss it makes the gloss stay on longer. It feels nice on your lips without feeling sticky. I also put it on before I go to bed to hydrate my lips through the night. A little expensive but worth it.

Love this product. Does what it says. Has a nice smell and glides on the lips. Isn't tacky waxy or slimy. Really nice consistency. However a bit too pricey for the small amount so won't be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: Ok but the brown tube is better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sugar is THE BEST. I am a lifer of this prodect. I thought the white tube would be better since it costs more but I like the brown tube a little better. Overall, this is good stuff though.

Love Love Love this product! I have chronically chapped lips--tried everything but they would not go away until I used this lip balm. No joke! The only product that I've used which compares costs almost twice the price, and this stuff feels amazing on my lips, so I give it a thumbs up!
Soothes the driest lips. Can't go a day without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are super high maintenance; they chap easily and are very particular about what gets applied to them. Before I found this I had tried almost every lip balm/moisturizer I laid eyes on and was never satisfied. This keeps my lips soft, smooth, and supple. It also works great as a base or top coat for other lip products. The flavor and smell is great too, light and mildly citrus-y.  Big thing to note: Maybe 1/5th of the product is in the base, so once you've used it to the point where you can't apply it as normal, use a makeup brush to scoop out the rest, or you'll waste a lot of product (and money). Once my tube gets to this point I leave it in my bathroom for morning application and replace it with a new one in my purse.

reviews.review_title: Does not work as well as original
reviews.review_text: Feels nice on your lips, but does not combat dryness as well as the original. I have not notice any plumping effect. Not worth the price at all in my opinion.

I have been using this Lip Balm for almost four years now and I haven't found anything better. It is nice and moisturizing for dry lips. Doesn't leave an aweful taste in your mouth and feels light and smooth when applied... A little tip to make it last longer.. when its no longer able to be applied directly from the stick I use a lip brush to get to the extra balm which is quite a bit !!!
great moisturization without the usual spf the Sugar Lips line has. I use this before I go to bed each night, and the lips don't dry out. Plus the scent is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this every night to bed and love it.

Just like the other Fresh lip balms, this is lovely. My lips have not been dry since I started using them 2 years ago. I don't think this one is any better than the original clear one, but it's just as good.
Thanks to the free sample i received during my birthday because i would have never known how awesome this product was. I bought one for a friend too and she loves it!

reviews.review_title: It's ok, but not worth the price tag!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really does make my dry lips feel better, but so do some of the drugstore chapsticks! It is nothing special and certainly not worth as much as it costs!!! (I got mine for free, so thank goodness I didn't waste my $$) The smell gets a little gross after awhile as well.
All the Sugar products are awesome!!!! Body and lips Hands down are my favorite! Instantly fixes my chapped lips! A miracle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm love it!This product is amazing!! My lips were feeling very dry and chapped over winter

This lip ball is the love of my LIFE! I take it everywhere an apply it constantly. Even after a day of use I noticed a difference. The only problem is, sure it's great to buy that one time you see it, but replacing is something else.. I found myself going through a stick in 2 months.. That's $125 a year on CHAPTICK!! Insanity, I think. So spare yourself the trouble of you don't have the budget to keep up with this product..

This is the best splurge I've ever done, and I'll definitely be repeating it. My lips will get chapped without daily chapstick, and this is the best feeling balm I've ever used. It'll heal the worst of my lips, and leaves my lips feeling super soft and moisturized for hours. I love love love it. And the smell is so light and great.

I was browsing through sephora and decided to pick up this treasure due to the fact the shelf was almost empty. From the moment I used it, I was hooked. It's a great balm for nighttime after a good skin routine and in the morning before applying lipstick. Even throughout the day for dry lips. The balm is nourishing and long lasting. This will be a staple for my daily beauty routine.
This lip balm is a winter MUST have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this Sugar Lip Treatment. This is the first lip product that doesn't leave my lips caky and still feeling dry. Since the first time i've used this product my lips haven't felt this smooth or hydrated in a long time. I put it on multiple times through out the day and it does not cake up. Also I put it on right before going to bed and I wake up with super soft lips and no cracks from the dry air. Love this Product!!
This did not work for me, my lips are far more hydrated with the original sugar lip treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!! My lips were feeling very dry and chapped over winter. After using this JUST ONCE they were back to being silky smooth and full. I have been using this many times a day and when it was finished used regular Chapstick. Man my lips were not the same! Went to sephora and bought this and my lips are back to being silky smooth!

reviews.review_title: I've had this for one week...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this last week because living in NYC during the winter reeks havoc on your skin and lips. My lips are constantly dry, chapped, and peeling. Ugh. I was not impressed by this product at all initially and was annoyed that I spent $26 on it. Last night I put it on before bedtime and this morning I woke up with soft, smooth lips. So maybe the trick is to use it at night? I'm not sold on this yet so I can't recommend running out and splurging on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My only wish is that this lip treatment wasn't $25 otherwise this is perfection in a tube. Fantastic smell, doesn't leave you with that plastic taste some lip products do tend to have (including some of the other lip treatments within this brand) and is soooo sooo soo moisturizing. Definitely always use this before bed, but also it lasts a very long time as well. I think this lip treatment has really contributed in a much softer texture to my lips that I did not have before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First product that ever worked on my constantly chapped lips! I love it!
With the winter snap bringing temps near 0, this has been a life saver for me this winter! Not only does it protect, it also repairs dried out lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this product would be better than the FRESH Sugar Lip Treatment. I was wrong. Itu2019s awful. It makes my lips dry and flaky, like they are chapped. Unfortunately, I moved and there is no Sephora in my immediate vicinity. I would return it ASAP! Back to the original for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this does the job of making your lips very soft but after continued use, it started to make my lips peel. My lips were literally shedding skin. For that reason, I don't like it. You also have to keep reapplying continuously because it hydrates very well at first but dries quickly. I don't find this problem for the Fresh Sugar Lip, I have that one in Rose and love it. Instead of the Sugar Advanced Therapy, I would recommend the Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment in the brown package if you want a lip treatment. Those didn't make my lips peel.
I have been using this every night with no real discernable difference, but it does feel nice on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Living in the desert, my lips are always dry. This lip treatment is a necessity for sure. The texture is wonderful and you feel it working right away. I was introduced to the line by the Beauty Insider birthday gift last year which was 2 sample sized lip treatments from this brand. It pays off to the an Insider! Love love love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as my Birthday gift from Sephora and have fallen in love with it. It moisturizes and keeps my lips hydrated.I wanted to by the regular size one but its a bit pricey but I think If I ever do purchase it, it will be money well spent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have to have lip balm of some kind at all times....even when running a marathon. This treatment is wonderful, a little goes a long way, no color and the lightest scent. My boyfriend swears it smells like key lime pie. He uses it as well....he usually complains about my lip balm, but not this one.

I was using the original lip treatment and I liked it (even though it is prone to melting) & I liked the subtle lemony sugar smell/taste. Well, this one smelled the same so I just had to try it. There is the worst taste to it though! It still smells good, but the bitter medicine taste afterward is just awful. I had to take it back.

reviews.review_title: best lip treatment in the market
reviews.review_text: I used to be a big fan of Fresh lip products. For years I carried a sugar lip balm in my bag which I would use daily. Then this advanced therapy lip treatment came along and blew everything away. This product keeps my lips permanently moisturized and sometimes when I have excessive dryness or cracking, this is the only lip treatment that heals that within a couple of days. I use it every night before I go to sleep and during the day on most days. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have ALL of them. This one is most therapeutic, but all of them are awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lip balm basically because everyone was raving about SUGAR. & also because I only wear clear lip balms. I find that I have to continuously keep re-applying this balm for my lips to stay soft and moisturized. That reminds me of what a cheapy lip balm does. It purposely dries out your lips so that you have to use more and more. I will use it until it runs out, but from now one, I'll stick to Blistix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had chapped lips..even tried vaseline nightly...noticed a big difference when the sales lady @ the store recommended that I try this..it's AMAZING! And my lips feel so soft and hydrated..I even got the passion lip tint to go along with this...
It's absolutely the best lip balm for me!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sugar lip treatments, but this is amazing! So moist and healing. I have tried everything for dry lips. This is the best ever. It even lasts all night long in Wisconsin winters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product to help with dry lips. It works but I need to keep re-applying. I didn't feel any plumping effect. The scent is quite soft but sweet.

reviews.review_title: The princess of the balm world
reviews.review_text: I say princess because for me the Dior lip glow is the queen. Love this balm! The balm bomb it makes your lips super soft I use it at night when I wake up my lips is smooth and soft amazing. When I have dry lips l use this and after a while its smooth again. A must have not heavy like other balms.
I have very dry lips and would normally be applying chap stick all day. This stuff has made my lips so soft--I love it! I use it nightly before bed and usually apply in the morning under my lipstick.

I love this stuff. lips feel silky and refreshed. I put it on in place of lipstick most days. I do think it is a bit pricey but it lasts a LONG time and my husband will actually kiss me if I am wearing it. Don't leave home without it!

reviews.review_title: Like much more than the regular lip treatment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Fresh Sugar Lip Treatments, in fact I immediately go pick up a new tube when a new color comes out. For years I turned to the regular clear lip treatment as a basic chapstick, it worked great (actually hydrated my lips unlike drug store kinds, including Burts Bees), but this is even better! I will be buying this from now on over the regular clear. I use this just about every day and it keeps my lips perfectly hydrated and smooth. Great product, even at the high cost.

reviews.review_title: Seriously the only thing that works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I live 5000+ feet above sea level and the air is extremely dry. Nothing was helping my cracked, peeling lips. It got so bad at one point that I couldn't even wear lipstick or lip gloss because my skin was just cracked the color didn't go on evenly. Within one use my lips were soothed and smoother, and with use over a few days my lips are back to normal. It feels really soft on and works well under lipsticks and glosses. It also does not have a bad taste, and the smell is the traditional Fresh sugar smell which is a lemon/sugar scent. So glad I found this!

reviews.review_title: The only thing that keeps my lips hydrated!
reviews.review_text: Love that they made a formula with I SPF! The SPF usually ended up drying out my lips, but this product is the ONLY one to make my lips feel and look baby soft! Will purchase again and again and again! Must buy if you have never found something to treat your lips!
This is the first and only chapstick/balm/treatment that I have used up entirely without losing it or tossing it to replace it with something better!

I first got the sample size of the regular for my Birthday in stores. After that I was hooked and thought I would try the advanced therapy due to the winter weather. I have been using it for a couple weeks and I really like how hydrating it is. However, I can't tell a difference between the advanced therapy and regular formula. My advice would be to just buy the regular one and save a couple dollars.

Love Sugar's Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment. It goes on really soft and not pasty like some other lip balms. Absorbs nicely and doesn't overshine lips like regular petroleum jelly does. The only downside is that it can begin to melt and get a bit too soft (like butter).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my lips look fuller and more luxurious. My lips also get realllly chapped in the winter, so I rub them a bit with my toothbrush and slap on some of this and presto! No more chapped lips. A lot of drugstore chapsticks don't help the chappiness, but this does the trick!  The scent is also really nice and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I, like a lot of people, really expected a lot from this product because of the good reviews and the price, but honestly I have not noticed one difference since using it. I don't notice that my lips are drier or peeling because of it, but if you're going to pay for expensive lip tretment, then it should do something .. anything .. and it just didn't. I'm disappointed.
excellent product, a little on the pricey side, but totally worth it. constantly deal with dry, chapped lips during the winter. using this makes my lips so much softer
For anyone wondering...IT IS WORTH IT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! It helps my lips soo much and it looks better than ever!!! :-D

reviews.review_title: Great product, not so great price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm. It feels great, it smells great, and I even love the container it comes in. My only concern is I'm not sure if it is worth the $25. I say, if you have the extra $25, definitely get it. If you're feeling low on cash, there are other great lip treatments that you can get at common department stores for a lower price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only lip treatment that has ever worked for my chronically dry,chapped lips. I used it at bedtime the first day I got it, and the results the next morning were incredible. My lips are so soft! Now I use the advanced therapy every night and the colored ones during the day, and my lips look and feel great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am TOTALLY addicted to this lip treatment! It is so moisturizing and has saved my lips in our long, cold winters. I have to keep and extra one on hand because my husband tried it once and stole the entire tube. It's a winner for the whole family.
after having chapped lips , rough lips and cracked lips I have found a great treatment. I use this am and pm and in a few days my lips were soft and smooth. Definitely worth the $$$$.

I typically use the dark brown tube of Sugar thought for the winter I would try this for the dry weather not really impressed I would not spend the extra $3 for this. I would just stick with original formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful lip balm. My lips are prone to excessive dryness. This hydrates my lips at their driest. The scent reminds me of lemon tarts.

I had growing concerns of fine lines around my mouth. I began using this lip balm every night before bed. I apply it liberally to my lips, paying special attention to the edges. It has definitely added the extra moisture my lips need and my fine lines have improved. I save the advanced therapy for night only so it lasts a little longer and wear the colored treatments during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment truly hydrates and heals dry lips. Doubles as an attractive, subtle lip gloss.

I have INSANELY dry lips so when I went into Sephora the other day and asked for the best lip treatment available, they pointed me to this. I have to say the fragrance isn't my favorite by any means, and if you happen to tast it, it's not good either but it does do a mean job repairing my winterized lips! Also, I have to say I love the metal white container and I feel like it hasn't gotten as gross or beat up from being in my purse like normal chap stick tubes do.

reviews.review_title: Ain't no body got time for chapped lips!
reviews.review_text: Throw away all of your other lip products and keep/buy this one! THIS STUFF WORKS you won't regret buying it!

I love this lip treatment, I use it every day in the morning and again in the evening. My lips are looking fuller and healthier every day, my lips also feel softer and less chapped. The flavor is great and very tasty, it does not have a lipsticky smell or taste. I think this is the best tasting and feeling moisturizing treatment and I have always been a non-lipstick wearing kinda person so for me to put it on everyday and then I find myself recommending it to friends; its gotta be awesome!
Love, love, love this stuff! It is the best lip balm out there

This stuff is great when applied right before bed. Otherwise it just wears off too quickly because it is thin. No gross taste or smell which is nice. My husband does not enjoy kissing me for the first few minutes after I put it on however. But so far it has been great for winter - my lips are usually dry and cracked all winter starting in November but here we are in January and my lips are nice and soft.

reviews.review_title: Before You Pass on a $25 Lip Balm, Read This
reviews.review_text: I know what you're thinking - $25.00 for lip balm?! This is what I thought when I bought my first Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment, but after going through that first tube I'm hooked, and now so is my boyfriend.  This is no ordinary lip balm - and by ordinary, I don't just mean the price. The scent is heavenly, the balm is truly moisturizing and it is hydrating. The entire stick is rather soft, and in the humidity and heat of subtropical Asia, the thing basically broke in half. I use the lip treatment religiously every day, sometimes just to inhale the lovely scent. And I now think my boyfriend is surreptitiously stealing mine out of my purse to use when I'm sleeping. If you have the money and the lips, this is a good choice.
Good product, but I expected it to be more nourishing, more u201cadvancedu201d if you wish.
This product i just as good as the normal Lip Treatment.
Love love love love love love love this lip treatment, softens lips better than any lip balms in the stores. I use to have very chapped,dry lips, but since I have been using this I have no problems!

I'd been looking for a good lip balm. I received a Sugar Lip Treatment duo a my Birthday gift in 2012.I was hooked after the first sweep across my lips. My lips instantly were softer and I didn't have to keep applying the balm. The balm wasn't caky, thick and my lips didn't feel like there was a build-up. I decided to try the Advance Therapy for the Winter months. It has not disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The very best product for lips that I've ever tried!!
I use this product on my lips right before I fall asleep & it is wonderful for repairing dry, chapped lips. It feels smooth & creamy, & has a hint of a lemony taste to it. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently my lips have been dry,peeling and bleeding. I went into the Sephora store and mentioned the problems i was experiencing and was recommended this product. WOW. My lips are a lot better and are well on the way to recovery. When i first saw the price tag i was a little taken back to say the least considering the most expensive lip balm i had ever bought was $12. Well worth the price.
Living in Alaska is hard on the lips and this product is the best one I have found to combat the cold and dryness all winter long!

I have very sensitive lips (I even have trouble with most sensitive formulas). I also have chronically dry, irritated lips. This balm is wonderful! After a few days of use, my lips were healed and supple.

This is yet another great lip product from Fresh. I have all their sugar lip colors and decided to try this one as well. It is great at moisturizing my lips and leaving them soft and silky smooth. I usually only have to reapply every 2-3 hours and find my lips are staying moisturized for longer without reapplication. Great product.
If you are a lip balm freak, you must try this one! It is now at the top of my list, so therefore I must have 4-5 tubes all over.
Keeps lips smooth and soft. Lasts a long time. Most importantly, prevents my lipstick from moving into the creases above the lip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this product from the fabulous beauty insider birthday gift (thank you Sephora!) and immediately fell in love with this brand. The Sugar advanced therapy lip treatment is even better which I didn't this was even possible. It is very expensive but totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didnt think this was better than original sugar lip treatment in the copper tube. It is just OK
Yes, it does what it says, smoothes and hydrates. Feels wonderful
I thought the regular Fresh lip balm was wonderful, but this product is the best ever. I don't think I could go one day without this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is expensive for lip balm, but after seeing all the good reviews I assumed it must be really good stuff and was excited to try it. In no way is this stuff worth the price for me... It's not bad, but it's nothing special. I've used lip balms just as good and better for a third of the price.

reviews.review_title: Look no further - SUGAR is all you need...
reviews.review_text: I chew, bite and gnaw on my lips leaving them in a constant dry. chapped and cracked state. I have tried many products and kept putting this one off because of the price - DON'T!!! Stop wasting all of your money on all of the other products and just buy the SUGAR Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment if you want to see immediate relief! After the second application I can already feel a significant difference! I put my fourth application on before bed last night and already this morning my lips are not cracked or ragged or peeling - they feel smooth and hydrated already! I am a SUGAR believer!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was having terrible problems with cracked lips and dryness. A few nights of using this cleared it right up. I'm a convert.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had terrible windburn that led to the longest run of chapped lips. I couldn't resolve it, no matter what I tried. I stopped in at Sephora and they suggested this wonderful balm. It cured my lips and saved me the expense of visiting my dermatologist (my next step). Now I will never use anything else. Thank you Sugar!
Never had such soft lips. I love this product and wish I'd found it years ago!
This lip treatment is super hydrating and leaves your lips feeling soft and wonderful. If you have dry lips this is what you should be using to repair and moisturize them. Amazing product!

reviews.review_title: The best chapstick I have ever used.
reviews.review_text: This is the only chapstick I have used that has actually worked and prevented me from getting chapped lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am guilty of a very bad habit - chewing, biting, gnawing on my lips. They are always dry & chapped, especially in the winter. I decided to try this lip treatment after reading about it on another website. I purchased this in store at Sephora just last night. Immediately after leaving the store, I applied this treatment. I'm not a fan of the flavor/taste/scent, so much, but I can get over that. Not that it's gross or anything, just not my favorite. I have applied it three times now, and already after the second application it was working! This morning my lips are not cracked or ragged or peeling. They feel hydrated and supple! I am impressed! I am feeling encouraged and with the help of Sugar, will hopefully kick my bad lip-biting habit! :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
