reviews.review_text: I got a sample of a duo of Fresh lip balms and was hooked. I was surprised at the price when I went to purchase it, but it's worth it to me. My lips get very dry in the winter and this stuff not only feels great, but works.
I love this stuff my old lips drink up the moisture
I love this lip balm....I wear it under long-wearing lipstick and it keeps my lips soft and smooth. I really like all the Sugar lip balms....they are all super!

This is the best (and priciest) lip balm I have ever tried. And I have tried dozens but OMG this is my favorite! It's not sticky or too waxy, it really heals your lips overnight. I had to create account just because I felt compelled to review this lip balm. Best of luck in your search!

I have used the original sugar one for the last few years with great results. This is even better! I live in cold Wisconsin winters. This keeps my lips moist all night long. Quite a feat since I am a mouth breather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I - like other reviewers - was completely skeptical about purchasing a lip balm that was over twenty dollars. But I just HAD to see what everyone was raving about.  And now I'm one of those aforementioned Fresh devotees.  It's a truly amazing product - I can FEEL it moisturizing and protecting my lips as soon as I apply it. It lasts for quite some time, has a nice shine that's none too obtrusive, and my boy doesn't mind me kissing him when I wear it: that's a BONUS.  I am not lying when I say I wear this all. day. long. I even apply it before bed - under vaseline - so my lips are moisturized all night long. Looooove Fresh, this is just another amazing product from a wonderful brand!

to preface my review, i have extremely sensitive skin that reacts HORRIBLY to harsh winter conditions. my lips were almost constantly chapped (if not split), which really limits my ability to use the lip stains and sticks that i love. i've used the other Fresh Sugar lip products, but i've found that this one is the best for my terribly dry lips. i use it on a regular basis, along with the Fresh Sugar lip scrub, and my lips are a million times better than before. i can actually USE my stains and lipsticks now, and i'm no longer in constant pain from split lips. i know the product seems like it may be a bit expensive for a lip balm, but if you have wintertime skin problems like i do, you will be so glad you sprung for it!

It's worth every penny! I'm a lip balm monger and I'm always looking for a good lip balm. I like the flavor and texture, it's smooth, stays on a long time, doesn't feel greasy or slide all over. My lips haven't felt as chapped as they normally do, either, which is such a BONUS and hard to find with other balms. AAA+++

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is likely the best lip balm I have ever used - and I feel like I have used them all. Conditions completely and stays on the lips for a LONG time after application. When I apply at night before bed, I can still feel it on my lips in the morning. Pricey, yes but worth every penny.

I have allergic reactions to a lot of lip balms, but not this one. It lasts longer on my lips than other ones, and feels like it is moisturizing. I was addicted to Kiehl's baby lip balm but they discontinued it, and now this one (without SPF) is all I use.

I purchased based on the raving reviews and because I can only use lip products without SPF. I feel like I have to CONSTANTLY apply this product and it makes my lips drier. Maybe this is just me, but I think the product is just OKAY- not worth the $25, since I can't find the box, ill just have to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It helps to keep your lips from getting dried and cracked, also it keeps your lips feeling moist.
This is the best lip balm out there for dry lips. It is expensive but worth it.
The best lip treatment I have ever used

reviews.review_title: The end all be all of lip treatments!
reviews.review_text: Amazing! My lips stay moisturized all through the night.

reviews.review_title: Best lip product I have ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been plagued for a lifetime with dry, dermatitis-prone lips. I got this product as a free gift and am blown away by its effectiveness. I put it on before bedtime and my lips are smooth, hydrated, rash-free and younger looking. The benefit lasts all day. Thank you, Fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hubby and I LOVE this product! It feels so soft on my lips and my lips never look chapped anymore after using this. I use it during the day and also before bed and my lips feel totally different now. It's a bit pricey, however it's worth every penny! I also highly recommend the Clear - clear in brown case also also the Rose - sheer berry rose in pink case. These products are AMAZING!!!

I bought this lip balm because my lips were super chapped and the Keihls lip balm is too goopy. This while not goopy does the job but not as intensive as the label would lead you to think. I still love this product, but for daily use.
Love this! A bit pricey though.

I LOVE this lip product! It is so conditioning, stays on my lips through the night, and even plumps them a bit due to the anti-aging benefits. It also works great under lip color, as a primer to hydrate the lips and prevent feathering.

The girls at Sephora talked me into trying this Advanced Therapy versus the regular treatment with SPF 15. They told me it was anti-aging. I have to agree that it nice, creamy and moisturizes, although I do not know if it does a better job that my Aquaphor. It smells nice but again not as nice as the treatment with SPF 15. Next time I will probably stick with the regular lip treatment in the brown tube. It smells better and I like the SPF 15.
This is by far the best lip balm for me! and it has a nice sweet scent to it. and it's not too sticky like other balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my daughter, whose lips have been chapped for months. She got a sample from somewhere and we have discovered this is the only thing that really heals the problems without making the underlying condition even worse. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on every night and since using it, have never had dry lips. Love this product!
Love this stuff. Moisturizes without feeling heavy or tacky. Keeps my lips looking great even through the harsh winter months! Well worth the cost.

reviews.review_title: Good Hydration, but Doesn't Last Long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best product I've used in terms of hydration and having smooth lips, but you have to reapply A LOT. I try to use it right in the morning and will supplement with other products throughout the day but it's a hefty price tag to replace this product often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My lips get very chapped in the cold weather and the sales person recommended this one and said it would help with the lines in my lips as well. It feels good when you put it on but I didnt' stay on long and it didn't really help my chapped lips at all. I personally wouldn't buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I could NEVER use any other lip balm after having this. It is SO hydrating and works SO well. It also leaves a lip-gloss type of shine to your lips without the sticky feeling most lip glosses leaves. TOTALLY recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first tube of the advanced that I am using. I love it just as much as the clear spf 15 one in the brown tube. I use the brown tube in the day and this advanced one at night. I have 6 six tubes of the brown one going now- one in the car, one in the bathroom, one in my purse, one at work, you get the idea- that's how much I love it! It's if you had to take 5 things on an island kind of thing. I have tried the rose, honey, and some other tinted ones and have returned them all. The brown tube and the white tube are superior!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used many lip products, even lip scrubs due to the fact I smoke and my lips have became dull and have dark spots. Used this 3 weeks now big improvement, that us actually noticeable. Smooth, softer, dimmed the spots. My lips are truly being treated. Use every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip balm-and I have tried them all! It's the perfect mix... Not too sticky, not too waxy... Scent is there, but subtle, not overpowering. It stays on for a long time, and has made my lips super soft. I keep one in my purse, one at my desk, one at my bedside table, one in my makeup drawer! It is a little pricey, but it's worth the four-tube a month expenditure... the boys sure like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like others, I've tried everything for years and I just keep moving from one chapstick/lip treatment to the next. Many of those, come to find out, have ingredients that ultimately DRY OUT your lips. Anything with petroleum will do this. This stuff, on the other hand, seems to actually help lips heal and keep hydrated. I'm on week 3 now and I use it everyday. I don't own the original Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment, but I've been told this is more of a treatment. It's very effective. It's expensive too, but my lips are looking better than they have in years. They're moisturized and looking healthy. I don't see any difference in plumpness and there's no tingle like the medicated bad chapsticks have.
I keep it by my bedside. I use at night and under my lipstick for smooth application.
pretty amazing pick! have always wanted to try the fresh products and I'm happy with my choice. Instant nourishment...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: very effective, especially for winter. a little bit pricy
I love this stuff, creamy, smells great, tastes good I only wish it stuck to my lips better. I use it before bedtime.

I'm a huge fan of Fresh products, especially the lip treatments. This particular one was not impressive, however. It reminded me of a $2 chapstick from the grocery store. (Which is fine if that's what you are looking for) The signature Fresh scent was not evident at all in this product, and left a waxy flavor in my mouth. Enh. I much prefer the original, clear lip treatment to this one, especially for the price you pay for it.
I had dry patches on my lips and anything I tried just made my lips sting and itch. This did not irritate my skin at all and they dry patches are gone. Well worth the $.
I Love the Fresh lip products! They are all wonderful. Keep my lips so soft!
I always use a ipbalm at night - this is moisturizing and not waxy

Amazing! I loved theorignal lip balm, but this is great. I live in a dry northern climate that gets cold in the winter and causes my lips to peel and dry out. I apply in the morning and at night before bed and it keeps my lips in top shape.

I tried this repair balm after receiving my birthday gift of the 2 mini fresh sugar balms. I can't say enough about it! My lips feel soft and much more hydrated when I wake up. There is a very faint taste of lemon. I highly reccomend it!
Love this product. I have used all of the sugar lip products and this is the most moisturizing. Feels great!
It worked wonders on my lips which went from being a;; chappy and ugly to smooth and healthy. I absolutely love this product for my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much! I always had chapped lips and I tend to pick them, but this has made my lips really soft! It also makes it easy to put on lipsticks after!
This lip treatment is hydrating and goes on soft and creamy (not waxy). I use it several times per day. It really helps soothe and heal my dry lips. LOVE it!

I wanted a lip product that was hydrating and due to the amazing reviews this is what i bought. Its super oily and i feel like I'm putting a pot of oil and grease on my lips whenever using this. Just use the regular lip sugar fresh treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a friendly sale lady on the counter suggested me. the moisture last long time, it wouldn't leave dry wax on my lip., but sephora in the JCP don't carry it. i have to drive at least thirty miles to buy it.so sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had growing concerns of fine lines around my mouth. I began using this lip balm every night before bed. I apply it liberally to my lips, paying special attention to the edges. It has definitely added the extra moisture my lips need and my fine lines have improved. I save the advanced therapy for night only so it lasts a little longer and wear the colored treatments during the day.

reviews.review_title: Regular Fresh Lip Treatment Just as Good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don't get me wrong - I LOVE Fresh Lip Treatment and pretty much everything from the brand. BUT I do have to say that even though this is a great product, the advanced therapy is not worth the extra few bucks over the normal lip balm. To me, it is exactly the same amount of hydration. I wouldn't pay the extra few bucks again, but I will continue to buy the regular one.
Received it as a birthday bonus. Now I use it everyday.

No more cheap lip products for me! I have used the regular Sugar in different shades for about a year now and grabbed this when it first came out. Since I purchased it, my lips have never been softer! It also heals dry, cracked, chapped lips. Very soothing & has a lemony taste to it. I love the metal tube & it does last for quite a while. It is $25, but if I added up all of the cheaper lip balms that I bought & ended up tossing because they didn't work, it's actually cheaper. This needs to be stored in a cool area, leaving it in your purse on a warm day or in a very warm area will cause it to melt. I give this 5 stars & 2 thumbs up, I absolutely love the Fresh line of skin & lip care!!

reviews.review_title: It was amazing until it melted...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this stuff the moment I got the free sample for my birthday. It was great pairing up with the rose tinted sampler that came with it. After beginning use my lips never peeled and always seemed... HEALTHY. The flavor and texture is great.  Bad news tho, this stuff will not handle high temperatures. Not even moderately. I left mine in my purse for a moment in the car, when I came back it was melted into an unusable goo that I couldn't twist up to use anymore. Tho, its great that it didn't leak and explode all over my purse on its way out. But remember once this stuff starts getting remotely warm it will be hard to apply, you can't twist it too far out of the tube or it will break and fall off or melt to the point wear you can't twist it out of the applicator. So, great product! KEEP COOL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lips used to always be peeling. Now they are always soft and never peel. This is the best lip care I've ever used.
Makes my lips feel luxurious and super soft.
I hate this. It feels so oily on my lips and doesn't do anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a freebie birthday gift from sephora. I always use lip balm so i gave it a try as a replacement for my usual burts bees. It is absolutely fantastic. Cant even compare to what you get from a chapstick, carmex, burts bees etc. superior for sure. One star down bc of the price. I would probably go through a tube quickly. Will see how long the sample lasts and will consider purchasing. My lips are so smooth! I tht they were fine before but this made them better :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this lip therapy....the best all.
Super moisturizing and it tastes good, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Today I went into Sephora because it is my birthday friday, and I got an email saying I could receive my beauty insider gift early. It was two sample sticks of the Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment. One being non pigmented and the other in the shade rose. I fell in love with the non pigmented one the second i put it on. It is so smooth and really hydrates and moisturizers my lips. I have chapped lips all the time so I am constantly applying chap stick...if you are looking for a good one I defiantly recommend this one!
I am a repeat Sugar lip product addict! I love this stuff! You will not be dissapointed. I have overly dry lips and this is really making a difference.
This is the only lip stuff I use and my lips are always soft!

reviews.review_title: Only lip treatment that i will ever use!!!!!
reviews.review_text: First tried this in a Sephora store and fell in love immediately. It goes on smooth and makes my lips feel kissable soft all day!!! It can be worn alone or as a base for lipstick. I never leave home without this as I use it everyday!!! I recommend this to everyone I come in contact with

I am a real penny pincher, but I discovered Fresh about two years ago and have used it every night since. I really like this version, which doesn't have sunscreen. It may seem expensive, but I buy it twice a year and it really keep my lips in tip top shape. I put it on before bed every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!  So rich and smooth and moisturizing. I haver have chapped lips anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended by a friend, and I am more than satisfied. Unlike, most lip balms I am not constantly applying sugar throughout the day to keep my lips hydrated and smooth. I noticed smoother, hydrated lips after 1 week of use. I highly recommend!

I tried this balm as a sample and I'm SO glad that I didn't pay for it because it's really awful. Not only do I find that that it's quite drying (odd for a lip balm!), but I also can't stand the artificial lemon smell/flavour which irritates the back of my throat. I definitely won't ever be buying this!

reviews.review_title: As always Fresh is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So worth the money for a lip balm! My lips get crazy chapped in the Summer and WInter so this so far is working perfectly. I'm all about using lip balm before applying gloss or lipstick which I much prefer over a primer, as for me primer's don't hydrate enough This does the trick for sure and leaves my lips soft and chapped free. Plus you can't deny how good Fresh lip balms smell and taste. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: Best Lip Treatment on the Planet!!
reviews.review_text: Thanks for the birthday gift, Sephora. I tried the sample of Sugar and after a few days discovered that the chapped lips with which I am forever plagued we soft and flake-free. That you can get this product with a SPF rating is an added bonus. As are the tinted varieties. I'll never buy another lipstick again! I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product.

First, I feel this lip balm, like most products by Fresh, is laughably overpriced. However, it has a pleasant lemony scent and very soft texture. My main complaint is that every tube I've purchased or been given has melted into near-unusability, even if I keep it inside my air-conditioned house at all times. I've tried keeping these in the refrigerator, but that's hardly practical. It's an okay product if you live in a cold climate, but it really feels like a waste of money when the lip balm you've paid nearly thirty dollars for after tax melts right out of the tube.

Generally I wouldn't want to pay this much for a lip balm but I love the fresh lip products & they are totally worth it. I was constantly applying lip balm until I bought this. Now my lips are soft & stay that way. I love it & all the fresh lip products.
I love this! Smells so good and works really well. Only down side is that it's kinda pricey.

I love this stuff and it works! I use it every night before I go to bed and no longer have to worry about chapped, dry and lined lips! Wish for the cost it lasted longer but I will continue to pay the price as long as it continues to work the way it does on my lips!

I really enjoyed this product and used it daily 2-3 times a day for 4 months until I used it up. I thought the price was steep but decided to take the plunge. I find it over priced for what it is so I knocked a star for that. But since using it I have noticed my lips are more hydrated and supple than before. The product itself is smooth and has a nice clean lemony scent. I'm going to try the regular sugar lip treatment and compare them at some point. This may be my go to for winter if I can't find anything comparable.

I have been struggling with chapped peeling lips for months. I have tried EVERY other product out there. This along with the lip scrub is the only thing that worked. My lips are soft and smooth again! Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this... it is expensive however. If you like to splurge then get it. You can not compare this to basic ChapStick.
Love this product. Keeps my lips soft and moist, even in the winter. I am a fan of all of the SUGAR products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me there is something very unnecessary and silly about spending $24 on a lip balm (treatment), but I gave it a try anyway on a day that I was splurging, and out of chapstick. I haven't had any remarkable experience like some of these other reviewers, so perhaps I'm just unlucky. I've been using it for 3 weeks now and haven't noticed a single difference in feeling or look.
Best lip balm therapy! Finally found the one X

This product is the best lip treatment I have ever used and I have used plenty of them. Easy application and long lasting effects. I have very dry lips and this is the only product that has really, really worked.
It's simple; this product does not work. I have been using it now for a while, and nothing. Same for a family member who also uses this. Don't waste your money.

At first I was reticent to spend so much on a lip balm, but this one is worth it. I use it at night and have been very pleased with how it moisturizes my lips. Plus, it doesn't wear off easily, and lasts pretty much thru the night. It has a pleasant, citrusy scent that doesn't overwhelm. I would definitely recommend it.

I've used the Fresh Sugar lip balms for years so I couldn't wait to try the lip treatment. It think it's even better than the balm because the scent and texture are a bit lighter even though it is quite long lasting, and super moisturizing. I can't wait to pick up a couple more to stash in my purse and my car!

I do like this Product but I have not decided if I think it is better than the original fresh sugar lip. I have been using this one at night and the original during the day. I definately think it is a good product but I think once it runs out I will stick with the original. I have not noticed any smoothing of wrinkles but have only used it for two weeks so far.

I snapped this little baby up on my way up to check out, the Sephora Rep was waiting to check me out and I was not paying attention so I made a quick decision to just get it, the tester when I smelled it, it smelled SO fresh! I got it into the car and put it an and not have been without it since! It makes my lips feel soft and tender. I love it. worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: You made me love you and I didn't want to do it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, let's talk about the elephant in the room right off the bat. $25 for lip balm. Really?!? It better be good, as in the best lip balm in the history of the world good. With high prices come high expectations. This delivers on every front. It's just so pleasant in areas where others are not. It glides on effortlessly and evenly, it smells nice without being remotely perfumey, it has a subtle lemony flavor (like other Fresh Sugar products), and it just plain works. Also, it does not contain SPF, which is important to me as I am very sensitive. Any lip product with SPF ultimately dries my lips out, thus rendering that product useless as a balm. I also really like the packaging - it's a white, metal lipstick tube with a bottom that screws on and off for added security. No putting your fingers into a messy tub or trying to spread balm evenly with a squeeze-tube applicator. Just apply like lipstick and wait for the magic. It really softens and moisturizes more than any other balm I've tried (and I have a drawer full that range from drugstore to high-end). Also, the texture is perfect. Not at all heavy or waxy, but like a layer of silk on the lips. It melts in, but still leaves your lips feeling moisturized and not like you need to reapply. It works well under lipstick and on its own. I guess they know what this balm is worth. I really did not want to fall in love with a $25 lip balm, but it happened. You've been warned.

This is probably my FAVORITE lip balm ever (a close second is Rosebud Salve- Strawberry)  It is a lot thicker than the regular Fresh lip balm, lasts a long time and really softens. I love that it has a little SPF in it - although I dont know how great it is because I wore it to the beach and my lips got burned. If they upped the SPF factor in this formula that would be PERFECT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I received the birthday gift and then went ahead and purchased this. I put it on before bed and my lips are soooo soft in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend, knowing how much I love the original Fresh lip balms (I have all but Honey) bought me this one. I didn't think anything could improve on the orignal, but this has managed it. It's even more moisturizing and creamy feeling than the original lip treatment, and lasts longer. I'm only giving four stars because of price; I think the price (as with the original) is ridiculous. But I'll pay it, if it's this good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is awesome! Love it !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing on my lips! I love everything about it and it does not leave your lips waxy either! Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used a lot of lip treatments and this is the best. Lips feel moist without feeling greasy or shiny and it lasts a long time. A couple of times a day is all that is needed of this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use Burt's Bees lip balm, but when I was in Sephora I decided to try this out. I love the way it feels and smells(like lemon and vanilla) on my lips. It is very moisturizing and I really like the packaging. The only con in my opinion is that this product melts when kept in the heat... Otherwise I love it!
MOISTURIZING!!!! Great for lip shine and repair as well. Smells delightful. WORKS for my dry and aggravated lips.
I use this every night before bed and it makes my lips very soft and sweet smelling.

For me this one is even better than the original! I am constantly plagued by dry lips but after just one time using this I noticed the difference. It makes your lips feel great and also look fabulous. A little pricey but worth it. I bought one for my bathroom, one for my purse and will be getting one for my desk drawer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product. It is very hydrating, and is perfect for a night lip treatment.  But, and this is a big but, the product is very soft! I have problems with the product breaking on me. Twice. Its too expensive for me to put up with this.  I have very sensitive lips, this product does not make my lips peel or react. However, for me, not worth $25.

It's very moisturizing. I actually use it an hour before bed on my very chapped lips and the next day there is no dryness to be seen. I'm withholding a star though because it is on the pricey side, and the good results depend on a semi-daily usage (at least for me).
This is excellent lip balm. Feels soft and good on the lips. My only complaint is that it is a little too expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for about 2 weeks and I cannot imagine how I got by without it. When I'm sick and can't breather out of my nose, I wind up with these painful cracks in the corners of my mouth from mouth breathing all night. I had previously sworn by Aquaphor for night usage but it doesn't have HALF the benefits that this product does. I'm still sick and mouth breathing, but thanks to this product, no uncomfortable lip cracking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I have dry lips and am always searching for new lip balm. I got the sugar fresh mini set as a free gift and it's fantastic!
Fresh lipgloss melts. It breaks and falls on the floor. Lousy Lipgloss.

reviews.review_title: Ran out...in withdrawal! Running to local store!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lip moisture addict! Smells amazing, feels great, lasts a long time on lips. Lips look great. Can't say enough good things...buy it!
THIS IS THE BEST LIP THERAPY ,CREAMY MOISTURE PACKED JUST A FANTASTIC PRODUCT, ALOT FOR THE MONEY
